courses.title: Therapeutic Art: Self Exploration
courses.bio: An Introductory Course to Find Your True Self
objectives: How you can become who you want to be... who your soul wants to be
Embark on the journey to discover who you TRULY are
To see the beauty in your "imperfections" and love yourself
To solely focus on each creative task, cultivating a clear and tranquil mind
Explore all of the sides of yourself, the "masks" you wear, which masks do you need more or less of?
Stress and anxiety relief as you feel calmer doing these creative exercises
Art therapy can improve cognitive and sensory motor function, self-esteem, self awareness, emotional resilience.

What does FREEDOM mean to YOU?: Activity: What Does Freedom Mean to You?

requirements: All you need is a paper/sketchbook, and drawing/painting/colouring materials (you choose which!), and the ability to use your hands!!
NO Requirement to be "good" at art!
Be open to being creative, and immersed into doing some relaxing art
You will need to ask questions about yourself and your life
courses.description:
Use art as a channel to express your emotions throughout this course.
This is not a course for artists to progress as artists or to learn how to be an artist, but for anyone to go deeper into the subconscious mind using art as a medium to uncover ideas, underlying issues, or deep-seated emotions that are the cause of your daily troubles. Then using Therapeutic Art as the tool to deal with these possibly distressing or confusing emotions, both calming the distress and using visuals as a way to see these emotions in front of you. You'll even find yourself having fun in the process!
Throughout this course you will begin to identify who you truly are: not just the soul's essence, but who you are in each of the roles of your life, the 'masks' you wear with your family, your colleagues, your friends... You will recognise the parts of yourself you don't like, and the parts that are truly You - and becoming the You you want to be. See all of these masks - the good and bad - and generate a pure love for yourself, changing what it is you don't like or just accepting and embracing it. This is your time to explore all of this, your Self, through Art Therapy. Who are you under all of the masks and layers? And throughout it all I will be here to help you help yourself.


This is a 5 week course designed for you to take the time and space each week for a creative exercise whilst you contemplate the questions I give you about your Self and your life. You can do the exercises in any timeframe you desire, however I advise having time to reflect between each exercise, ideally sticking to it being 5 weeks. No prior art experience is required!
Use your preferred materials for any of the exercises, even if I am using paint you can use pencil, pen, crayons, pastels, collage or anything else you can think of! The priority is for you to do the exercise itself, no matter the material being used, and see what comes up for you.
target_audience: People looking for an outlet to calm, be mindful and de-stress
People on (or beginning) a self discovery journey
People looking for Self-development
People who want to try a different approach to their self-development
People who love being creative in various ways

courses.description:
Do you want to tell stories that actually connect?
Whether you're a writer, professional, creative, or simply someone who wants to express yourself more meaningfully—this course will show you how to shape your experiences into powerful stories that resonate.
How to Tell Better Stories is a storytelling masterclass designed to help you write, speak, and share more confidently. Through practical guidance, timeless techniques, and step-by-step exercises, you’ll learn how to tell stories that are authentic, engaging, and unforgettable—on the page, on the stage, or in everyday life.


What is this storytelling course?
This course is your guide to better storytelling—anywhere stories are told.
You’ll learn how to craft stories that captivate in job interviews, boost engagement in your business or brand, deepen personal relationships, and bring your written or spoken work to life. Whether you're writing fiction or nonfiction, preparing a speech, or just hoping to express yourself with more clarity and purpose, this course will give you the tools to do it well.
You don’t need to be a “writer”. You just need a story—and everyone has one.


What will you walk away with?
A story of your own, developed and refined throughout the course
Clear strategies to shape stories from your real-life experiences
A deeper understanding of what makes stories emotionally resonant and effective
A framework you can apply to writing, work, presentations, performance, and everyday conversations
Optional exercises to help you build your story step-by-step, in any format: written, spoken, or visual


Who is this course for?
This course is for anyone who wants to use storytelling to make a bigger impact—whether on the page, on stage, or in everyday conversations.
It’s perfect for:
Writers looking to improve their storytelling craft for fiction, nonfiction, or memoir
Public speakers & performers who want to captivate audiences with more engaging stories
Job seekers preparing for interviews where compelling storytelling makes you stand out
Scriptwriters & screenwriters refining their structure, dialogue, and emotional arcs
Content creators & video producers looking to tell more authentic, human-centered stories
Entrepreneurs & small business owners who want to connect with their audience through brand storytelling
Marketers & communicators crafting stories for ads, websites, and presentations
Anyone who wants to express themselves more clearly, confidently, and creatively
Whether you're storytelling for business, art, connection—or just for fun—this course will give you the tools to do it better.


What you’ll learn inside the storytelling course:
Section 1: Why Storytelling Matters
Understand why storytelling is fundamental to human connection—and why your stories matter more than you think.
Section 2: The Essentials of Great Storytelling
Learn what makes a story work: personal relevance, audience awareness, narrative structure, and the difference between a story and just an anecdote.
Section 3: Key Elements of Powerful Stories
Explore structure, conflict, stakes, plot, character, theme, voice, subtext, and more—with examples that bring each concept to life.
Section 4: Storytelling Out Loud
See how storytelling can transform interviews, presentations, public speaking, and everyday conversations.
Section 5: Storytelling in Writing
Apply what you’ve learned to fiction, nonfiction, journalism, advertising, and screenwriting—with real-world examples from literature and media.
Section 6: Expressive Storytelling Without Words
Discover how photography, music, design, and visual media can also tell deeply personal stories—no writing required.
Section 7: Telling Your Story
Using everything you’ve learned, you’ll be guided to tell your story—authentically, intentionally, and confidently.
Section 8: Recap and Reflection
Final thoughts, storytelling tips, and ways to keep growing your skills beyond the course.


Meet Your Storytelling Instructor
Brian Birmingham is a professional screenwriter and copywriter working in the film, television, and gaming industries. His students love his clarity, warmth, and real-world storytelling experience.
Brian has teamed up with Video School, one of Udemy’s top course creators, to bring you a course that’s practical, inspiring, and creatively empowering.


Enroll now and get instant access to:
Engaging video lessons
Downloadable templates and storytelling guides
Practical, step-by-step story-building exercises
Udemy's AI Role Play scenarios to practice your storytelling
Instructor support along the way
You don’t have to be a writer. You just have to be ready to tell your story.
Let’s make it one people will remember.
Join now and start telling better stories today.

Hi, my name is Shervin House. I am a top Udemy instructor, and in this course I will be teaching you how to play chess like a pro!
Dan: "Great course, the instructions are clear and engaging. The structure of the course has a good flow to it and are effective. Definitely recommend it..."
I've been in love with the game of chess since I was introduced to the game by my grandfather at the age of 6. After decades of taking lessons and learning from strategy books, I have put together a comprehensive course that covers all the fundamentals of chess that every chess player must know. I also teamed up with two different International Masters who looked over the course and gave me feedback on how to make it even better and more comprehensive, just to make sure there aren't any fundamentals missing from the course.

This course is for beginner chess players. This includes those who have never played chess before in their lives, as well as those who have some experience playing the game, but are looking to take their game to the next level. For example, if you are a 1200-1300 rated player or lower, or if you don't have a chess rating at all, then this course is perfect for you.
By the end of this course, you will know all the fundamentals of chess in all 3 stages of the opening, the middle-game and the endgame. The aim of this course is to teach you how to play chess properly in order to boost your ability, as well as your ratings from a beginner to.a great player; we basically take you by the hand and walk you through all of these fundamentals step by step.
Pavlo: "Really fluid and easy to understand. I'm not a novice and I've never heard about en passant!"
What can you expect from this course?
The most in-depth chess strategy course online

courses.description:
"This is art, not engineering. Storytelling is social, not mechanical"
The bottom line I teach to all my authors is that nothing will make your next book sell better than ensuring readers read your current book to the end.
The foundation of ensuring readers want to read to the end is that readers care about your characters. This course is about making sure readers care, by ensuring that you, the author, form a connection with the reader, and ensuring that your readers connect with your characters.
In this course you will learn how to choose, combine, and apply a suite of techniques that will define your approach to creative writing - your technique and your style. You will learn how to make these choices consciously and with care.
Most of all, you will learn alternatives to Point-of-View and "Show-don't-Tell" - including the most powerful narrative technique of all, Psychic Distance
In this course you will learn:
Narrator Grammar
Narrator Identity
Combining identification, empathy and sympathy
Framing
Filtering
Psychic Distance
Point of view
How to convey character thoughts through "Free Indirect Style"
The "Author's Core Competence"
+ half a dozen additional concepts, tools and techniques for applying these principles
This course includes a lot of practice activities. You don't have to do all of them, but you will definitely learn a lot more if you do them. Some of the lessons depend on your completing at least one assignment at least in part, to be sure that you have learned the techniques and principles being taught.


(This course was previously called "How to use Great Narration to Connect with your Reader")
target_audience: Anyone who wants to be an author of fiction

requirements: No requirements. But recommend students to have paper and pen ready to take down ideas. Also, dictionary can be useful. If English is not good, can practice the exercises in your own language is fine too.
courses.description:
Do you have trouble speaking your thoughts? Realize that you Have The Ability To Express Yourself!
Sometimes it can be difficult to express ourselves. We may have an idea, an opinion, a story we want to share, but we just don't have the right words or a way to properly express it! Developing our creativity can help us tremendously because it will allow us to see that there are always hundreds of way to communicate an idea!

Learn to approach a topic in various ways
Developing Creativity is also about opening the mind to the infinite ways of approaching a topic, not only this can help you in your ability to converse with people, but it can help you in areas such as problem-solving and in your creative hobbies and projects. Developing Creativity thus is an extremely useful skill in life. In this course, we will focus primarily on developing Creativity for communicating our ideas.

Fun and challenging exercises!
In this course, you will be presented with unique exercises that challenge you to improvise on the spot! You will be guided by me to explore various ways of connecting with your mind, of opening your creative potential as you are tackled by random topics. The purpose of using random topics is to simulate the randomness and spontaneity of life experiences.

I will be guiding you also to develop the best mentality for growing your Creativity!

What you will need
You will not need anything to do the course. However, to do the "homework" components, you will need a book (any book) so that you can flip to a random page to choose a random word to challenge your ability to improvise. Alternatively, I have included some links to random word generator websites that you can use.
You will also need to do the course in a place where you can "speak out loud" so that you can practice expressing your thoughts out. This is very important!
For non-native English speakers, feel free to slow down the course to suit your own pace!

Check out my other courses!
I have created over a dozen courses on Udemy so feel free to check them out! My courses are primarily focused on developing Self-Transformation, i.e. to transform the mind so that we can unleash our infinite potential!

See you soon!
-Jonny John Liu
target_audience: People who struggle with expressing themselves in life can take this course.

Those who wish to learn to open their mind up to different ways of thinking, of approaching a topic

Writing with AI: How to Write Prompts That Work? (Prompt Engineering)

How to Make the Content Easier to Consume
Did It Help? - Check AI Score Again
It's Time to Create a Killer Title and Publish

It's Only the Beginning: It's Only the Beginning - Section Introduction

requirements: A passion for writing. Also, a desire to leverage AI to grow in your career.
No prior experience with either is necessary. However, if you are already a writer, it can help.
courses.description:
AI - Artificial Intelligence is here. It's the best time for any writer to master AI tools and take advantage of emerging technology. How? Well, you're already at the right place! This is the best course to learn about humanizing AI-generated content!
If you don't upgrade, someone who does will replace you. Worse, AI can replace you.


This course aims to empower beginner writers to take up writing while using available FREE AI tools. And help experienced writers adapt and leverage this new, powerful technology.


The philosophy of this course is to use AI as a tool - not as a replacement for human writing. Because after all, we write for other human beings - not machines or algorithms. With this approach, we can produce more content and using the method shown in this course, we can humanize it to maintain or even improve the quality. The result is increased writing efficiency and a reduction in time and effort put in per article.


How is this course different from other generative AI courses?
Most of the courses available on the internet discuss the idea of generating content using AI - such as blogs, poems, e-books, and more. In this course, we go a step beyond. We cover how to generate content using AI, but more importantly, how to edit and make it human.


How is this course designed?
As you can see in the course content, there are 4 sections:
Before We Start:
We discuss the philosophy of this course, the pros and cons of using AI for writing, the importance of having a personal writing style and how to develop one, and finally, the areas we need to monitor to improve AI content.
Writing with AI:
We understand 2 key factors of prompt engineering, the process of using AI to find niches and topics to write about, then create an outline, discuss the importance of having your own outline as well, learn about SEO, and finally, the process of using AI for writing.
Editing and Humanizing:
In perhaps the most important section, we learn about the process of humanizing AI-generated content, improving its readability - making the text easier to read and understand, check and correct the grammar, and finally, create and analyze a title that works.
It's Only the Beginning:
As we come to the end of this journey, it's time to put the knowledge to good use and boost your text. We discuss the many possibilities of content you can create using the method we discussed in this course - blogs, articles, stories, poems, e-books, and so much more.
Excited to take your writing to the next level? Join this course NOW and get ahead of the competition!
I'll see you in the course!
target_audience: Beginner, aspiring content writers who want to get started and make good use of available AI tools
Experienced writers who want to boost their productivity by leveraging AI to work for them

courses.description:
Welcome to "Learn how to write a fiction novel in 5 weeks"!


Are you passionate about writing and eager to embark on the journey of crafting your own novel? This course is designed to help you bring your creative ideas to life and guide you through the process of writing a compelling fiction novel in just five weeks. Throughout this course, you will learn invaluable techniques and methodologies that will enable you to streamline your writing process and maintain a focused approach.
One of the key elements you will explore is the revolutionary  27-chapter novel outline, which breaks down the novel-writing process into manageable chunks. This unique approach allows you to systematically develop your story in just 27 days or four weeks, unlocking your potential to efficiently write a complete novel. To start, you will dive into the initial stages of novel preparation, discovering effective methods for outlining your ideas, creating fully developed characters, and establishing a solid plot structure.
Our comprehensive lessons will guide you through these crucial steps, providing you with the tools you need to bring your novel to life. Additionally, the course will cover the essential aspects of manuscript formatting, ensuring that your work aligns with industry standards. Understanding how to properly format your manuscript will not only enhance your professional image but also increase your chances of catching the attention of literary agents or publishers.
But the journey doesn't end there. Writing is a continuous process of refinement. In this course, you will learn how to effectively edit and revise your manuscript, polishing your prose to a sparkle. We will provide you with proven strategies and techniques to elevate the quality of your writing, making it engaging and captivating for your readers. Furthermore, this course includes bonus resources and valuable writing tips to support you along your writing journey.
From recommended reading lists to helpful writing exercises, these additional materials will enhance your learning experience, offering you practical insights and inspiration to push your creativity further. Unlock the writer within you and join us in the "Learn how to write a fiction novel in 5 weeks" course. Let us guide you on this transformative journey, as you embark on the path of crafting your own captivating fiction novel.


Enroll today and discover the satisfaction of bringing your literary dreams to life!
target_audience: Students that are comfortable with writing
Aspiring Students

courses.title: Curso completo de acuarela para pintar cielos y mares
courses.bio: Aprende desde cero a pintar preciosos paisajes
objectives: Conceptos del color para crear profundidad en las obras
Conceptos de atmósfera, luces y sombras
Técnicas básicas y no tan básicas de pintura en acuarela
Mezclas de colores y varios tipos de paisajes, como de tormenta o despejados

El color: Hablamos un poco del círculo cromático
Técnicas de acuarela: Húmedo sobre húmedo y húmedo sobre seco
Consejos antes de ponernos a pintar
Mares: Mar turquesa con lluvia y nubes de tormenta

requirements: Necesitarás acuarelas, papel de acuarela 300gr y pinceles.
No necesitas saber nada de acuarela, aprenderás paso a paso desde el inicio
courses.description:
¡Hola! Mi nombre es Francisca y estoy emocionada de presentaros este
curso de acuarela de cielos y mares. Soy profesora, escritora y
acuarelista, y he pasado muchos años perfeccionando mi técnica para
capturar la belleza del cielo y el mar en mis pinturas.

En este curso, vamos a explorar juntos los secretos de la acuarela de
cielos y mares. Vamos a trabajar con diferentes técnicas y materiales
para crear pinturas que transmitan la majestuosidad de los cielos en
todas sus formas: desde un amanecer rosa hasta un atardecer dorado, y
desde un cielo tormentoso hasta un cielo despejado. También vamos a
aprender a representar el movimiento y la textura del mar, desde las
olas agitadas hasta las tranquilas aguas de una laguna.

A lo largo del curso, también exploraremos cómo utilizar la luz y la
sombra para dar profundidad a nuestras pinturas, así como la
importancia del color y la composición en la acuarela. Además,
recibirás consejos prácticos y retroalimentación personalizada para
mejorar tus habilidades.

Como profesora, me apasiona ayudar a otros a desarrollar su propio
estilo y técnica en la acuarela. Y como escritora, me encanta
compartir mis conocimientos y experiencia con otros apasionados del
arte. Espero poder ayudarte a descubrir todo lo que la acuarela de
cielos y mares tiene para ofrecer.

Gracias por unirte a mí en este viaje de descubrimiento y creatividad.
¡Nos vemos en el curso!
target_audience: Creativos, amantes del color, amantes del paisaje

courses.title: Painting a Chipoo Dog
courses.bio: A color (themes) on black & white portrait painting oil color on canvas

Introduction: One-color on black and white portrait painting oil color on canvas
Structure, Analyze Colors and Codes, and: How to grid by using an application

requirements: Just need love painting and willing to try to create one
Be able to take one and a half hours for this course
courses.description:
This course is A color (themes) on black and white oil color on canvas, and it is good for beginners. All levels are welcome as well Black and white are the base of all colors plus a color or its themes adding to highlights keep the painting looks unique.


Since the painting is black and white tone so you can always add your favorite colors on it or apply the instruction to colorful painting how you prefer.


It will guide you from starting point until you own a painting in your hands.
In the course, there are some tricks from my experience, which you can use (might work in your situation)


To clean brushes:
I use only the Used Cooking Oil to clean up paint after using it.
If you need to clean dried paint on your brush, better to use a thinner or special liquid to wash it off.


A hand crutch, you might have used in or might not yet.


The hand crutch is a ~1 feet long wood stick.
It helps balance your hand and fingers' weight.
It is designed to lay your hand to paint at the tiniest area like the light reflection in the eyes by avoid touching the wet paint.


Creating something valuable, it's something to be proud of.
Please, send me feedback
I will improve for the best for you in the next courses
target_audience: Who are fond of painting.
For someone who is a will to take action right now to challenge themselves that they can do it

courses.title: 3.GÖZ Hayal Gücü Yaratıcı Yazarlık Antrenmanları
courses.bio: Düşün sistemini geliştirme sanatı yolunda pratik uygulamalar
objectives: Hayal gücü nedir ve ne değildir?
Hayal gücü nasıl geliştirilir?
Hayal gücünü geliştirmek için düşünsel pratikler ne şekilde yapılır?
Hayal gücü geliştirme sürescinde bilgi edinme ve araştırma neden önemlidir? Bu süreç nasıl işler?

Giriş: Çıkış Noktası Seçimi ve Açılımlara Bakış
Bilgi Edinme ve Araştırma: Hayal Gücünün Temelleri
Farklı Bakış Açıları Üzerinden Düşünsel Üretim
Düşünsel Ara Yolların Ana Yol ile Kesişimi
Kurmaca Sanatında Doruk Noktası: Giriş, Gelişme ve Sonuç Sağlaması
Düşünsel Tıkanmanın Aşılması ve Yeni Başlayan Süreç
Konu Bütünlüğünü Bozmadan Yeni Bilgi Eklemek

requirements: Merak, sabır ve istek
courses.description:
Yazarlık ve yaratıcı yazarlık başta olmak üzere tüm sanat kollarının en önemli ihtiyacı hayal gücü değil midir? Özellikle yaratıcı yazarlık = hayal gücü değil ise nedir?
"Yaratıcı yazarlık, yazarın hayal gücünü kullanarak benzersiz, özgün ve çarpıcı hikayeler oluşturma sürecidir." Kursumuzda sunulan yol haritası, yazar adaylarımızın eserlerinde derinlik yaratmalarına, okuyucuları farklı dünyalara götürmelerine ve hayal güçlerini perspektife oturtmalarına olanak tanır.
Hayal gücü, kuralları yıkarak herhangi bir materyali sıradışı biçimde kullanmayı ve alışılmadık tekniklerle sanat eserleri üretmenin anahtarıdır. Bu yolla, okuyucunun düşünce kalıplarını sarsmayı başarabiliriz.
Rüzgârın rengini, kelimelerin kokusunu kurgulanan maceraya yansıtmak ve söylenmemiş olanı bulmak hayal gücünün nasıl ifade edildiği ile ilgilidir. Yazarlık evreninde yaratıcı yazarlık kuyruklu yıldızı tam burada devreye girer.
3.GÖZ Hayal Gücü Yaratıcı Yazarlık Antrenmanları size farklı bakış açıları sunmak üzere tasarlanmıştır. Arşivlerin ve bilgi kaynaklarının kullanımı ile gerçeklikten çıkarak kendi evrenimizi nasıl yaratabilir ve en önemlisi ne şekilde ifade edebiliriz? Nasıl yaratıcı yazar olunur?
Yarattığımız evrende düşüncelerimizin beyin, kalp ve epifiz bezi üzerinden parmaklarımıza, parmaklarımızdan cümlelere dönüşmesi keyifli ve eğlenceli bir süreçtir. Hayal gücümüzü kullanmak ve geliştirmek için gerekli olan yeti ve organlarımızı tanımak işimizi nasıl kolaylaştırır?
Hayal gücü bir kurmaca ve saçmalama sanatıdır. Bilim insanlarının tüm gelişmeleri hayalperestlere borçlu olduğu da bir gerçektir. Hayalperestlerin dalga geçilen "saçmalıkları" bugün gerçeklik olarak karşımızda durmaktadır.
3. Göz ( Epifiz bezi ) açık olduğu sürece düşün sistemimiz sınırsız evrenin en yetkili ve etkili gezgini olacaktır. Antrenmanlarımızda seçilmiş olan bir noktadan başlayarak düşün sistemimizi oluşturan ana yoldan onlarca yan ve ara yol yaratıp söylenmemiş ve yapılmamış olanları bulmak için çaba sarf edeceğiz. Bu yolda en yakın dostumuz merak duygumuz ve sabır erdemimiz olmalıdır.
Girdiğiniz bu yolda sıra dışı bir sanatçı olmak ise amacınız kendi çizginizi yaratmanız ve çekinmeden paylaşmanız sizlere daha fazla yardımcı olur. Farklı fikirler ile değişik dünyalar yaratmak için dost muhabbetlerine de ihtiyacınız olacak, olumlu olumsuz her fikir sizin için lezzetli bir düşünceye dönüşebilir. Her şey sizin kalbinizde olsa da ifade etme becerisi ile var olursunuz. Haydi gelin başlayalım!
target_audience: Sanatın her kolunda, özellikle yaratıcı yazarlık kulvarında, kendini geliştirmek ve farklı bakış açılarına sahip olmak isteyen, söylenmemiş ve yapılmamış olanların peşinde olan kaşifler

courses.title: wirklich sehen - freier zeichnen
courses.bio: Aufwärmübungen für Urban Sketching und Reiseskizzen
objectives: Verschiedene Arten, wie wir sehen ("Sehmodi"), und vier Übungen, um zum Zeichnen nach Beobachtung in einen geeigneten Sehmodus zu wechseln. Die letzte Übung ist auch eine Technik für schnelle Urban Sketches, Alltags- und Reiseskizzen.

Einleitung: über verschiedene Arten zu sehen und den sEhmoduls wechseln

requirements: Lust, mit der Wahrnehmung, Papier und Stift zu experimentieren.
courses.description:
Wenn Zeichnungen nach Beobachtung nicht so ganz "richtig" aussehen, liegt es oft daran, dass wir nicht in einem geeigneten Sehmodus sind. Im alltäglichen Modus können die meisten Menschen nicht genau wahrnehmen, was wirklich vor ihnen sichtbar ist, sondern sie meinen zu sehen, was sie über das Objekt wissen. Das zeigt sich in ihren Zeichnungen. In diesem Kurs geht es um Arten zu sehen ("Sehmodi") und wie man in einen geeigneten Modus zum Zeichnen vor Ort wechseln kann. Ich zeige vier effektive und einfache Aufwärmübungen für das Zeichnen nach Beobachtung. Die letzte Übung ist auch eine Technik für "echte" Urban Sketches oder Reiseskizzen - ein schneller Ansatz, um alles zu zeichnen, was man sieht. Auch komplizierte Sujets wie Architektur oder Menschen werden viel einfacher, wenn man genau sehen kann, was da sichtbar ist.
Dieser Kurs ist sowohl für Anfänger geeignet, als auch für Fortgeschrittene mit zu viel Routine, die mit "Anfängergeist" lernen wollen, wieder neu zu sehen.
Ich gebe seit 2011 Urban Sketching Kurse in der Schweiz und seit 2018 Onlinekurse. Die Übungen in diesem Kurs sind die Basisübungen, mit denen ich die meisten Kurse beginne, weil "Sehen-können-was-da-ist" die Grundlage für alles Zeichnen nach Beobachtung ist. Die Anleitungen zu den Übungen habe ich möglichst kurz und kompakt gehalten. Die Demos in voller Länge sind am Ende des Kurses, zum Vertiefen, zur Inspiration, um etwas genauer anzusehen, um den ganzen Prozess zu sehen.
target_audience: Menschen, die in ihrer Freizeit zeichnen wollen, was sie sehen, z.b. Reiseskizzen, Alltagsskizzen  oder Urban Sketching

courses.title: Edit Your Novel the Right Way!
courses.bio: Learn the tricks and techniques to turning your rough draft into a thing of beauty.

Your First Pass: The Heavy Lifting of Ma: First Pass: Read it Out Loud
Using Index Cards: Oh, it's Magic!
Fine Tuning and Tightening UP: Full Sweep: Cut Out Overused Conversation Markers
Enhance Descriptions: Use all of the Five Senses
The Plot Thickens: Adding or Enhancing S: Subplots: You need at least one
Subplots: Okay, you need three, but seriously, that's it
Gathering Feedback: What you've learned so far, part deux
Automated Editing: What you've learned so far, final deux

requirements: Have written a novel
Understand basic novel concepts such as story arc and subplot
Understand story structure
courses.description:
I know how hard it is to edit your first draft.
I know how hard it is to WRITE your first draft, to begin with!
I've been where you are.
Perhaps you're disappointed by what you've written.
Perhaps you're feeling that it's not QUITE what you had in mind.
Well, this is the right course for you.
First, I take a POSITIVE and FUN approach to editing.
Nothing to be dreaded or afraid of.
I've written a dozen novels and a bucket load of short stories.
Ten of my novels are published (most under pen names), as is my collection of short stories.
Now here's the thing.
My novels were TERRIBLE when I finished writing them.
Really, really awful.
So, I got help. I learned everything I could about editing your novel from some great books and some great online courses, including those by the wonderful Holly Lisle and the amazing Shawn Coyne and the brilliant James Scott Bell, among many, many other great writers and editors.
I also worked with genius editors through draft after draft and learned from what they told me about my writing (some of it eye opening).
And I discovered online resources you won't believe exist -- they are that good!
This course can be finished in an hour, but in my opinion it should ideally be used this way:
1. After the intro lessons, take ONE lesson, learn from it.
2. Then, APPLY it to your current manuscript.
3. When you're done, come back and take the next lesson.
4. Apply what you've learned to your manuscript AGAIN.
5. Rinse and repeat.
In this manner, make your way through the course.
When you are done with the course — whether it takes you hours, days, weeks, or months -- so, too, your manuscript will be done!
So don't delay. I promise it's painless. You'll learn a lot and have fun doing it.
And remember, this course, like all the courses on Udemy, is yours to access forever.
That's really good for two reasons:
You can retake the course every time you have a new novel or short story to edit
The course will increase in content over time, and will always be up-to-date, because I will be adding new courses and refreshing existing courses all the time.
So sign up, and best of luck.
And remember, you can always ask me questions right in the course.
This course — again, like all of Udemy's courses — are personal. They aren't just posted here and forgotten. Letting you sink or swim on your own.
I'll be here to offer advice, answer questions, and guide you through the rough spots.
Aren't you excited to get started? I am eager to have you jump in with both feet!
Let's do this!
Best,
Carl
target_audience: Any writer at any stage of their career
This is NOT for writers who have not yet completed a first draft of a novel
This is NOT for nonfiction ("true") book writers, although some of the material does apply to all writing in general

courses.title: Curso de Desenho Chibi Kawaii para Iniciantes
courses.bio: Método Mamãe Desenha Comigo
objectives: Aprenda Desenhar Para Ensinar Crianças a Desenhar
Faça as Aulas Sem Sair de Casa
Desenhe os Personagens favoritos das Crianças
Divirta-se em Família Personalizando e Colorindo suas Criações
Aprenda e Desenhar de Maneira Rápida
Aprenda a Desenhar a Partir de Uma Foto

Desenhando a Partir de Uma Foto: Desenhando a Partir de Uma Foto! Henry Once Upon a Time

requirements: Todos podem aprender pois o método ensina a desenhar de maneira fácil e rápida!
courses.description:
Olá, é muito bom ter você por aqui!! O Método Mamãe Desenha Comigo visa ensinar a desenhar para que se ensine a criança a desenhar e dessa maneira passar momentos agradáveis em família! É quase um apelo para o resgate da convivência familiar!
Aprenda desenhar os personagens favoritos do seu filho.
Personalize seus desenhos
Ensine suas crianças e tenha momentos divertidos em família!
Desenhe sem saber desenhar, utilizando apenas formas básicas de maneira simples e divertida!!
Embora o nome seja Mamãe Desenha Comigo, não significa que que seja esse Método seja exclusivamente para mães. Papais, vovós , vovôs, titios, titias, enfim para a família, professores, cuidadores e tutores, passarem momentos agradáveis com suas crianças e adolescentes, fortalecendo os vínculos,  educando, e tendo momentos prazerosos em família. Aprenda desenhar para ensinar a desenhar. O estilo escolhido para essas aulas é o Chibi Kawaii, desenhos bem fofinhos que aprenderá a personalizar e a desenhar seus personagens favoritos!!
target_audience: Mamães, Papais, Titias, Titios, Vovós, Vovôs, Professores, Cuidadores, Tutores, Pedagogos, Monitores e qualquer pessoas que deseje aprender!!

courses.title: 【AI 자막】 Design Thinking - 창의력 및 혁신성을 커리어에 적용하기
courses.bio: 디자인 씽킹 교육을 통해 창의력을 발휘하고 커리어 및 개인적인 목표에 적용하세요.
objectives: 누구나 적용할 수 있는 완벽한 크리에이티브 프로세스를 배우게 됩니다.
모든 산업이나 예술 분야에서 창의적인 아이디어를 창출할 수 있는 다양한 기술을 배우게 됩니다.
대기업에서 가장 원하는 기술을 알려드립니다.
창의성을 가로막는 미신과 거짓말들을 파악할 수 있습니다.
배운 기술을 실습하는 활동을 수행하게 됩니다.
어떤 상황에서도 창의력을 100% 발휘할 수 있도록 훈련하게 됩니

1단계 - 호기심: 다르게 보기 위한 세 가지 전략

requirements: 자신의 한계를 뛰어넘고 모든 창의적 잠재력을 끌어내고자 하는 열망
우리는 모두 창의적으로 태어났지만 사회는 우리를 그렇지 않다고 믿게 만듭니다. 이 강의를 성공적으로 수강하려면, 여러분 자신과 여러분의 능력을 믿어야 합니다.
courses.description:
[꼭 읽어주세요] 한글 AI 자막 강의란?
유데미의 한국어 [자동] AI 자막 서비스로 제공되는 강의입니다.
강의에 대한 질문사항은 Federico 강사님이 확인하실 수 있도록 Q&A 게시판에 영어로 남겨주시기 바랍니다.


강력한 아이디어를 제시하여 업무에서 두각을 나타내고 싶으신가요?
광고 제품을 만들거나 기존 제품을 획기적으로 개선하기 위한 기발한 아이디어를 내고 싶으신가요?
완전히 새로운 광고 캠페인을 기획해야 하나요?
비즈니스, 예술 또는 기타 목표에 적용할 수 있는 탄탄한 창의력 프로세스를 배우고 싶다면 이 강의를 추천합니다.


제 이름은 Federico Garay 이며, 심리학자이자 온라인 강사입니다. 존재하지 않는 것을 상상하고 현실로 만드는 능력을 통한 이색적인 커리어로 성공을 거두었습니다. 저의 데일리 챌린지는 같은 일이라도 매일 다르게 해보는 것입니다.


이 강의는 진지하고 과학적이며 포괄적인 과정을 통해 창의력을 훈련하고 잘 정의된 단계를 통해 구체적인 목표에 적용할 수 있도록 창의력을 발휘하는 방법을 가르쳐주는 유일한 강의입니다.


저는 모든 자료를 5개의 층(또는 단계)으로 구성된 'CREATIVE BUILDING' 이라는 프로세스로 정리했으며, 이를 마스터하시면 실패를 방지할 수 있는 비법들을 배울 수 있습니다.
호기심. 이 섹션에서는 창의력을 위한 완벽한 트리거는 잘 짜여진 질문이며, 잘 짜여진 질문이란 과연 어떻게 질문해야 하는 것인지 배워봅니다.
환경. 환경은 여러분의 기분과 창의력에 영향을 미칩니다. 이 섹션에서 여러분의 주위 환경을 적절하게 준비하는 방법을 배워봅니다.
영감. 수천 가지 아이디어에 불을 붙일 수 있는 초기 불꽃을 찾는 다양한 기법을 배워봅니다.
스파크. 이 섹션에서는 가장 창의적인 아이디어를 창출할 수 있는 독창적이고 재미있는 방법을 배워봅니다.
실행. 이 섹션에서는 아이디어가 허공에서 죽지 않도록 하기 위해 해야 할 일과 아이디어를 바로 실행에 옮기는 방법에 대해 배워봅니다.


상세 페이지에서 확인 가능한 무료 맛보기 강의를 통해 이 강의가 얼마나 직접적이고 실용적이며 재미있는지 직접 확인해 보세요.


점점 더 기술적으로 자동화되는 세상에서, 직장에서의 창의성은 아웃소싱하거나 자동화할 수 없는 유일한 능력입니다. 사회는 항상 더 많은 창의력을 가진 인재가 필요합니다.


제가 Josh Linkner, Jim Kwik, 그리고 창의적 사고의 세계를 혁신하고 있는 수많은 천재들과 같은 유명한 현대 크리에이터들에게서 배운 전략을 전수해드릴 테니, 여러분도 여러분의 창의적인 두뇌를 계발해보세요.


매우 재미있고 활기찬 시간이 될 것입니다. 여러분과 함께 이 혁신적인 모험에 뛰어들게 되어 매우 기쁩니다.


그럼 1강에서 뵙겠습니다.
FEDE 드림
target_audience: 기업가, 사업 소유주, 영업사원, 임직원, 투자자, 비즈니스 및 예술계와 관련된 모든 분
잠재적 창의력. 자신의 내면에 발휘할 수 있는 잠재력이 많다는 것을 알고 그것을 꺼낼 용기를 찾고자 하는 분

objectives: Comprender los Fundamentos de la Acuarela
Dominar la Paleta de Colores Invernal
Aplicar Técnicas para Crear Textura
Desarrollar Confianza para Crear Paisajes Nevados Propios

Acuarela en tubo o en pastilla
Cómo utilizar líquido enmascarador en acuarela

Pintando paisajes nevados: Paisaje de montañas nevadas con cera blanca y mar

requirements: No se requieren requisitos previos para realizar el curso, se aprenderán las técnicas desde cero
courses.description:
¿Te gustaría capturar la serenidad y belleza de los paisajes nevados en acuarela? Este curso es ideal para principiantes y aficionados al arte que buscan aprender a pintar la atmósfera invernal con un enfoque práctico y relajado. Desde los tonos fríos de la nieve hasta la textura de los árboles y el cielo de invierno, te guiaré paso a paso para crear impresionantes obras en acuarela.
Empezaremos con los conceptos básicos: elegir los materiales adecuados, dominar las técnicas de húmedo sobre húmedo y seco sobre seco, y entender la paleta de colores que evoca los paisajes invernales. Aprenderemos a utilizar nuestros materiales para conocerlos y llevarlos a la zona de trabajo con seguridad. Luego, exploraremos la creación de profundidad y textura, aprendiendo a representar montañas nevadas, bosques cubiertos de nieve y cielos nublados. Hablaremos del color y la ausencia de él para crear sombras y blancos puros que den brillo a nuestras obras.
Este curso está diseñado para que, al finalizar, tengas la confianza de crear tus propios paisajes nevados en acuarela. No necesitas experiencia previa, solo ganas de aprender y disfrutar del proceso creativo. ¡Únete y descubre el encanto de la pintura en acuarela mientras creas escenas de invierno llenas de calma y belleza!
target_audience: Principiantes en acuarela. Artistas aficionados. Amantes de la naturaleza y el invierno. Personas que buscan una actividad relajante y creativa

courses.title: Positive Tinkering - Create Success Without Going To College
courses.bio: Using life skills, education and hobbies you already have fo create products others will pay for.
objectives: Reasons why you don't have to go to college to be successful.
How to use creative common sense methods to create a business or enhance a current one.
Examples of 4 products or services I created using these methods.
Learning how to use your education, work experience or hobbies to create your own home business
They will learn Seven unusual creative techniques To Create products or make existing products better!
They will learn 10 Mental Blocks To Overcome!

Mental Blocks to Creative Thinking Part: Mental Blocks to Creative Tinkering - Part One
How Else Can You Use a product or an Ide: How Else can you use an idea or product?
Adapting an unusual existing idea to your current product or idea

requirements: The desire to own your own business and the ability to follow powerpoint and video presentations
Wanting to learn how to use your experience, education and hobbies to create a business.
courses.description:
Many people encounter mental blocks when it comes to creating a home business, You will learn how to overcome the ten most common mental blocks you could run into when trying to create a new product or service. You will learn how to use your education, job experience, hobbies or just plain old common sense to create something new that someone will pay for.
You will learn how average people have created or improved products or services. I even had two ladies who created dog food that people can also eat.
In today's society you have to learn some of the latest technology like Artificial Intelligence or 3D Printing to create new products or services. 3D printing helped me produce a product that was far less expensive to produce than traditional methods.
I will show you four examples of products I created using these methods called CHANGES. One has been a tool I patented and another has been copyrighted board game. Another is a custom made lighting fixture. I even desgned a completely new type of fitness gym. I call these methods CHANGES. Each letter in CHANGES stands for a method or technique that you can easily learn and have fun doing it.
Learn to overcome ten mental blocks to creativity and the seven methods of creatively creating new products or services.
target_audience: People who are retired or soon to be retired and want to create a business they can work from hompeople.
People who are tired of their job and want to work for themselves (Preferably at home)
People who are willing to take a chance with ideas!
Creative Americans who are not worried about failing! Failing can be a learning experience.

courses.title: Writing Detective Stories for Beginner Writers
courses.bio: Learn how to write interesting detective stories with effective writing methods!
objectives: Learn the difference between a realistic detective and a cliche detective
Use various detective-related terms and phrases
Describe realistic crime scenes and clues
Employ the legal side of any detective story
Devise the skills your detective needs
Understand the police ranking system
Make your detective likeable and investing
Use the elements that make detective fiction great

Writing Detective Fiction: The Grim Facts in Crime Fiction
The Legal Facts in Crime Fiction

requirements: No requirements to take this course
courses.description:
Hello Writer!
Welcome to the course where I show you how to create and write a wonderfully intriguing and enjoyable detective story! Don't make the same mistakes that so many novice authors make and create a detective story that keeps the reader invested!


My name is Matthew Dewey and I am a writer. It is hard to say when my passion for writing began, but if I can recall it all started back in primary school. A small child with not much to say, but plenty to write, or in early cases, scribble across a page. From there writing became a hobby, moving on to become a part-time job writing articles on various subjects from technology to programming. Suddenly, the spark was ignited and I wrote my first novel. From there I was hooked onto something that was akin to a calling.
Enough monologue, it is time to tell you what this course is worth to you. First, this course was created with the express intention to teach the fundamentals of planning and writing a detective story. In my rising through the writing world I found that information was handed freely, but not with enough dedication and forethought. The advice lacking and the examples poor. I decided to push through and after several years developed my own toolkit that is simple and multipurpose. I went on to make a career in writing and teaching others to write, providing useful and interesting information. As a result, I wrote several fantasy books and hundreds of stories, mysteries and detective fiction included, and I will show you how to do the same!
In addition to the research and books, I also write from experience, having written several articles on the subject, which you can find on my website.
I will show you how to:
Choose between a realistic detective and a cliche detective
Use various detective-related terms and phrases
Describe realistic crime scenes and clues
Employ the legal side of any detective story
Devise the skills your detective needs
Understand the police ranking system
Make your detective likeable and investing
Use the elements that make detective fiction great
AND many tips along the way!
Welcome to Writing Detective Stories for Beginner Writers! It's a course that will provide you with constant professional guidance and help you create the detective story you've always dreamed of!
"Writing is a powerful form of art, but it is the reader's imagination that is the canvas, not the page."
target_audience: Writers
Writing Students
Beginner Writers

courses.title: CURSO de restauración de muebles BÁSICO- 1º parte
courses.bio: 1 er curso de RESTAURACIÓN DE MUEBLES,la base del oficio. ANTIQUE RESTORATION ,carpintería-ebanistería-restauración
objectives: Estarás listo para empezar a trabajar en tu taller y pasar de la teoría a la práctica
Te añado también una LISTA DE PRODUCTOS Y LA BIBLIOGRAFÍA que te puedes descargar

Introducción: Presentación, Curso de iniciación a la restauración del mueble
Las ceras. Preparación y aplicación, primera parte
Las ceras. Preparación y aplicación, segunda parte
La goma laca presentación y preparación
Restauración de una silla moderna 1ª parte
Restauración de una silla moderna 2ª parte
Restauración de una silla de caoba

requirements: En este curso de iniciación a la restauración de muebles no se requieren conocimientos previos, iras aprendiendo paso a paso con poco material
courses.description:
En este curso de RESTAURACIÓN DE MUEBLES 1º parte,(Furniture restoration) vas a aprender   las bases del oficio,  porque quieres saber más sobre el mueble antiguo, porque te interesa todo lo relacionado con este bonito oficio, porque has empezado una vez solo a trabajar en tu taller y no sabes cómo seguir pero tienes ganas de saber más o bien porque quieres ser un futuro profesional.
Mi objetivo es claro, enseñarte los pasos a seguir para desarrollar tu proyecto y que vayas asimilando la teoría y la práctica del oficio.
Vas a ver  cuales son las técnicas y productos  básicos y cómo prepararlos,  verás cómo empezar a restaurar la madera .
También te ayudaré a montar de manera profesional tu taller si tal es tu deseo.


Te voy a dar  ya varios ejercicios fundamentales del restaurador conservador de muebles.
Te añado también  una bibliografía sobre algunos libros que puedes comprar o consultar en bibliotecas o por internet y que son interesantes sobre el oficio, así podrás  acompañar las clases y entender mejor el oficio.

Te aconsejo dedicar unas 3 horas semanales como mínimo para aprender poco a poco cómo se trabaja con los productos y técnicas y empezar a disfrutar del trabajo de restauración.
Aquí te presento este primer curso  para que vayas  conociendo los primeros pasos a seguir. Por supuesto que hay materia para años si quieres, depende mucho del tiempo que puedas dedicar a ello. Por eso, iré presentando varios trabajos diferentes y en distintos cursos así podrás ir aprendiendo a tu ritmo  lo que más te guste.  por ejemplo:  cómo restaurar sillas, cómo restaurar muebles pintados, como barnizar a muñequilla con goma laca, como reciclar y patinar muebles, como restaurar y pintar ventanas antiguas de madera, etc
También es bueno recordar que un restaurador de muebles tiene que saber afilar sus herramientas, saber trabajar la madera, por éso, puedes ver mis distintos cursos de CARPINTERÍA , EBANISTERÍA  y MARQUETERÍA que son de gran ayuda para el restaurador.
Algunos de los cursos que tengo actualmente:
-CARPINTERÍA Y EBANISTERÍA BÁSICO
- FABRICA TU BANCO DE CARPINTERO, con plano técnico y despiece de madera incluido descargable.
- REALIZA TU PRIMER MUEBLE, una caja con colas de milano con plano técnico y despiece de madera incluido descargable.
-  COMO ENCOLAR LOS MUEBLES, técnicas y consejos.
- LOS ENSAMBLES del carpintero -ebanista
- LA MARQUETERÍA  BÁSICA
- FABRICA TU CAJA DE HERRAMIENTAS con colas de milano con plano técnico y despiece de madera incluido descargable.
- LA CARPINTERÍA DE ARMAR, APRENDE A FABRICAR UNA CASA DE MADERA,con plano técnico y despiece de madera incluido descargable.
- LA RESTAURACIÓN DE MUEBLE BÁSICO
- RESTAURACIÓN DE MUEBLES, 2º PARTE
- EL BARNIZADO A MUÑEQUILLA CON GOMA LACA
-DISEÑO Y FABRICACIÓN DE JUGUETES DE MADERA


Espero que disfrutes de la madera como yo  lo sigo haciendo desde más de 35 años.
Un saludo. Jean Baptiste Van den Heede, ebanista.
target_audience: toda persona interesada en  restaurar muebles,  irás disfrutando del curso de cada video para aplicar estas técnicas y productos en el mueble

Es el ejemplo perfecto de los muebles que se pueden restaurar de la segunda mitad del siglo XX por sus diseños, productos y acabados.

courses.title: 아이디어가 필요하다면? 잠 자고 있는 머리와 숨어있는 Idea를 일깨워라!
courses.bio: 창조적 변화를 만드는 힘을 기르는 마이크로 러닝 패키지
objectives: 혁신적인 아이디어를 생각해낼 수 있습니다.
아이디어를 발전시키는 방법을 알고 실천합니다.
아이디어를 실행으로 옮길 수 있습니다.
우리 회사에 맞는 경영 기법을 고르는 방법을 알고 적용합니다.

창조적 변화를 만드는 힘을 기르는 마이크로 러닝 패키지: 매번 고꾸라지는 혁신 아이디어, 두 가지 장애물을 뛰어 넘어라!
실패는 성공의 어머니? 성공할 실패는 따로 있다!
당신은 아이디어를 살리는 리더인가? 죽이는 리더인가?
반짝이는 아이디어? 회의실이 아니라 놀이터에서 찾아라!
직원들이 쓸만한 신제품 아이디어를 내놓지 못한다? ‘스캠퍼(SCAMPER)’를 활용하라!
디즈니는 세 개의 방에서 창조가 일어난다!
남들 다하는 그 좋다는 6시그마, 왜 우리 회사에서는 안 먹힐까?
이래도 문제, 저래도 문제 딜레마를 한 방에 해결하는 공식은 없을까?
아무리 노력해도 점점 더 꼬이는 문제들, 한방에 해결하는 방법이 있다!

requirements: 참신한 아이디어에 대해 고민하는 누구나 수강할 수 있습니다.
courses.description:
이 강의는 '아이디어가 필요하다면? 잠 자고 있는 머리와 숨어있는 Idea를 일깨워라!'입니다.
창조적 변화를 만드는 힘을 기르는 마이크로 러닝 패키지로 아래의 내용을 배우고, 실천해보세요!


강의1: 아무리 좋은 아이디어라도 실제로 실행까지 이어지기란 참 어려운데요. 자꾸만 고꾸라지고 사라지는 혁신 아이디어 때문에 고민인 분들께 추천합니다.
강의2: ‘실패해도 좋다. 도전하라!’고 했더니, 돈만 쓰고 프로젝트 성공률은 자꾸 떨어진다고요? 천방지축 도전만 해대는 우리 직원들. 어떻게 해야 할 지 고민하시는 분들께 추천합니다.
강의3: 왜 우리 직원들은 회의 때마다 꿀 먹은 벙어리가 될까요? 게다가 아이디어를 내더라도 기대에 못 미치는 경우가 많습니다. 우리 직원들이 참신한 아이디어를 술술 쏟아내게 하는 방법 없을까요?
강의4: 창조적 기업이 되는 것, 모두의 꿈이죠. 그런데 내로라 하는 세계적인 석학들이 강조하는 ‘창조’의 필수요소 중 하나가 참 황당합니다. 바로 ‘장난치고 놀라’는 건데요. 이게 무슨 말일까요?
강의5: 열심히 브레인스토밍을 해도 영 신통찮은 아이디어만 쏟아진다면? 이제 머리로만 고민해서는 부족합니다. 온 몸을 쓰는 바디스토밍이 필요한데요. 어떻게 하는 것일까요?
강의6: 혹시 여러분도 팀원들과 하루 종일 머리를 싸매고 신제품 개발 회의를 하지만 아무런 소득이 없나요? 그럴싸한 신제품 아이디어 하나 내놓지 못하는 직원들에 둘러싸여 고민이라면, 이 영상을 보세요!
강의7: 직원들의 숨은 아이디어, 열심히 끌어내도 결과물로 완성시키기까지가 쉽지 않습니다. ‘아이디어는 많은데 어떻게 발전시킬 지를 고민하시는 분’께 추천합니다!
강의8: 다들 좋다고 말하는 경영 기법, 왜 우리 회사에서는 잘 안될까요? 그 기법이 우리 회사의 조직 문화와 잘 안 맞기 때문입니다. 우리 회사에 꼭 맞는 경영 기법을 고르는 비법을 알아봅니다.
강의9: 경영을 하며 겪게 되는 딜레마 상황을 창의적으로 해결할 수 있는 마법과 같은 기법이 있다고 합니다. 대체 어떤 것일까요?
강의10: 아무리 애를 써도 해결되지 않는 문제로 골머리를 썩고 계신가요? 문제의 미로 속에서 빠져 나오고 싶은 분들께 TOC 기법을 추천합니다!
target_audience: 혁신적인 아이디어를 생각해내고 싶은 모두
아이디어를 발전시켜 실행에 옮기고 싶은 모두

courses.title: Cum să Construieşti de la Zero un eBook Care Vinde
courses.bio: Învaţă cum să construieşti de la zero un eBook după o structură care vinde. Începe să îţi monetizezi pasiunea!
objectives: Cum să creezi de la zero un eBook profesionist
Cum să monetizezi fiecare eBook pe care îl creezi
De ce să faci un eBook în jurul pasiunii tale
Cum să îţi găseşti nişa potrivită pentru tine
Cum să îţi creezi singur propria copertă profesionită, GRATUIT
Cum să obții o sursă de venit pasiv
Cum să îţi foloseşti experienţa personală pentru a crea un eBook
Importanţa urmăririi unei structuri clare

Primii paşi: De ce să scrii un ebook?
Importanţa creării ebook-ului în jurul pasiunii tale
Găsirea unei nişe perfecte pentru tine

Monetizare: Cum să faci bani din eBook-ul tău

requirements: Acces la internet
Cunoştinţe de bază în Microsoft Word, aici îţi vei scrie eBook-ul.

Vei avea nevoie de o idee pe care să o transformi într-un eBook de succes

NU sunt necesare materiale
courses.description:
Vrei să obții o sursă de venit pasiv?
Vrei să afli cum să îţi creezi un eBook în jurul pasiunii tale?
Vrei să îţi foloseşti experienţa personală pentru a crea un eBook care vinde?
Vrei să creezi de la zero un eBook profesionist pe baza unei structuri simple?
Nu ştii dacă domeniul în care ai experienţă este unul potrivit pentru o carte electronică?


Sau poate îţi doreşti de ceva vreme să pui toată experienţa ta într-o carte electronică, pe care să o monetizezi în cele din urmă. Adevărul este că nimic din toate cele de mai sus nu sunt greu de obţinut. Fie că ai sau nu experienţă, nu va conta deloc. În acest curs te voi învăţa de la zero cum să îţi transformi pasiunea într-o carte electronică, pe care să o vinzi după bunul plac. Chiar dacă nu ai o comunitate care să te susţină, îţi voi arăta simplu şi eficient, cum poţi să vinzi chiar din prima zi prin intermediul platformelor online, Gumroad, Smashwords etc...
Dacă ai răspuns „Da” la oricare dintre cele de mai sus, ar trebui să te opreşti aici. Acesta este cursul potrivit pentru tine!


Acest curs este ușor de înțeles fiind conceput în format video explicativ pentru a transmite pe înţelesul tuturor structura unui eBook care vinde, într-un mod care face totul clar și simplu. Vei primi explicații detaliate la fiecare lectie, recomandări dar şi indicaţii care îţi vor aduce un avantaj atunci când vei scrie primul tău eBook. Cursul începe prin conturarea structurii eBook-ului tău, stabilind clar detaliile necesare pentru a-ţi transforma ideea într-o carte electronică de succes.
Dacă până acum aveai doar o idee sau o pasiune în minte, prin intermediul acestui curs vei putea trece la acţiune!
Nu te mai gândi, înscrie-te astăzi și construieşte-ţi primul tău eBook de succes!


Acest curs este cel mai bun mod de a începe învățarea şi crearea propriei cărţi electronice, construit în jurul pasiunii tale.
Nu continua să te întrebi „ce s-ar fi întâmplat dacă aș fi făcut-o”. Nu vei fi dezamăgit, în plus vei obține o garanție necondiționată de 30 de zile pentru returnarea banilor. Ce ai de pierdut?


Vei primi:
Acces pe viață la curs
Accesarea cursului de pe orice dispozitiv online
Asistență rapidă și utilă în secțiunea Întrebări și Răspunsuri
Garanție de rambursare a banilor în 30 de zile!


Nu te mai gândi, înscrie-te astăzi și construieşte-ţi un eBook de succes!

Oricine dorește să învețe de la zero cum să creeze un eBook care vinde

courses.description:
Welcome to the Summer Vibes Nail Art Course!
Ready to create stunning summer nail art designs that your clients (and followers) will absolutely love? This course is all about bringing those bright, bold, and beachy vibes to life — with easy-to-follow tutorials and practical techniques you can start using straight away.
In Summer Vibes Nail Art, you’ll learn a range of designs inspired by sunshine, holidays, tropical colour palettes, and playful seasonal styles. Whether you're a beginner nail tech looking to expand your creativity, or a more experienced artist wanting to refresh your portfolio, this course is packed with fun and fresh inspiration.
You’ll explore designs using gel polish, glitters, fine liners, dotting tools, and more — all taught in a relaxed, step-by-step style that’s easy to follow, even if you’re just starting out. By the end of the course, you’ll feel more confident creating on-trend summer nail art that stands out both in the salon and online.
All you need is your love for nails and a few basic tools — I’ll guide you through the rest! Plus, you’ll get lifetime access and a certificate of completion at the end.
Let’s get those nails glowing with sunshine — I can’t wait to create with you!

AND DRAW YOUR OWN SIGILRY AND MORE DELIBERATELY MANIFEST YOUR DESIRED OUTCOMES


Also…
How often have you wondered just why it is that change and progress in individuals and society takes so long?
And…

And…
How many times have you wished there was some fast-track methodology to influence, steer and power you up to move in your own desired directions and appreciate those facets of life that already are in manifestation for you?

You already know that don’t you?
That’s why you’re here, isn’t it?
To learn the sharp magickal art of being able to write and draw dashes, squiggles, lines, dots, scrawl, blobs, bubbles, sticks, glyphs, sigils, light languages and asemic writings that you can use for your own personal programming, change and alter and use for other sacred or mundane purposes or for other peoples’ purposes later… or just abstract for art’s sake…

Opens in asking what a sigil is
Draws attention to the plethora of things we are actually influenced by and at what cost to us as individuals.


In doing so it asks us to look at how we as individuals can therefore gain back some of our personal power...
in asking WHY SIGILS


It gives the written, video and spoken instructions needed to create a sigil of your own in...
Outlining AND DEMONSTRATING a classical way to create a sigil
Gives a full video of a sigil being created... and of the encouragement it takes to teach this methodology.


and after a recap I answer why it is that... in this information age of AI, I use my own handwriting for much of this presentation;
being partly that it's a rare grimoire that isn't actually hand written and produced..!


ANY AI APP CAN BE PROGRAMMED TO SAY ANYTHING... SUPPORT ANY MYTH AS A REALITIY... PASS ANYTHING OFF AS REALLY TRUE... OR EVEN TO DO ANYTHING
and most are so enthralled by AI's speed and beauty that they have completely overlooked that it isn't answerable to any higher authority and has zero morality.


BUT A SIGIL CAN ONLY BE PROPERLY DRAWN, WRITTEN AND CONSECRATED BY A HUMAN WIZARD WHO HAS THE AWARENESS, SENSITIVITY AND LOVE TO LOVE AND RESPECT A BEAUTIFUL ART LIKE SIGIL HEALING.


Human asemic writings, sigils and light language contains those years of growth, learning, emotions within that wizard and the sensitivities contained in those particular writings and drawings.


This course gives you
MOTIVATIONAL ENTRAINMENT
In encouraging you to SIEZE THE MOMENT... keep going... demonstrate your adherence to your own goals and principles no matter how hard things may seen during any time period or circumstances in your life.


Shares some stories even from my own life in demonstration of DEALING WITH THAT DEVIL IN THE DETAILS that happens to all of us when we think we're on that home run or making good progress...
in what seems like informal language and effortless fun scribbling... while it is actually backed by my own studies into a list of art as long as your arm (NLP, Huna, Art Therapy, White magick and a host of others


CLEARINGS AND INSPIRATIONS
that when you let flow... even in a novel subject, most of your reality gets aligned somehow into that mindset.
How in just talking about your subject you overcome blocks including writers block and stage fright.

W E L C O M E    AND    B L E S S I N G S

Yazına getirdiği yeni soluk ile geniş okur kitlesine ulaşmış, yazdığı romanlar ve öykülerle ülkemizin sevilen yazarlarından Hakan Bıçakcı'dan öykü ve yazmaya ilişkin teorik, pratik ve uygulanabir bilgiler,

içeren atölye, katılımcıların kendi kurmaca metinlerini yazarken yaratıcılıklarını daha iyi ortaya koyabilmelerini sağlamak ve içgörü kazanmalarına yardımcı olmak için OT Dergi inisiyatifiyle hazırlanmıştır.

courses.description:
¿Siempre has querido escribir una novela pero no sabes cómo empezar? ¿Acabas estancándote? ¡Este curso es para ti!
En 20 lecciones dinámicas y divertidas aprenderás todo lo necesario para escribir y publicar un libro, desde el proceso creativo hasta la fase de corrección. Todo ilustrado de forma amena, con ejemplos constantes y consejos de grandes escritores que podrás aplicar no solo para tu novela, sino para toda clase de historias que idees en el futuro.
Estos son los contenidos del curso, que esconden más de una sorpresa:
SECCIÓN 1: Preparación a la escritura
0. Bienvenida.
1. Conciencia personal. La motivación.
2. Conciencia artística. El tema.
3. Adoptar el hábito: Escritura automática y otros ejercicios.
4. El viaje del héroe.
5. Los arquetipos.


SECCIÓN 2: Tu libro es único
6. Encontrar tu historia a partir del tema.
7. Elegir el género.
8. Crear el universo.
9. Consejos y advertencias de grandes escritores.
10. Ordenar el escritorio: El primer esquema.
11. La importancia del punto de vista.
12. La creación de personajes.
13. El primer capítulo.


SECCIÓN 3: El borrador y las editoriales
14. El bloqueo y la frustración.
15. El primer borrador de la novela y la corrección.
16. Registro.
17. Vender tu libro a una editorial.
18. Autopublicar.
19. Despedida.


Me llamo Ignasi Muñoz y soy escritor. Hasta el momento he escrito 4 libros, una novela gráfica, más de 40 obras de teatro y cortometrajes y casi 200 críticas o artículos sobre cine y literatura. ¡No esperes más y empieza a escribir conmigo!

objectives: Les bases de la poterie

requirements: Avoir l'envie d'expérimenter
courses.description:
Apprenez à travailler l’argile et créez vos propres céramiques uniques
Vous rêvez de mettre les mains dans la terre et de façonner des objets de vos propres mains ? Cette formation en poterie pour débutants est le point de départ idéal pour découvrir le travail de l’argile et les secrets de la céramique artisanale.
Ce cours complet vous guide pas à pas à travers les fondamentaux de la poterie : découverte des types d’argiles (terre de potier, grès, faïence, porcelaine), préparation de la terre, maîtrise des gestes de base et apprentissage des principales techniques : modelage, tournage, estampage, coulage et émaillage. Chaque module est accompagné d'exercices pratiques pour progresser rapidement, développer votre sens du toucher et apprivoiser la matière.
Au fil de la formation, vous apprendrez à concevoir des objets en argile de A à Z : bols, tasses, vases, sculptures décoratives... Vous comprendrez comment adapter chaque technique à votre projet personnel. Vous découvrirez également l’univers fascinant de la cuisson, et les différentes finitions possibles : émail brillant, mat, engobe, terres sigillées…
Que vous choisissiez une argile blanche, noire ou ocre, chaque création passée au four devient une pièce de céramiqueunique. Ce cours vous offre les clés pour transformer la terre brute en œuvres pleines de caractère.
Accessible à tous, sans prérequis, cette formation est une invitation à ralentir, à créer, à vous reconnecter à l’essentiel. Donnez forme à votre imagination, entrez dans l’univers poétique et sensoriel de la poterie artisanale.
target_audience: Débutants
Et pour revoir les bases

le persone che si rivolgono a me hanno una sola esigenza ed è quella di imparare il mio compito e  quello di insegnarti le regole i tempi di azione della tecnica i trucchi ed i rimedi ad eventuali errori
courses.description:
IL CORSO DI ACQUERELLO
Con questo corso imparerete a scoprire la tecnica dell'acquerello, e attraverso l’esercizio migliorerete le vostre abilità pittoriche. Nelle lezioni si dipingeranno diversi soggetti, con un diverso approccio tra di loro questo vi permetterà di approfondire la tecnica dell’acquerello. Imparerete a combinare i colori, a creare l'effetto della sfumatura l’effetto bagnato su bagnato apprenderete il modo giusto per dipingere con questa magnifica tecnica.
PROGRAMMA
Introduzione all'uso dei materiali. I colori ad acquerello si distinguono fra quelli studio, fini, ed extrafini. Gli extrafini vengono realizzati utilizzando i pigmenti più puri e si distinguono per la loro brillantezza, permanenza e la particolare trasparenza. Quelli studio sono adatti per chi vuole approcciarsi per la prima volta a questa tecnica, gli acquerelli fini sono gia di ottima qualità e sono adatti sia per il principiante che per il professionista. Gli acquarelli tradizionali si presentano di solito in tubetti o in pastiglie. Nella tecnica della pittura ad acquerello è molto importante utilizzare una carta che contenga cotone. La carta migliore è quella in puro cotone 100%, essendo priva di acidi consente una lunga conservazione e inalterabilità nel tempo, e non si deforma quando viene bagnata.Il peso della carta deve essere minimo 250 gm ottimale sarebbe 300 gm. Anche i pennelli hanno un’importanza notevole nella stesura del colore. Per chi inizia a dipingere esistono pennelli in fibra sintetica, morbidi ed elastici, con varie forme dalla tonda, fischietto, mandorla, ventaglio, ad un prezzo più contenuto rispetto a quelli più professionali in pura martora o in vajo. Questi ultimi si differenziano oltre che per il prezzo, per la loro elasticità, infatti riprendono la loro forma rapidamente, inoltre il colore fluisce in modo continuo e regolare dalla punta in modo da consentire una stesura uniforme del colore. Primi soggetti per prendere confidenza con la pittura come fiori e oggetti di uso quotidiano. Soggetti più completi ad esempio scenari e paesaggi naturali e il ritratto Durante questo Corso scopriremo come utilizzare i colori ad acquerello, come aumentare brillantezza e trasparenza dei colori, come dare un aspetto irregolare e una texture a colori di solito uniformi, come dare un effetto perlaceo ai colori, come proteggere le zone della carta in cui il colore non deve essere applicato.
REQUISITI
Il corso è rivolto a tutti coloro che desiderano imparare la tecnica pittorica dell’acquerello, anche senza esperienza.
target_audience: persone che desiderano imparare questa tecnica in modo semplice e con un professionista che li guidi ne loro percorso

courses.title: Caminhada do Escritor
courses.bio: Curso básico para formar escritores
objectives: Conhecer os sete pilares essenciais da escrita literária.
Desenvolver e aplicar técnicas de melhoria da escrita.
Praticar e aperfeiçoar a escrita criativa.
Percorrer o caminho necessário para se tornar uma escritora ou escritor.

Segundo Pilar - Diálogos: Aula 4 - Entrevista com Eduardo Brindizi Simões Silveira
Quarto Pilar - Personagens: Aula 11 - Entrevista com Ana Lúcia Merege
Sétimo Pilar - Aprimoramento: Aula 17 - Entrevista com Osvaldo Meza Siqueira

requirements: Conhecer gramática da língua portuguesa.
Ter boa ortografia.
Estar disposto a exercitar e aplicar as práticas ensinadas.
Este curso não pretende ensinar gramática e ortografia. Foca-se nas técnicas de desenvolvimento e aprimoramento da construção narrativa.
courses.description:
Não basta saber escrever bem e ser um ávido leitor para ser um(a) escritor(a) competente. Uma boa ortografia e uma gramática consistente são essenciais, mas não bastam para tornar uma história envolvente e cativante. Escrever exige técnicas que podem ser aprendidas e praticadas. É uma caminhada constante, assim como em qualquer fazer artístico, sempre aprimorando e evoluindo.
Sou formado em Letras com especialização em Leitura e Produção Textual. Neste curso vou muito além do que aprendi na faculdade. Eu apresento o método PANCADA, que se constitui de sete pilares para produção de um texto de qualidade: personagens, argumento, narrador, cenários, aprimoramento, diálogos e aplicação.
São nove módulos com vinte e uma aulas, perfazendo um total de quatro horas de vídeo. Junto com uma dedicação de pelo menos seis horas de exercícios e práticas por aula, você será capaz de trilhar o caminho para se tornar escritor(a) no seu próprio ritmo.
As aulas foram planejadas para serem dinâmicas e objetivas, sem enrolação. Vou direto ao ponto para que você não perca tempo. O curso conta também com três entrevistas de escritores já publicados que enriquecem muito o conteúdo mostrando como essas pessoas aplicaram em suas próprias produções literárias algumas práticas que são ensinadas neste curso.
O curso conta com propostas de exercícios de autoavaliação. Você mesmo(a) poderá aplicar os conhecimentos adquiridos aqui para fixar as técnicas e perceber sua evolução nesta bela arte literária. Sugiro pegar papel e caneta e acompanhar as aulas tomando notas de tudo que achar importante.
target_audience: Este curso é para quem quer ou precisa desenvolver a habilidade de contar histórias cativantes e envolventes.
É um curso útil para quem quer ser escritor(a) ou para quem usa a criação de histórias por necessidade profissional.
O curso atende necessidades de escritores, roteiristas, publicitários, redatores, bloggers, entre outros que precisam trabalhar com a produção de histórias e narrativas.

A prática da escrita desenvolve a observação, a eloquência, a clareza e a objetividade. Tudo isso pode ser útil a qualquer profissional, do médico ao pecuarista, do professor ao advogado, do caminhoneiro ao vendedor. Uma boa comunicação ajuda em qualquer profissão.
