courses.title: Find Time for NaNoWriMo
courses.bio: Write a novel in 30 days - or have fun trying.
requirements: Interest in NaNoWriMo
Interest in writing a novel over 30 days
The ability to write fluently
courses.description: Every year, thousands of people 'win' NaNoWriMo. In other words, they manage to write 50,000 words in 30 days during the month of November. What's their secret? How do they write a book so quickly? Are they crazy? The answers to those questions are: you're about to find out, they break it into small steps, and yes, possibly. If you'd like a guide to winning at NaNoWriMo, from a published novelist, you're in the right place. I've deliberately kept this course short because if you're doing NaNoWriMo, you'll want to get going as quickly as possible. Please note, this course is unofficial and not affiliated to NaNoWriMo. Want to find the time for NaNoWriMo? I'll see you inside the course.
target_audience: Anyone wanting to take part in National Novel Writing Month

courses.title: Creative Writing - Writer's Block Workbook Volume 2 Month 1
courses.bio: Five weeks' worth of keywords to create 100+ new pieces with tips to help your writing ongoing. Plus bonus content.
requirements: You will need just a blank document and / or pad of paper (and pen / pencil)
You can pause the videos at any time so don't worry if you need more time.
courses.description:
As inspiration more than instruction, these video lectures provide over 100 sets of keywords to aid the fiction writer to create new stories, three daily for five weeks. At the end of each week, there is a related writing tip with other guidance along the way.
Explained in clear, simple language with audio, together with the words on the screen, the videos can be paused at any time. The slides are available to download along with other support materials.
Structured over nine lectures (of between two and five minutes' duration), we start with an introduction, week-by-week prompts and tips, , with a conclusion, and bonus content (the full volume - 52 weeks' worth - in pdf form).
Suitable for writers of any age and experience who might be struggling to get new ideas. It is aimed mainly at fiction writers but can help non-fiction writers struggling with ideas.
target_audience: These videos are aimed at anyone who struggles getting ideas
Aimed at writers of fiction predominantly but there are tips that can help non-fiction writers
For anyone wishing to improve their writing techniques

courses.title: Cómo vencer el bloqueo creativo: 20 técnicas para el ingenio
courses.bio: Atrévete a escribir de nuevo. Transforma el bloqueo en oportunidad.
objectives: Perder el miedo ante el bloqueo creativo.
Generar ideas frescas y originales.
Escribir de manera relajada.
Hacer de la escritura una actividad amena.
Desarrollar una mentalidad creadora.

Explorando el bloqueo creativo: Consejos para vencer el bloqueo creativo
Venciendo el bloqueo creativo: Técnicas para vencer el bloqueo creativo

requirements: No necesitas títulos ni experiencia previa, tampoco una gran biblioteca. Este curso está hecho para almas despiertas. Basta un lápiz y un papel o una computadora, lo que prefieras. Vamos a escribir con libertad.
courses.description:
¿Alguna vez te has sentido bloqueado frente a la hoja en blanco?
Yo también. Por eso sé que el bloqueo creativo no es un enemigo: es parte del viaje del escritor. Puede ser una pausa fértil, una invitación a mirar más profundo, a reconectar contigo.
En este curso te enseñaré técnicas, herramientas y dinámicas diseñadas para activar tu pensamiento, desatar el flujo de ideas y potenciar tu creatividad. También es ideal si estás dando tus primeros pasos en la escritura: las actividades están pensadas para motivarte y despertar tu ingenio, incluso si aún no sabes por dónde empezar.
Te explicaré cada paso con detalle, con fundamentos teóricos y ejemplos prácticos. Todos los textos son de mi autoría, creados con honestidad y cuidado para acompañarte desde mi experiencia como escritora y mentora. Recibirás material descargable para que puedas seguir practicando y aplicando lo aprendido después de finalizar las clases.
También exploraremos elementos esenciales de la poesía como la métrica, la rima y los recursos literarios. Estos contenidos no solo enriquecerán tu escritura, te ayudarán a comprender cómo funciona el lenguaje poético desde su estructura interna.
Al finalizar el curso, sabrás cómo atravesar el bloqueo con confianza, libertad y originalidad. Aprenderás a transformar tus ideas en obras auténticas, sin miedo.
Si deseas reconectar con tu voz creativa, escribir con autenticidad y transformar el bloqueo en una oportunidad de crecimiento, este curso es para ti.
Si tomaste mi curso Poesía, divino tesoro, sabes que adoro explicar, emocionar y emocionarte. Aquí sigo fiel a mi esencia: amando el poema.
¡Es hora de escribir sin límites!
¿Quieres un descuento en el curso? Escríbeme por redes y te enviaré el enlace y los detalles.
target_audience: Poetas, escritores, artistas y soñadores que sienten que su creatividad está suspendida.
Personas que aman la escritura pero no siempre encuentran el impulso para comenzar.
Docentes, estudiantes o profesionales que necesitan reconectar con el lenguaje como herramienta expresiva.
No importa tu nivel ni tu estilo. Importa tu deseo de reencontrarte con lo que te habita. Este curso es una mano extendida, un espacio íntimo, un refugio para volver a escribir sin miedo.

courses.title: Collaboration on Mechanical Product Design
courses.bio: You will be encouraged to think creatively and to share ideas, while having basic technical knowledge
requirements: Being willing to write short reflections
Being willing to share your idea
No experience required
courses.description:
Hi there ! The course promotional video is my self-introduction.


Designed to be similar to a university module, you will be able to
1. execute design thinking in an engineering discipline
2. understand the considerations for a mechanical product.
3. appreciate the dimensions for collaboration

This is my first time designing a course, using my background in Engineering and Education, so I hope that this inspires you to try new things and to get out of your comfort zone too. We are all here to learn. I appreciate the support and time which you are willing to spend on this course.


As explained in my introductory video, this course has been organised into 3 parts: Design, Product and Collaboration. Therefore, you have the flexibility to choose the parts which you want to spend time on. Either way, you will be able to finish your capstone project and share with me what you know. To "pass" the capstone project, there is a scoring rubric with my own feedback after you have made the final submission. By checking your work personally and giving you feedback, I hope to connect with you. Ultimately, all our ideas will be shared with one another in a document, which promotes the idea of collaboration.


Please give me feedback too!
target_audience: Anyone interested in being creative in an individual capstone project enclosed in this course

courses.title: Time Flies
courses.bio: How Time Flies When You're Having Fun.
objectives: Students will learn about how Time Flies about the universe in waves - a new Scientific Theory by this author
Students will learn how to manage their time more effectively and become the best version of themselves that they could ever achieve.
Students will learn about Time Waves - where they come from and where they're going. How to surf them for a more enjoyable and relevant and effective life.
Students will learn about how all the wave actions are connected and about the most powerful forces in the universe - how to exploit them for Good vs. Evil.
Students will learn how to save their planet, their species, and all other species of life.
Students will learn about the upcoming largest experiment in the history of Science- 5 million KM on a side, called LISA.

Time Flies: How To Join the S.W.A.T. Team

requirements: No experience for level of knowledge required for this course except the occasional exercise of one's brain.
courses.description:
Based upon forty to fifty years of unfettered scientific research - My new theory is that Time flows in waves all around the universe similar to gravity waves except that Time Waves have no limit to their propagation.
When my theory is confirmed by a new experiment being proposed right now by the European Space Agency, known as LISA (Laser Interferometer Space Antenna) in a few short years, the world will change in the most dramatic way ever thought possible, because for once and for all Time, we'll all know how to use time more efficiently.
Don't wait for the proof.  Take this exciting new information and go with it and see what happens in your life.  Without really trying - things may change drastically for the better.  If you find that it is due to your taking this course, I would appreciate that confirmation.
Just as Albert Einstein changed the world with his revolutionary perception of the relationship of mass and energy, this author will change the world with his revolutionary perception of Time to mass and energy.  As Einstein has proven Space/Time is warped, but he failed to notice that so is our current version of Time - also warped but in a different way.
In this course, you will learn not only where does Time go, but also where it comes from and you will learn how to surf the Time Waves simply by using your brain waves in a slightly different manner than you're used to.
The newly acquired information found here and ONLY HERE will allow you to manage your time on this Earth sufficient enough to accomplish anything the heart desires.
But, you need to get about your new life right now because there is not much more Time Left.
target_audience: This course if for anyone who is interested in major breakthroughs in knowledge and/or cutting edge scientific breakthroughs of our time.  However, the information found here is not based in any difficult scientific principles beyond an elementary school level and is mainly found in common sense perceptions of the world.

Example:  Have you ever watched the waves coming in from the ocean and falling on the shore and wondered how they were formed?   If so, you are the perfect candidate for this course.  We're looking for Time Wave surfers.

courses.title: Corso introduttivo di scrittura creativa.
courses.bio: Progettare e sviluppare una storia. Tecniche di scrittura.
objectives: Imparare a riconoscere le strutture della narrazione.
Utilizzare i modelli narrativi più importanti. Dal set up alla risoluzione finale.
Apprendere le strategie della narrazione. Movimenti, colpi di scena, punti di svolta.
Sapere descrivere ambientazioni e personaggi in modo dinamico e interessante.

La scrittura e le storie: Perchè scriviamo? Mettiamo a fuoco le motivazioni.
Che cosa sono le storie? Impariamo a riconoscere le strutture narrative.
Modelli di trama. Vediamoli più da vicino.
Progettare le storie. le strutture e gli: La strategia di Willy il Coyote.

requirements: È necessario avere passione per la narrativa e una certa dimestichezza con la scrittura.
courses.description:
Il Corso Introduttivo di Scrittura va considerato come il corso principe del programma di Content Cafè dedicato alle tecniche di progettazione e sviluppo di contenuti narrativi. Racconti, romanzi, progetti di storytelling sono l'obiettivo di questo percorso professionale risultato di più di 20 anni di lavoro e di attività da parte dell'autore e docente.
Il corso si divide in tre parti:
1 - Le motivazioni. Perché scriviamo, cosa sono e che significato hanno le storie;
2 - Le strutture. Cosa sono le strutture della narrazione, come utilizzarle e quali strategie impiegare per la realizzazione di una storia;
3 - Il sistema di personaggi. I principali schemi di relazione tra i caratteri della storia. Ambientazione e tipo di caratterizzazione narrativa.


Un percorso di 21 video con sessioni teoriche, approfondimenti tecnici ed esercitazioni per progettare e sviluppare il proprio romanzo e la propria storia. Il corso non si conclude con i video pubblicati, ma è un progetto in divenire che sarà costantemente aggiornato in modo da offrire informazioni e strumenti sempre più mirati e utili.
Per qualsiasi esigenza o, magari, se si ritiene di voler conoscere in modo più dettagliato un argomento, è possibile scrivere al docente. Le richieste dei partecipanti sono il modo migliore per arricchire e migliorare questo progetto.
target_audience: Aspiranti scrittori, autori, storyteller, progettisti di contenuti e content creator.

courses.title: [SERTIFIKASI] Certified Book and Paper Authorship (CBPA).
courses.bio: How To Write A Book?
objectives: Cara Menjadi Seorang Penulis
Menyusun Ide menjadi Sebuah Buku
Menerbitkan Buku
Melakukan Self Publishing
requirements: Bisa Berbahasa Indonesia dengan Baik dan Lancar
Memiliki Kegemaran dalam dunia Kepenulisan
courses.description:
[Program Sertifikasi] Book And Paper Authorship (How to Write A Book?)


'Menulislah, maka Engkau akan Dikenal Dunia'
Sebuah kalimat sederhana yang membuat Saya bersemangat mengajak Anda menulis (khususnya menulis buku).


Menulis bukanlah hal yang sukar, tinggal bagaimana kita mengemas ide yang ada di pikiran menjadi sebuah karya yang bisa dinikmati oleh khalayak ramai.


Selama ini mungkin Anda mencoba menulis karya pertama anda namun menemui hal berikut :
1. Susah menemukan ide;
2. Memiliki ide namun sulit menuangkannya ke dalam bentuk tulisan;
3. Merasa perlu ikut pelatihan menulis namun tidak ada waktu;
4. Selalu berhenti ditengah jalan ketika menulis;
5. Tidak paham harus menerbitkan dimana;
Dalam kursus ini kita akan belajar mengenai cara menulis buku bahkan ketika Anda belum mempunyai ide mengenai buku yang akan ditulis.


[Kursus Sertifikasi] Kursus ini memiliki lisensi sertifikasi dari PT Cendekia Edukasi Nusantara dimana setelah menyelesaikan Kursus dan mengerjakan Tugas Sertifikasi, Anda berhak untuk mendapat gelar non akademik CBPA™ (Certified Book and Paper Authorship) yang sudah terdaftar resmi di Indonesia.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The majority of human interaction is carried out verbally or non-verbally, a great deal of communication requires us to write. Writing helps you to clear your mind, recover your memories, stockpile your ideas and will make you that you have accomplished something. Writing will also help you analyze things and look at them from a different point of view. Validate Your Writing Capabilities With a Certificate From IEEEL Institute™.


We would like to invite you to participate. It will be an exciting forum along this year. Please stay tune on our upcoming CBPA event or do not hesitate to contact us. Looking forward to your participation.


Fasilitas Program :
1. Sertifikat CBPA™ bagi yang menyelesaikan kursus dan mengumpulkan tugas
2. Vocer Diskon Penerbitan
3. Group Alumni (Telegram)
4. Kesempatan Menulis Buku Bersama Trainer


Tunggu apa lagi? Mari mempersiapkan diri dikenal oleh Dunia lewat tulisanmu!


#CourseKepenulisan
#SertifikasiPenulis
#MenulisItuMudah
target_audience: Mahasiswa
Penulis
PNS
Guru/Dosen
Siapapun yang Memiliki Kegemaran dalam Menulis

objectives: Como criar artes fantásticas com o E.V.A
Desenvolvimento de habilidade manual e coordenação motora
Desenvolvimento da criatividade através do artesanato
Desenvolvimento cognitivo a partir da prática de artes manuais
Desenvolvimento de atenção concentrada
Aprendizado de um hobbie ou fonte de renda

Aula 2 - Vídeo gravado de cada etapa legendado
Aula 3 - Vídeo gravado de cada etapa legendado (2)

requirements: Gostar de artes manuais
courses.description:
Este curso tem como objetivo ensinar conceitos e aplicações do e.v.a, (foamy), manuseio, técnicas de pintura, colagem, aquecimento, dicas, moldes, peças em todos os níveis de dificuldade e com vários tipos de acabamentos. Enfim, tudo que você precisa saber em um só lugar, esse é o primeiro, logo teremos os próximos. Esta coleção é só a primeira, esperamos que você faça todos e faça coisas lindas e criativas. A Manuartes e Cia tem como regra oferecer o melhor serviço para todos que queiram saber mais sobre artesanato e criatividade.


O artesanato além de ser um hobby, é uma arteterapia que ajuda pessoas a se recuperarem de doenças através dao exercício da criatividade. Poder ser um novo ofício, você que quer arriscar uma nova profissão, obeter uma renda extra ou ainda aprender algo novo, esta é a sua oportunidade. Aqui explico tudo que você precisa saber saber sobre essa matéria prima incrível capaz de se transformar em infinitas peças e possibilidades.


O eva ganhou mercado principalmente nos últimos anos, devido a sua versatilidade e beleza. O desafio de criar peças personalizadas e utilitárias faz com que muitas pessoas sintam curiosidade com relação ao tema. Aproveite o fórum para tirar dúvidas, estou à disposição! Bons estudos!
target_audience: Pessoas que queiram aprender um hobbie

Profissionais que queiram ampliar suas competências e desenvolver criatividade
Pessoas que buscam uma ocupação auxiliar para combater o stress, depressão e outros
Iniciantes na arte do eva e praticantes

courses.title: Personal Writing Practice: Find your Writing Voice
courses.bio: How to Cultivate a Fulfilling Creative Practice | Introspective Process | More Ease and Play
objectives: More ease and confidence in your writing
Develop a writing practice that is fulfilling
Be more familiar with your internal landscape
Decondition perfectionism and performance mentality
Sustain writing practice over a long period of time

Warning Signs: Writing Exercise: Explore Possible Warning Signs
What do you do when Warning Signs pop up?
Relationship with the External World: How to Find more Ease + Authenticity
Navigating Creative Blocks: Journal: What are your Creative Blocks?

requirements: No writing prerequisites
Notebook
Journal
Laptop
courses.description:
This course is designed to support you if you're ready (re)discover your writing voice in an authentic and resonant way. I am your guide to creating a foundation for your writing practice that will support personal fulfillment and ease. You will learn techniques to get the ball rolling and cope with creative blocks. Most importantly, this course is hands-on, where you will be following writing and journaling prompts. By the end of the course, you will have a more confident writing voice and a fulfilling creative practice.
I offer one on one support! Please reach out to me directly to learn more.
- Tiffany


What to expect:
Lectures about your writing voice/tone, setting a strong foundation for creative ease, moving through creative blocks, and cultivating more play
Hands on writing exercises
Guide to having a writing journal to log the internal journey of writing
This is for folks who:
Have a desire to write authentically with ease
Are ready to engage with their writing that fulfills them personally
Want to decondition from perfectionism and performance mentality
By the end of the course, you will have:
A deeper connection with yourself and your creativity
Ease with your the goal of creativity for your personal fulfillment
More compassion for yourself
A collection of writing that is reflective, honest, and playful
A strong foundation to continue your writing practice
Sustained longevity of your creative practice


Prerequisites:
None! Whether you have an established writing practice or haven’t written in decades, this course will guide you in sparking your creativity.


Note:
While this class is only 2.5 hours long, this does not account for the time you will be practicing the Writing Exercises and Journaling sessions, which is would take around 30 mins each. With that added time, it is an additional 7.5 hours. On top of that, you will be starting your own Writing Practice at your own cadence that I will guide you through in designing. The lectures are in bite size pieces, but the real and rewarding work happens on your own.
target_audience: Writers of any level
Folks who have a desire to write with ease and fulfillment
Ready to engage with the internal landscape
Fed up with using their creativity for other people

courses.title: Acrylic Painting with Shanells Art: Beach Blend
courses.bio: Landscape painting
objectives: Acrylic paint mixing
Color Theory focusing on color harmony
Mixing techniques
Creating a painting / Step-by-step paint tutorial
New painting vocabulary

Acrylic Painting Lectures: Creating Specific Colors: Sky Blue and Beach Sand

requirements: No experience needed
courses.description:
Get ready to dive into the world of acrylic painting with my Beach Themed Acrylic Painting Online Course! This course is designed for beginners and intermediate-level artists who want to learn how to paint a stunning beach scene using acrylic paints.


In this course, you will learn the basics of color theory and mixing, and how to create beautiful beach-themed paintings with acrylic paints. You'll be introduced to different techniques for mixing colors and blending them on the canvas to create ocean water, sand, and clear blue sky.


One of the main focuses of this course is on color mixing. You will learn how to create a several beach-inspired color palettes, including shades of blue and green for the ocean, warm yellows and oranges for the sand, and a soft blue sky. You'll also learn how to use these colors to create depth and dimension in your paintings.


As a bonus tutorial, you will also learn how to create a unique beach-themed painting.


By the end of this course, you will have the skills and knowledge to create a stunning beach-themed painting using acrylic paints, and you'll be able to use your new techniques to create other types of paintings as well.


Enroll now and get ready to create your own simple yet beautiful beach-themed acrylic paintings!
target_audience: This course is for you if you would like to learn a little about color theory with a focus on color harmony
If you are interested in mixing paint colors semlessly
If you would like to paint your own beach scenery

courses.title: Belajar Menulis Novel
courses.bio: Tulis Novelmu, Inspirasi Dunia
objectives: peserta bisa belajar menulis novel
requirements: bisa membaca dan menulis
courses.description:
yuk belajar menulis novel bersama dian nafi
dian nafi sudah menulis puluhan novel di belasan penerbit di Indonesia
Apakah Anda pernah bermimpi untuk mengeksplorasi dunia imajinasi Anda sendiri dan menghidupkan karakter-karakter yang tak terlupakan? Jika ya, maka kelas novel kami adalah tempat yang tepat untuk memulai perjalanan menulis Anda!


Apa yang Akan Anda Pelajari:
Pengembangan Karakter yang Memukau: Pelajari rahasia menciptakan karakter yang kuat dan mendalam, membuat mereka hidup di halaman-halaman novel Anda.
Pemetaan Plot yang Memikat: Temukan teknik-teknik untuk merancang plot yang menggoda pembaca, penuh dengan kejutan dan emosi.
Penulisan Dialog yang Autentik: Kuasai seni menulis dialog yang realistis dan berdaya tarik, membawa pembaca lebih dekat ke dalam cerita Anda.
Gaya Penulisan yang Unik: Temukan gaya penulisan Anda sendiri, ciptakan suara naratif yang mengidentifikasi Anda sebagai penulis yang orisinal.
Mengapa Bergabung dengan Kelas Ini:


Panduan Langkah-demi-Langkah: Dengan bimbingan langkah-demi-langkah dari instruktur berpengalaman, Anda akan diberikan pandangan mendalam ke dalam dunia menulis novel.
Umpan Balik Konstruktif: Dapatkan umpan balik langsung pada tulisan-tulisan Anda, membantu Anda tumbuh sebagai penulis.
Komunitas Kreatif: Bergabunglah dengan komunitas penulis yang bersemangat, berbagi ide, dan memberikan dukungan satu sama lain sepanjang perjalanan menulis Anda.
Berkembang sebagai Penulis: Tidak hanya sekedar kelas, ini adalah peluang untuk meresapi pengetahuan dan keterampilan yang akan membantu Anda berkembang sebagai seorang penulis yang berkualitas.
Siapkan Diri Anda untuk Membuat Sebuah Karya
target_audience: setiap orang yang mau menulis novel

courses.title: Short Story Writing 101
courses.bio: An Introduction to Crafting Compelling Short Stories
requirements: Anyone with a passion for storytelling and a desire to improve your writing skills, regardless of experience level.
courses.description:
Short Story Writing 101 is the perfect guide for anyone eager to write impactful, engaging short stories. Designed for writers of all experience levels, this course takes you step-by-step through the essential elements of writing compelling short stories. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to refine your technique, you’ll learn how to create complex characters, construct engaging plots, and build immersive settings - all while maintaining the brevity and focus required by short fiction.
Through practical advice, real-world examples, and exercises, this course provides an introduction of the skills necessary to craft stories that capture readers' attention and leave a lasting impact. You’ll discover how to write crisp, meaningful dialogue, use setting to enhance mood and theme, and weave your story’s elements together for maximum effect.
Perfect for aspiring writers and seasoned authors alike, Short Story Writing 101 offers clear, actionable tips to help you improve your storytelling craft. Whether your goal is publication, personal growth, or creative expression, this guide will provide you with the tools and confidence to write short stories that stand out. Unlock your storytelling potential and take your writing to the next level!
Thank you for choosing Short Story Writing 101. I can’t wait to see the incredible stories you create!
target_audience: Short Story Writing 101 is intended for aspiring writers of all levels who are passionate about fiction and want to improve their short story writing skills. Whether you're a beginner just starting your writing journey or an experienced writer seeking to refine your craft, this course is designed to provide practical guidance and creative inspiration. It is perfect for those looking to explore storytelling techniques, develop compelling characters, and craft concise, impactful narratives.

courses.title: From Stuck to Solution: TRIZ the Easy (and Fun) Way
courses.bio: Creative Problem Solving Video-Course From Stuck to Solution: TRIZ the Easy (and Fun) Way
objectives: Plan and structure your coursework or dissertation in any subject area using a systematic, TRIZ-based approach.
Apply tools and templates for critical thinking, innovation, and analytical decision-making.
Apply qualitative methods to simplify complex, non-linear systems with confidence.
Stop Fearing Problems. Start Seeing Opportunities.
Discover TRIZ Through Engaging Videos.
Facilitates cross-disciplinary thinking.
Uncover root causes and reveal hidden resources.

Introduction: What gets in the way of solving a challenge right away?
Challenge Description: What does it mean "Thinking out of the box?" What and where is that box?
CONTEXT: LOCALISE THE PROBLEM: Why context is so important in problem solving?
TRANSFORM HARM INTO BENEFIT: Resources: templates and shortcuts to the solution
Contradictions: Seeing the Problem Clearly: A TRIZ Conflict-Solving Quiz
TEMPLATES FOR INVENTIVE SOLUTIONS: Invent a shampoo bottle for people with poor grip

requirements: Beginner-friendly—no previous TRIZ experience required.
Learners should be open to working with structured templates, logical models, and systems thinking
courses.description:
Problem-Solving Made Visual, Practical, and (Yes) Fun
Tired of long, dry texts that make your brain beg for mercy? This course is 90% video, 10% text, and 100% focused on helping you solve real problems creatively and efficiently—with a few laughs along the way.
You will be primary taught the basics of TRIZ (Theory of Inventive Problem Solving) and how to use it to crack tough challenges—especially when you need fast, cheap, and reliable solutions. Whether you're an engineer, designer, manager, or curious creative, this course will train your brain to think like an innovator.
You’ll learn to:
Spot challenges and define them like a pro
Apply powerful tools that make complex systems manageable
Turn contradictions into unexpected solutions
You’ll get:
Template to map your ideas and dig for hidden resources
Patterns of  Creative Thinking that keep your thinking sharp and costs low


So, if you like your learning visual, useful, and a little playful—this is your course. Let’s make innovation feel less like rocket science... and more like common sense
According to the story, Edison used to give this clever challenge to new hires or job candidates to test their creativity. He’d hand them a light bulb and ask, “Can you figure out its volume?” At first, it sounds like you'd need fancy tools or tricky math—but that’s exactly what made it a great test of out-of-the-box thinking. After this course, solving stuff like that will feel way easier.
target_audience: University and hight school students tackling research, thesis planning, or complex coursework.
Professionals who work in innovation, strategy, engineering, design, or R&D.
Startup teams needing fast, resource-efficient problem-solving systems.
Teachers of STEM subjects.
Those who value practical application of theory, appreciate visuals and  logic-backed creativity,

courses.title: Web Editörlüğü ve Gazetecilik Dersleri
courses.bio: Editörlüğün temel ilkelerini kavrayacak, paneli kullanacak ve haber yazmayı en ince ayrıntısına kadar öğreneceksiniz
objectives: Bir haber sitesinde editör olarak çalışabilecek bilgiyi kazanın
Editörlükte fark yaratın
Editörlüğün en ince ayrıntılarını bilin
Habere bakış açısı katmayı kazanın
Gazeteciliğin ve editörlüğün en temel ilkelerini kavrayın
Haber panelini kullanmayı öğrenin
Sorunsuz haber yazabilecek duruma erişin
Haberin nasıl bulunduğunu edinin

Haber nedir ve nelere dikkat edilmelidir: Dil bilgisi ve yazım kurallarına hakimiyet
Haberdeki etik ilkeler ve telif nedir?
Haberde görsellik ve günümüz medyası: Haberde görsel ve metinsel uyum sağlama
Haber panelini işlevsel bir şekilde tanı: Haber paneli nedir ve nasıl kullanılır?
Haber paneline fotoğraf ve video nasıl yüklenir?
Etiket yapma ve haber yerinin önemi
Haber başlığı bulma ve iç spot yazma

requirements: Özel olarak bilmeniz gereken bir program yok. Her şeyi en iyi şekilde kavrayacaksınız ve işin matematiğini anlayacaksınız
courses.description:
Editör ve gazeteci olmak isteyen arkadaşlar bu kurs tam size göre!


Hem editörlüğün en ince ayrıntılarını keşfedeceksiniz hem de haber yazarken nelere dikkat etmeniz gerektiğini öğreneceksiniz!


Canlı bir haber panelinden işin ayrıntılarını ve detaylarını göreceksiniz. Bu paneli kullanmayı öğrenirken, editörlüğün kocaman bir okyanus olduğunu fark edeceksiniz!


Ve tabii her slaytta bol bol örneklerle karşılaşacaksınız!


Ben bir yandan anlatırken, sizler de bir yandan anlattıklarıma uygun içerikleri takip edeceksiniz!


Haber yazmanın çeşitli yollarında kaybolurken, haberi çekip çıkarmayı da tadacaksınız!


Günümüz medya organlarının durumuna şahit olurken, dünya medyasına bakış açınızı da değiştireceksiniz!


Bir haber, sizin için basit bir haber olmaktan çıkacak! Habere hükmetmeyi, yani açı vermeyi de deneyimleyeceksiniz!


Haberde dikkat edilecek noktaları artık kırmızı kalın puntolarla çizeceksiniz ve hata yapmadan, temiz bir iş çıkaracaksınız!


Ayrıca artık haber yazmak kadar haberi bulmayı da ustaca kavrayacaksınız!


Tüm bunları, işin mutfağından gelen biri tarafından öğreneceksiniz. Bu yüzden de öğrendiklerinizi asla bir daha unutmayacaksınız!


Bir editörün bilmesi gereken her şeyi, hatta daha fazlasını size anlatacağım. Bu kursu tamamladıktan sonra bir editör olarak bilmediğiniz hiçbir şey kalmayacak! Tek yapmanız gereken şey, anlattıklarımı gündelik hayatınızda kullanmak olacak!


Bir slaytta birden çok konuyu işliyor olacağım. O yüzden tek bir ders bitiminde bile birçok şey öğrenmiş olarak ayrılacaksınız!


Beni sıkı şekilde ve can kulağıyla dinlemeyi unutmayınız!


Şimdi bir editör ve gazeteci olarak bir adım öne çıkmaya hazır mısınız?


Öyleyse başlayalım...
target_audience: Editörlüğe ilgisi olan, haber sitelerinde çalışmak isteyenler
Gazeteciliği en ince ayrıntılarına kadar merak edenler
Kelimeler ve cümlelerden heyecan duyan, yazma tutkunları
Araştırma çabasında olanlar ve olayları derinlemesine incelemek isteyenler
Haberin nasıl ortaya çıktığına ilgi duyanlar

courses.title: Corso di disegno iperrealistico a pastello
courses.bio: LIVELLO 1: Le basi del disegno con i pastelli morbidi
objectives: Materiali e strumenti per realizzare un disegno a pastello
Realizzazione della traccia con due diverse tecniche
Scegliere i colori corretti per riprodurre una foto in modo realistico
Esercizio pratico: disegno a pastello di un soggetto semplice: le ciliegie.

Conclusioni e anticipazioni: Video conclusivo e anticipazioni sul prossimo livello

requirements: Nessun requisito! Il corso è adatto anche per i principianti. Serve solo una cosa: la PASSIONE. Tutto il resto è tecnica.  E quella, posso insegnartela.
courses.description:
L'obiettivo del primo livello del videocorso di disegno a pastello è quello di fornire tutte le basi e gli strumenti necessari per imparare questa splendida tecnica. E' un livello indispensabile per capire il funzionamento e l'utilizzo dei materiali in diverse circostanze, per imparare a risolvere i piccoli "problemi" e imprevisti che si verificano durante l'esecuzione di un lavoro complesso.


Le lezioni del primo livello sono così suddivise:


Lezione 1: STRUMENTI E MATERIALI
Durata videolezione: 27 minuti
Tempo di esecuzione degli esercizi: 2 ore circa
Livello di difficoltà: facile
In questa lezione vengono elencati i materiali da acquistare, viene eseguita una dimostrazione su come utilizzarli e si farà un esercizio pratico per imparare a realizzare le sfumature e le velature con i pastelli morbidi.


Lezione 2: REALIZZAZIONE DELLA TRACCIA
Durata videolezione: 31 minuti
Tempo di esecuzione degli esercizi: 2 ore circa
Livello di difficoltà: intermedio
In questa lezione imparerete a riportare la traccia da una fotografia al vostro foglio di lavoro, con due diverse tecniche (guardate la lezione per scoprirle!)


Lezione 3: COME SCEGLIERE I COLORI
Durata videolezione: 6 minuti
Tempo di esecuzione degli esercizi: 1 ora circa
Livello di difficoltà: intermedio
Dopo una breve introduzione alla lezione sulle ciliegie, viene spiegato come riconoscere e scegliere i codici colori corretti per la giusta copia di un'immagine.Per facilitare la lezione viene comunque allegata la lista dei codici colori individuati dalla docente.Consiglio: provate a scegliere i colori autonomamente e poi confrontateli con la lista.


Lezione 3 + Lezione 4: DISEGNO IPERREALISTICO DI UN SOGGETTO SEMPLICE: LE CILIEGIE
Durata videolezioni: 75 minuti
Tempo di esecuzione totale: 5 ore circa
Livello di difficoltà: intermedio
Questa lezione sarà interamente dedicata alla realizzazione del disegno dettagliato di una coppia di ciliegie. Vedrete, passo passo, come affrontare un lavoro dal principio alla fine, con approfondimenti su tecniche utili per ogni diverso passaggio.


A CHI E' RIVOLTO
A tutti! Il primo livello del corso è fruibile sia da principianti assoluti che da persone con un livello intermedio, con lo scopo di perfezionare la tecnica.


ASSISTENZA DELLA DOCENTE COME IN AULA
Hai dubbi sulla lezione o vuoi inviare alla docente il lavoro eseguito per eventuali consigli e correzioni?
Alessandra è a disposizione.
Iscrivendoti al corso avrai a disposizione il link diretto alla pagina di contatto della docente.


*In questo corso sarà necessario acquistare alcuni materiali professionali per poter seguire le lezioni.
target_audience: Artisti
Studenti di Accademia Di Belle Arti
Studenti di Liceo Artistico
Tatuatori
Appassionati d'arte

courses.title: Desbloqueando a Criatividade 2.0 | Crie, Inove e Surpreenda
courses.bio: Liberte seu Potencial Criativo e Inovador: Aprenda Técnicas avançadas de criatividade e inovação
objectives: Aprimoramento da expressão criativa: Os participantes desenvolverão habilidades para expressar suas ideias de forma clara
Desenvolvimento de habilidades de pensamento lateral: Os alunos aprenderão a explorar soluções inovadoras através da prática de pensamento lateral
Ampliação da capacidade de geração de ideias: O curso ajudará os alunos a expandir sua capacidade de gerar ideias criativas, fornecendo técnicas e estratégias
Fomento da resolução criativa de problemas: Os alunos serão capacitados a enfrentar desafios complexos com abordagens inovadoras e criativas

OS PILARES DA CRIATIVIDADE: O QUE FAZ A CRIATIVIDADE SE DESENVOLVER
OS PROCESSOS CRIATIVOS: DESVENDANDO AS FASES DE CRIAÇÃO
DESENVOLVENDO A CRIATIVIDADE: COMO CRIAR UMA CONDIÇÃO PARA CRIATIVIDADE
A ARTE DE INOVAR: A ARTE DE COPIAR PARA INOVAR
ENTRANDO NO VORTEX DA CRIATIVIDADE: COMO USAR O TÉDIO AO SEU FAVOR
COMO USAR O SUBCONSCIENTE PARA TER IDEIAS
COMO MANTER O FOGO DA CRIATIVIDADE ACESO

requirements: Interesse pela área de criatividade: Embora não seja um pré-requisito estrito, é altamente recomendável que os alunos tenham interesse genuíno na área de criatividade e estejam motivados a desenvolver suas habilidades criativas.
courses.description:
Descubra um mundo de possibilidades ilimitadas e libere todo o seu potencial criativo e inovador com o curso "Desbloqueando a Criatividade 2.0". Este curso dinâmico e estimulante oferece uma jornada envolvente através de técnicas avançadas de criatividade e inovação, projetadas para expandir seus horizontes e desencadear seu verdadeiro poder criativo.
Ao longo deste curso, você mergulhará em uma variedade de estratégias comprovadas para estimular a criatividade, explorando novas abordagens para resolver problemas e gerar ideias inovadoras. De brainstorming a técnicas de pensamento lateral, de exercícios de improvisação a métodos de visualização criativa, você aprenderá a acessar e cultivar sua criatividade de maneiras que você nunca imaginou serem possíveis.
Com a orientação do artista Gustavo Domingues, você será desafiado a ultrapassar seus limites criativos, enfrentar desafios complexos com confiança e transformar suas ideias mais audaciosas em realidade. Este curso não se trata apenas de aprender novas habilidades, mas de desbloquear um potencial interior que o capacitará a prosperar em qualquer contexto criativo ou inovador.
Junte-se a nós nesta jornada emocionante e descubra como liberar seu potencial criativo e inovador de uma vez por todas. Está na hora de deixar sua marca única no mundo e criar um futuro repleto de possibilidades infinitas.


Uma mensagem do artista Gustavo Domingues:
Espero que apreciem o curso assim como eu aprecio meu café! que seus caminhos sejam esplêndidos e iluminados! Nos vemos na nossa primeira aula. Fiquem com Deus.
target_audience: O curso de criatividade é destinado a uma ampla variedade de pessoas, incluindo:  Profissionais Criativos: Como escritores, artistas, designers, músicos, cineastas e outros profissionais que desejam aprimorar suas habilidades criativas e aprender novas técnicas para gerar ideias inovadoras em seus campos de atuação.  Empreendedores e Inovadores: Para empreendedores que buscam desenvolver novos produtos, serviços ou modelos de negócios inovadores, bem como para profissionais interessados em impulsionar a inovação dentro de suas organizações.  Estudantes e Educadores: Estudantes de todos os níveis de ensino, bem como educadores interessados em promover a criatividade em sala de aula e desenvolver métodos de ensino mais criativos.  Profissionais de Negócios: Gerentes, líderes empresariais, profissionais de marketing, consultores e outros que desejam aprimorar suas habilidades criativas para resolver problemas de negócios complexos, estimular a inovação e encontrar novas oportunidades de crescimento.  Qualquer pessoa interessada em desenvolver sua criatividade: O curso também é adequado para qualquer pessoa que esteja interessada em explorar e desenvolver suas habilidades criativas, independentemente de sua formação ou área de atuação.  Em resumo, o curso de criatividade é projetado para atender a uma ampla gama de participantes, desde profissionais criativos até aqueles que desejam cultivar e aplicar a criatividade em diversas áreas de suas vidas pessoais e profissionais.

courses.title: Positive Psychologie - 35 interessante Psychologie Effekte
courses.bio: 35 Effekte der positiven Psychologie: Beeinflussung, Verhalten & Manipulation - Psychologie lernen, Psychologie deutsch
objectives: Du lernst 35 sehr interessante Techniken aus der Welt der Psychologie kennen.
Du lernst interessante Phänomene im Alltag kennen.
Du lernst, wie sich Menschen verhalten und warum sie sich so verhalten.
Du lernst einige spannende Psychologieeffekte, die für einige Aha-Effekte sorgen werden.
requirements: Kein Vorwissen erforderlich
courses.description:
Über 35 spannende psychologische Effekte warten auf dich...
In diesem Videokurs werden wir uns ansehen:
wie sich Menschen verhalten.

wie wir täglich manipuliert werden.

wie wir andere beeinflussen können.

was unbewusste Gefahren für uns sind.

wie wir ein erfülltes und glückliches Leben führen.
Oftmals können wir das Verhalten unserer Mitmenschen nicht nachvollziehen. Warum sind sie so geworden? Wie entwickelt sich die menschliche Psyche? Was hat einen Einfluss auf unsere Handlungen? Finde es heraus mit diesem Psychologie Kurs.
Die Welt der Psychologie ist eine der interessantesten, die wir uns ansehen können. Hier werden die Fragen geklärt, was den Menschen ausmacht, wie er handelt und vor allem, warum er so handelt.
Schreib dich noch heute in diesen Psychologiekurs ein und lerne 35 sehr interessante psychologische Effekte und Theorien kennen.
Wir sehen uns bei der ersten Lektion,
dein Leon Dawi
-----------------------
Das sagen andere Teilnehmer über meine Kurse:
<< Leon Dawi ist einer meiner Lieblings-Dozenten, der genau den Mehrwert bietet, den ich brauche. 5 STERNE! >>
<< Der Dozent hat mich mit seiner lebendigen und interessanten Art überzeugt - Mittlerweile habe ich von ihm mehr als 10 Kurse belegt und bin sehr zufrieden. >>
<< Leon ist der vielseitigste Dozent hier auf udemy, den ich kenne. Ganz egal, ob Persönlichkeitsentwicklung, Finanzieller Freiheit, Marketing oder Karriere - Hier finde ich immer einen knackigen Kurs, der mir weiterhilft. >>
-----------------------
target_audience: Für alle, die sich für Psychologie interessieren
Für alle, die 35 interessante Psychologie Effekte kennenlernen möchten.

courses.title: كورس كيف تكتب رواية ـ ورشة كتابة الرواية ـ المستوى الاحترافي
courses.bio: كورس تعليم تقنيات فن كتابة الرواية ـ كورس كتابة الرواية
objectives: 1. كيف تبدأ في كتابة روايتك؟ (التخطيط ـ رسم الهيكل ـ رسم الخط الدرامي)
2. شرح النقطة السابقة عمليًا...
3. كيف تكتب حوار شيّق واحترافي في روايتك؟
4. أخطاء شائعة في كتابة الرواية... تعرف عليها كي لا تفعلها.
5. أخطاء شائعة في اللغة العربية، يجب أن تتجنبها أثناء كتابة روايتك.
6. نصائح ذهبية يجب أن تفعلها كي تكون كاتبًا روائيًا ناجحًا ومحترفًا.
7. كيف تختار أسماء شخوص روايتك؟ + شرح أبعاد ذكر العلامات التجارية والبراندات في روايتك؟
8. ما الفارق بين كتابة السيناريو وكتابة الرواية، وشرح كل منهما؟
9. كيف تصبح كاتبًا روائيًا ناجحًا؟
10. أنواع دور النشر... والفارق بينهم
11. ماذا يجب أن تفعل بعد الانتهاء من روايتك؟ وكيف تتواصل مع دور النشر بشكل احترافيّ لترسل لهم عملك؟
هدية المستوى الاحترافي ... حلقة عن كيفية كتابة القصة القصيرة بالتفصيل

كورس كيف تكتب رواية ـ المستوى الاحترافي: كيف تبدأ في كتابة روايتك ـ التخطيط والهيكل والرسم
كيفية رسم المشهد وتنفيذه في الرواية
كيف تكتب حوار شيق وممتع في روايتك
أخطاء شائعة في كتابة الرواية، أرجوك لا تفعلها
أخطاء شائعة في اللغة العربية يجب أن تتجنبها أثناء كتابة روايتك
نصائح ذهبية يجب أن تفعلها، كي تصبح كاتبًا روائيًا محترفًا
كيف تختار أسماء شخوص روايتك، وذكر العلامة التجارية
الفرق بين كتابة الرواية وكتابة السيناريو
مرحلة ما بعد الانتهاء من روايتك.. كيف تتواصل مع دور النشر لترسل لهم عملك؟

requirements: لا شيء سوى الرغبة في تعلم تقنيات فن كتابة الرواية
courses.description:
بعدما تدرس المستوى الأساسي والتأسيسي ل كورس كيف تكتب رواية، والمنشور هنا على يوديمي أيضًا... ستحب أن تستكمل دراستك وتزيد من قوتك في التسلح بتقنيات المستوى الاحترافي هذا... والذي ستدرس فيه الآتي:
1. كيف تبدأ في كتابة روايتك؟ (التخطيط ـ رسم الهيكل ـ رسم الخط الدرامي)
2. شرح النقطة السابقة عمليًا...
3. كيف تكتب حوار شيق واحترافي في روايتك؟
4. أخطاء شائعة في كتابة الرواية... تعرف عليها كي لا تفعلها.
5. أخطاء شائعة في اللغة العربية، يجب أن تتجنبها أثناء كتابة روايتك.
6. نصائح ذهبية يجب أن تفعلها كي تكون كاتبًا روائيًا ناجحًا ومحترفًا.
7. كيف تختار أسماء شخوص روايتك؟ + شرح أبعاد ذكر العلامات التجارية والبراندات في روايتك؟
8. ما الفارق بين كتابة السيناريو وكتابة الرواية، وشرح كل منهما؟
9. كيف تصبج كاتبًا روائيًا ناجحًا؟
10. أنواع دور النشر... والفارق بينهم
11. ماذا يجب أن تفعل بعد الانتهاء من روايتك؟ وكيف تتواصل مع دور النشر بشكل احترافيّ لترسل لهم عملك؟
في هذا المستوى ستكون قد تسلحت بكل الأدوات التي تجعلك واقفًا بقدمين راسختين قويتين في حقل كتابة الرواية... بعد ذلك إن أردت تحرير روايتك في وكالتي الأدبية، فلن تفعل شيء سوى التواصل معي وسأرشدك إلى الخطوات التي يجب أن تفعلها، ماذا تنتظر؟ اشترك الآن في المستوى التأسيسي والاحترافي هذا... واستمتع بالخصم الكبير الذي وضعته لك... تقديرًا لحبك للكتابة ولرغبتك كي تكون كاتبًا روائيًا ناجحًا
تحياتي
أمير عاطف
target_audience: لكل الفئات

courses.title: Art of Creative writing & Storytelling
courses.bio: Learn to writing creative, tell better stories. Begginers guide to creative writing and progressive storytelling.

Additional materials for further learnin: What is Realistic Heroes and how to Create them?
The Theme of the Story and Its Cyclical Nature

requirements: You need only a desire to be a better storyteller
courses.description:
Hi, have you ever dreamt tell your own stories that matter?
Probably, YES, because storytelling is one of the necessary features of a successful communicator in the modern world. Whether you write your own stories, books, or just a script for the future YouTube video, you should adhere to some principles or rules.
This course is created especially for those who wish to upgrade themselves as a storyteller and become familiar with distinct moments of this Art.


Why I call this Art, you may ask me?


Because this process requires some skills and creativity to evolve, and, consequently, to be remarkable in it.
Throughout this course, you will open something unexplored and learn about such amazing things, as:
-Story structure
-Conflict
-Heroes
-Setting
-Dialogue
-Monologue
-Vocabulary
and many others...


Every lesson is not only a dry theory but has some practical assignments.
Also, I`ve just added two bonus videos to provide you with some extra value. Stay in prosperity, peace, and respect. And see you on the course!


P.S. Additionally, I prepared more bonus stuff with additional resources. But I need your honest feedback. So, whether you enjoy the course, write reviews and questions you want to ask. I am doing my best to make your process as seamless and comfortable as possible. Thanks for staying with me!
target_audience: Everyone curious/interested in art of storytelling

This online Screenwriting Course will teach you how to write your logline for your next story.
This course is designed to teach you, not only the steps and basics of writing a logline but what a story is and what it means for you and the audience. While there are plenty of video courses, it's hard to find a comprehensive course that teaches you everything you'd want to know about being a writer.
In this course, you'll learn:
What is a story
What is the Truth
What is a premise
How to find inspiration for your premise
What is a logline
How to write a logline
Class excercises
It doesn't matter if you are a beginner or a pro. It's always great to find new ways to improve our writing.
If you want to learn how to write a screenplay and understand the importance of storytelling, this is the course for you.
target_audience: It doesn't matter if you are a beginner or a pro. It's always great to find new ways to improve our writing.

courses.title: Top 25 Film School Screenwriting-Without Film School Prices!
courses.bio: Learn industry professional screenwriting tips & secrets without Film School prices!
objectives: Watch the exact lectures I give at Columbia College, a Top 25 film school, for a fraction of the price
No screenwriting experience needed. Students can be beginners, intermediate or advanced
Lecture topics include: Dialogue, Character Development, Screenplay Structure, Format, an Micro-Budget Writing & Producing
Kickstart your screenplay or TV Pilot. Class content from exclusive original writing from my blog: Script Gods Must Die
requirements: Only the desire for you to take your idea to the next level and finish the screenplay!
courses.description:
Unlock the secrets of professional screenwriting with this comprehensive course taught by award-winning screenwriter and director Paul Peditto. Designed for aspiring writers and filmmakers, this course distills years of industry experience into easy-to-follow lessons that cover everything from story structure and character development to dialogue and micro-budget filmmaking. Whether you’re a beginner or looking to refine your craft, you’ll gain insider tips, practical exercises, and proven techniques that have helped Paul’s work achieve success in festivals, theaters, and streaming platforms.
You’ll start by mastering screenplay structure and format before diving into creating compelling characters and dialogue that pop off the page. The course also includes a special focus on micro-budget filmmaking—perfect for indie creators who want to bring their stories to life without breaking the bank. With lectures based on Paul’s teaching at Columbia College and years in the trenches of Hollywood and indie filmmaking, you’re getting pro-level education at a fraction of the cost.
By the end of this course, you’ll have the skills and confidence to write screenplays that stand out and, most importantly, get made! No more excuses, no more letting them tell you the script isn't good enough! Time to take control back, starting with taking this course.
target_audience: Beginning, intermediate, or advanced screenwriters wanting  to improve their screenplay, TV pilot, or web series

courses.title: Urban Sketching: Quiet Café Moments
courses.bio: How Urban Sketching Can Boost Your Mental Well-being
objectives: Urban Explorers: Those who love exploring cities and want to document their adventures through sketching.
Aspiring Urban Sketchers: Those looking to embark on their artistic journey and explore urban sketching as a new experience.
Art Enthusiasts: People with a passion for art who want to capture the beauty of urban hangouts.
Creative Hobbyists: Individuals seeking a relaxing and creative pastime to express their personal vision through art.

Course Lectures: Pro Tips for Choosing the Subject
Laying The Foundation - Linework Demo - Part 1
Laying The Foundation - Linework Demo - Part 2

requirements: Basic Sketching Supplies: A sketchbook or paper, pencils (preferably HB or 2B), erasers, and a sharpener.
Tools: Fineliners or ink pens, and watercolor paints if you want to add color to your sketches.
Open Mind to discover your own artistic expression.
courses.description:
You know that feeling, right? You're sitting in a café, the aroma of coffee fills the air, and there's just something magical about the quiet hustle and bustle around you. Maybe someone's deep in a book, or the light is catching that old brick wall just perfectly. Ever wished you could bottle that feeling, or better yet, capture it on paper? That's exactly what we're going to do in this course! But it's more than just drawing; it's about slowing down, observing deeply, and finding moments of calm in your day urban spaces. That's the whole essence of Urban Sketching for me, finding my creative expression in the moments of peace and presence.


By the end of this course, you'll be able to confidently walk into any café, pull out your sketchbook, and truly capture what you see and feel. We'll learn to sketch the overall ambiance, focus-in on an inspiring detail, and learn to discover what catches our eye, that what truly speaks to you. Imagine the stories you'll tell in your sketchbook, and the quiet satisfaction you'll gain from each completed page. So let's embark on this journey together and hoping you find your creative expression too! Happy Urban Sketching!!
target_audience: Aspiring artists eager to explore urban sketching.
Art enthusiasts wanting to capture the beauty of cityscapes.

courses.title: The 64 Human Design Gifts: 1 - The Divine Creative
courses.bio: Mini-course in a transformative human design series to boost self-awareness, productivity, and success with your gifts

3 Aspects You Need to Know about the Div: What is Gift 1 - The Divine Creative? Definition and Description.
Challenges of the Divine Creative Gift
Maximise the Divine Creative Gift's Benefits
Why Knowing About Your Gifts Makes a Difference?

courses.description:
I know you're someone who wants more from life. You're ready to unlock your full potential and step into the most powerful version of yourself. But what if the key to your success has been within you all along—written in your Human Design bodygraph?
Welcome to The Divine Creative, part of a powerful course series designed to help you discover your unique gifts and unleash the energy you were born with. In this mini-course, we’ll focus on Gift 1, exploring how creativity flows through you, how to overcome challenges, and how to use your gift to amplify success in every area of your life.
This is about more than self-discovery. It's about clarity, confidence, and living in total alignment with who you are. Knowing your unique gift helps you stay focused, productive, and magnetic to abundance. When you’re in flow with your design, life feels easier, more inspired, and filled with purpose.


You’ll leave this course with:

Tools to overcome blocks and stay in alignment
Clarity on your creative power and how to use it
Increased focus, performance, and personal growth
A deeper understanding of how your energy shapes your life


I’m offering this course completely free—my gift to you. All 64 mini-courses in this series on Human Design gifts will be free as part of my mission to help you discover your true potential. If you’re curious to dive even deeper, I also offer longer, in-depth courses on Human Design where you can explore all aspects of your chart and truly understand yourself on a profound level.
If you’re ready to explore what makes you extraordinary and create more impact while becoming the best version of yourself, this course is for you. Let’s begin your journey toward clarity, success, and personal empowerment!
target_audience: Creatives Seeking Clarity: Ideal for individuals wanting to understand and use their unique creative power.
Self-Discovery Enthusiasts: Perfect for those on a personal growth journey, exploring their Human Design.
High Achievers Wanting Alignment: Designed for those seeking focus, alignment, and peak performance through self-awareness.

courses.description: Imersão prazerosa e intensiva na rica tradição do Jornalismo Literário aplicado a viagens. Exemplos e exercícios.   Recursos narrativos. Princípios e técnicas para se produzir histórias diferenciadas.   A herança da tradição e a adaptação aos novos tempos da transmídia e da comunicação digital. A inspiração que vem de grandes autores. O despertar da criatividade narrativa de cada um. Técnicas de captação e observação. O fator humano. A busca de compreensão e o propósito central das narrativas.

courses.title: How to edit your Video and Audio for free
courses.bio: Edit your videos, audios and compress the files for FREE
requirements: Should have a Windows/Mac/Linux based computer
courses.description:
Editing videos for YouTube or Skillshare does not have to be costly.
In this class I show you how I use 3 Open Source tools (Blender, Audacity and Handbrake) for editing my videos, editing audios and then compressing the video files. All these applications are very capable, feature rich and still FREE. They are constantly supported and upgraded by the developer community.
All my online class videos and YouTube videos go through this same editing workflow which I show you here. Though all of these applications have hundreds of settings, I show you exact settings that I use so that even if you do not understand or do not want to understand how they work, these settings will do the work of editing videos for you. You are of course free to try different combinations of settings once you get familiar with the usage.
So if you are a video enthusiast or a online teacher like me, this class will give you lot of information that you can implement right away.
I am sure that as you progress on your video making and editing journey, you'll come across better and complex tools. Things you learn in this class will help you learn those tools faster as the concepts of editing remain the same.
Enroll now and see you in the class!
-Mandar
target_audience: Everyone who creates videos
Everyone who teaches online
Everyone who is passionate about sharing their knowledge with the world

courses.title: Yaratıcı Yazarlık & Gelir Getirici Yazarlık Dersleri
courses.bio: Yaratıcı Yazarlık ve Gelir Getirici Yazarlık Hakkında Her Şey Bu Kursta
objectives: 11 farklı yazım türünü (roman, senaryo, vb.) 11 farklı temada (polisiye, tarihi, aşk, vb.) yazmak için nelere dikkat edilmesi gerektiğini öğreneceksiniz
Fikir bulma, karakter oluşturma, iyi bir kurgu kurma vb. becerilerin nasıl kazanıldığını öğreneceksiniz
Eserinizi kitap olarak bastıracağınız zaman nelere dikkat etmeniz gerektiğini öğreneceksiniz
Freelancer dediğimiz, ücreti karşılığında yazı yazmanın detaylarını ve tekniklerini öğreneceksiniz
Akademik yazıları yazmanın püf noktalarını öğreneceksiniz

İhtiyaçlar: Uygun Zaman, Mekan ve Ruh Hali
Hangi Temada Yazmalısınız?: Yeni Nesil Gençlik Teması Nasıl Yazılır?
Yazmanın Altın Kuralları: Kişi, Olay, Zaman ve Mekan Bütünlüğü
Eserinizi Baskıya Hazırlama ve İlk Baskı: Ben Neden Ünlü Bir Yazar Olamadım

requirements: Hiçbir ön koşula gerek yok, yazı yazmak için ihtiyacınız olan her şey bu kursta
courses.description:
Bu kursta, yazıya başlamadan önce sahip olmanız gereken maddi ve manevi donanımları öğrenecek; yazmak için ideal bir zaman, mekan ve ruh halinin ne olduğuna ilişkin bilgi sahibi olacaksınız. Yazmak istiyor ancak nereden başlayacağınızı bilemiyorsanız, bu kurs sayesinde romandan senaryoya, tiyatro oyunundan reklam metnine kadar toplamda 11 farklı yazı türünü, aşktan polisiyeye; korkudan yeni nesil gençlik edebiyatına kadar 11 farklı temada nasıl kaleme alacağınızın tekniklerini öğreneceksiniz.
Yazacağınız türe karar verdikten sonra; iyi bir fikir bulma, karakter oluşturma, iyi cümleler kurma, gerçekçi diyaloglar yazma, zaman-mekan ve karakterler arasında uyum sağlama gibi bir eseri profesyonel yapan tüm detayların nasıl gerçekleştirileceğini öğreneceksiniz. Sadece hikaye ve roman alanında değil, senaryo, reklam metni ve akademik alanda kaleme alacağınız yazılarınız için de işinizi kolaylaştıracak ve eserinize kalite katacak unsurları öğreneceksiniz.
Basıma hazır hale gelen eserlerinizi yayınevlerine göndermeden önce yapmanız gerekenler, editörlerin ya da seçici kurulların eserlerde nelere dikkat ettiği, okurların bir eserden ne beklediği gibi hususlarda da, eserinizin basım sürecini hızlandıracak hususları yine bu kursta bulacaksınız.
Günümüzde freelancer yazarlar dediğimiz, belli ücretler karşılığında yazı yazmanın püf noktalarını öğrenecek; yazdıklarınız üzerinden nasıl gelir elde edeceğiniz konusunda detaylı bilgilere erişebileceksiniz. Tüm türler ve kategorilerle ilgili örnek uygulamalar ve alıştırma ödevleri ile yazı pratiğinizi geliştirecek, başarılı bir yazının olmazsa olmazlarını öğreneceksiniz.
target_audience: Hali hazırda yazan ve yazım tekniklerini geliştirmek isteyenler
Yazı yazmaya yeni başlayacak olan ama nereden başlayacağını bilemeyenler
Yazdığı eserin piyasada kendine hemen yer bulmasını isteyenler
Yazdıklarından gelir elde etmek isteyenler
Akademik tez ve makalelerini yazmakta zorlananlar

courses.title: 【全職種ビジネスパーソン向け】AI時代のクリエイティブ思考術：社内外で飛躍的成果を上げるAIマインドセット構築プログラム
courses.bio: ≪社内研修／新人研修にも最適≫ツールのトレンドに一生左右されない【本質のAI活用脳】を育む新ジャンル自己啓発プログラムが誕生。ビジネス全方位であなたに“覚醒”が起こる！史上最強24時間365日無尽蔵の相棒「AI」を絶対的な味方に付けよう！
objectives: AIを“単なるツール”としてではなく、自分の思考を拡張する“対話パートナー”として捉え直せるようになる
視点・情報・要素・遊びを自在に操作できる「クリエイティブ思考術」のフレームワークを習得し、発想力が格段に上がる
ビジネスシーンでのAI活用において、“最適な使い所”と“期待できる成果”を的確に判断し、無駄なトライ＆エラーを減らせる
プロンプトやアウトプットの質を高めるために必要な“言語力の軸”（母国語と構築言語）を理解し、実践で使える
セキュリティ・著作権・倫理面での基本的なリスクを理解し、安心してAIをビジネス活用できるマインドセットを身につける
「AI活用×自己啓発」の新たな視点から、自分の価値・スキル・行動習慣を見直し、継続的に進化できる“自走力”が育つ

ビジネスパーソンが捉えるべきAI基礎入門: 【講座内容・全体の流れ】史上最強24時間365日無尽蔵の相棒がここに爆誕！
テキスト教材をダウンロードしよう！
AI活用の最重要ファクター：それが「自己啓発」である理由
そもそもAIとは？99%のAI講座が語らない、AIの本質
AIにできること：AIの力を最大限に活かすたった1つの「視点」
AIのUI/UXとは？:注目すべきは「ヒトとの接点」
AIの代表的なツール：すべての源泉はアイデアにある
AIの持つ情熱とは？：ワクワクと熱量ぶつければ、答えは次元の大きく変わる
AI時代のクリエイティブシンキング入門: そもそもクリエイティブとは？あなたのプロンプトに“魔法”が宿る瞬間
クリエイティブシンキング(1)【視点操作系】逸らし・逆張り・置き換え
クリエイティブシンキング(2)【要素操作系】削ぎ落とす・絞る・強調する
クリエイティブシンキング(3)【アソビ想像系】掛け合わせ・パロディ・真似る
クリエイティブシンキング(4)【情報設計／ターゲティング系】入力・出力・質量操作
AIの恩恵をピンポイントで受けるためのマインドセット入門: ビジネスシーンにおけるAI対話の3ステップ活用フレーム
AIレバレッジ：同じAIでも、使う場所が違えば、得られる未来は100倍違う
AI力を劇的に高める言語力には「母国語」と「構築言語」の二軸が存在する
AI力を劇的に高めるのは「話す・書く・聞く」の解像度
「困ってる」と「ハマってる」が、AI活用の最短ルート
AI時代に必要なリスク管理入門: セキュリティと個人情報：AIとの対話における“漏れリスク”
著作権と生成物の取り扱い：どこからが“自分の作品”なのか？
AI倫理と社会的責任：嘘・偏見・ディープフェイクとどう向き合う？
AIで他者を傷つけないためのチェックリスト：誰かを踏みつけていないか？
“AIが書いた”と明かす？明かさない？：透明性と信頼のバランス戦略
AIの応用力を劇的に高める戦略的ムーブメント: AIスキルよりも「AIプラグイン」を発見すれば、知識ゼロで加速できる
「AIウォッチャー専用アカウント」で「AI専門家アカウント」をレシポ本のように扱う
知見や価値観を外から前借りすれば、AI対話力は変幻自在に操れる
AI×自己拡張の成長フレーム「6ステージモデル」
専門分野を“編集”する：AIによる自分スキルの再構築術
思考資産の“ストック型”運用：AIによる知的OSの構築
終わりに：AI活用の本質は、これからも変わらない

requirements: AIの知識・経験は不要。初心者からAI活用を飛躍的に伸ばすクリエイティブシンキング、マインドセット、メンタリティを学ぶことができます
courses.description:
【警告】
プロンプトエンジニアリングや特定ツールの使い方が知りたい人は、絶対にこの講座を買わないでください。


今、AIの進化は私たちの想像を超えるスピードで進んでいます。
毎週のように新しいツールが登場し、次々と「便利な使い方」が話題になります。
しかし、多くの人が「最新ツールの使い方を追うだけ」で終わってしまい、気づけば本質から遠ざかってしまっている。
この講座は、そんな表面的な知識ではなく、
“どんなAIツールが出てきても活かせる本物の思考力” を身につけるためのものです。
AIが得意なのは「処理」や「再現」。
でも、「問いを立てること」「価値を見出すこと」「視点を変えること」は、まだまだ人間にしかできません。
そして、それこそが、AI時代でも“価値を生み出し続ける人”の条件です。

＜あらゆるAIプラットフォームに対応＞
ChatGPT / Microsoft Copilot / Google Gemini / Claude / Perplexity / Genspark / Gamma / Canva Magic Studio / Notion AI / Miro AI / Tome AI / Jasper / Writesonic / Quillbot / Midjourney / Stable Diffusion / DALL·E 3 / Adobe Firefly / Runway Gen-2 / Ideogram / Figma AI など、ビジネスからクリエイティブまで幅広く応用可能！


◆ この講座で学べること
ツールに振り回されず、AIを正しく“使い倒す”ための思考法
「行動できる人」と「AIをうまく活用できる人」の共通点
自分の強みや関心とAIを掛け合わせる“資産化”の考え方
すぐに流行に乗るのではなく、AI時代を長く生き抜く“マインドセット”
自分自身の問いや企画力をAIにどう反映させるか
これらはすべて、「AIの使い方」ではなく、“AIとどう向き合うか”という“自己のOS”を育てる内容です。
ツールの名前や操作方法ではなく、「頭の使い方」にフォーカスしているのが、この講座の最大の特徴です。
◆ こんな人におすすめ
毎回新しいAIツールが出るたびに不安になる人
「AIを使いこなせないと置いていかれる」と焦っている人
本当に価値あることに時間を使いたい人
スキルではなく“考え方”で勝負したいクリエイター・ビジネスパーソン
今あるツールで十分なのに、情報に振り回されていると感じる人
◆ サブテーマは「自己理解 × 言語化 × AI時代のレバレッジ」
AIは、与えられたものにしか反応できません。
だからこそ、**「自分が何をしたいのか」「どんな価値を届けたいのか」**を言語化できることが、これからの時代では武器になります。
この講座では、
「どんなAIが来ても、自分の軸をブラさずに使いこなせる」
そんな思考とスタンスを、具体例と共にお届けします。
一発で正しい使い方を覚える講座ではありません。
ツールの流行に乗るのではなく、“どんなツールでも乗りこなせる人になる”ための講座です。
焦らず、振り回されず、自分の頭で考える力をもう一度手に入れましょう。
AI時代の“本当の主役”は、ここから生まれます。
target_audience: AIを導入したいが、業務でどう活かせばいいのか分からないビジネスパーソン
ChatGPTや生成AIを試したが、浅い活用にとどまり、手応えを感じていない方
日々の仕事でアイデア・提案・企画を求められる機会が多い、若手〜中堅社員
AIリテラシーを高めたいが、ツールの使い方ではなく“思考力”から鍛えたい方
今後のキャリアや働き方に不安を感じており、AI時代に通用するスキルを探している方
研修やチーム教育に“AI×自己啓発”という新しい切り口を取り入れたい人事・教育担当者

courses.title: História & Roteiro: Curso Completo de Roteiro e Storytelling
courses.bio: Aprenda a planejar, escrever e revisar histórias audiovisuais para entrar no mercado de roteiro e storytelling.
objectives: Elementos de uma História - Tema, Personagem, Conflito, Trama e Estilo
Tema - Objetivo, Moral e Caráter - linha do tempo, temáticas e análise
Personagem - design, perguntas, linha do tempo e orquestração
Conflito - pontos de estrutura, linha do tempo e análise de diferentes histórias
Trama - planejamento, função e revisão de atos, sequências, cenas e beats
Estilo - Formatação, diálogo e subtexto
Criatividade - lados do cérebro, exercícios, filtros criativos, plotter vs. pantser e quadro de planejamento com cartões

INTRODUÇÃO: Gráfico - A Pirâmide dos Elementos de uma História
VIDEO ANTIGO / REVISÃO - Por Que Contamos Histórias?
VIDEO ANTIGO / REVISÃO - Introdução aos Elementos e Funções de uma História
TEMA - Experiências Humanas e Moral: Análise Temática e Exemplo Fábula "O Menino Pastor e o Lobo"
O Menino Pastor e o Lobo (Fábula de Esopo)
Medos e Desejos - Universalidade na Psicologia
Sua Lista de Medos e Desejos
Análise Temática e Orquestração Temática Curta-Metragem Animação "Bridge"
EXEMPLOS EXTRAS - Análise Propaganga "Ikea" e Longa-Metragem "Procurando Nemo"
VIDEO ANTIGO / REVISÃO - Medos e Desejos, Universalidade, Psicologia e Tema
VIDEO ANTIGO / ALTERNATIVO - Análise Temática - Curta "Bridge"
PERSONAGEM - Caráter e Empatia: Design e Linha do Tempo de Personagem
Os 7 Elementos do Design de Personagens
O 4 Arcos de Personagem e Linha do Tempo Personagem
CONFLITO - Risco e Pressão: Estrutura de 3 Atos e Linha do Tempo de Conflito
Linha do Tempo Estrutura de Conflito
Incidente Incitante e Passagem Para Segundo Ato
Meio-Ponto, Passagem Para Terceiro Ato e Clímax
TRAMA - Planejamento, Criatividade, Cena: Criatividade, O Quadro e Análise 127 Horas, Black Hole e Paperman
Resposta Análises "Black Hole" e "Paperman" e Introdução à Storyline
Storyline, Linha de Premissa ou Logline
Cenas, Sequências, Beats, Valores e Técnicas de Análise e Revisão
As 3 Funções de Sequências, Cenas e Beats
Objetivo de Cena, Pivôs e Gangorras de Valores
Sinopse, Beat Sheet, Escaleta e Argumento
ESTILO - Formatação e Diálogo: Introdução ao Diálogo, Subtexto e Filtros de Diálogo
Regras, Dicas e Erros Comuns na Descrição de Cena

requirements: Sem pré-requisitos
courses.description:
Este curso está em desenvolvimento e contém as transmissões das aulas online ao vivo dadas anteriormente (mais informações - pesquise site historiaeroteiro).
À medida que editarmos as aulas e filmarmos novos conteúdos, o preço poderá alterar, portanto garanta agora o curso e receba mais conteúdo no futuro!


Olá.
Meu nome é Thiago Fogaça.
Sou roteirista formado em Cinema na FAAP, com um Mestrado em Roteiro na New York Film Academy.
Trabalhei em Los Angeles lendo projetos para TV, manuscritos e roteiros para diversas mídias.
Junto com Gustavo Amaral, criamos e vendemos nossa série de animação Hora do Rock, produzida em parceria com a Oca Animation e o canal Gloob que pertence à Rede Globo. Atualmente a série está em streaming pela GloboPlay com 26 episódios de 11 minutos.
Além disso vencemos o edital de desenvolvimento de 2018 com a maior pontuação na categoria de animação infantil seriada.
Já dou aula de roteiro e storytelling desde 2012 e ensinei mais de 5 mil alunos sobre como escrever, planejar, analisar e revisar histórias.
Finalmente estou compartilhando meu conhecimento com o Brasil e o mundo em um curso online, voltado tanto para o iniciante quanto o profissional que já trabalha no mercado e precisa de técnicas mais atualizadas e eficientes pra enfrentar dia-a-dia corrido do nosso mercado.


CONTEÚDO
ELEMENTOS DE UMA HISTÓRIA - Tema, Personagem, Conflito, Trama e Estilo. Psicologia e percepção de histórias. Origem das histórias e histórias no dia a dia. Medos e desejos. Único e universal.
TEMA - Tese, antítese, síntese. O que pertence ou não a sua história. Discussão e carga moral. Orquestração de personagens e conflitos. Declaração temática.
PERSONAGEM - Fraqueza moral, desejo, motivação, necessidade, história pregressa, risco emocional, ponto cego, arco de mudança ou inércia, qualidades e razões de empatia. Estrutura emocional de evolução ou inércia do personagem no conflito.
CONFLITO - Estrutura de 3 e 4 atos. Estrutura em 8 sequências. Incidente Incitante, Passagens de Atos, Clímax, Meio-Ponto, Ponto-Baixo, Dilema Moral, obstáculos, metas, antagonismo, ambientação, pergunta central, contrapontos, consequências e conclusão.
TRAMA - Sequências, cenas e beats. Inversão e aumento de valores. Estrutura de uma cena e um beat. Meta da cena, conflito, ponto da cena, evolução de personagem em teste de caráter e argumento moral. Orquestração de cenas e beats em sequência.
PLANEJAMENTO E REVISÃO - Storyline, Logline, Escaleta, Quadro de Planejamento, Argumento e Lista de Beats. Orquestração de valores, conflitos, metas e evolução. Pitch de uma ideia. Venda de ideias. Mercado, registro e expectativas.
DIÁLOGO E ESTILO - Subtexto, diálogo como ação, exposição de intenção e informação, pressão em conflito, negação, silêncio e ponto de vista em caráter. Cadência, ritmo, gramática coloquial, frases incompletas e interrupções.
FORMATAÇÃO - Formato Master Scenes internacional. Cabeçalho de cena, ação, descrição, diálogo, introdução de personagens, transições, texto, planos, flashbacks, sonhos, placas, conversas de telefone, diálogos estrangeiros e capa. Final Draft, Celtx, WriterDuet. O que descrever ou não. Erros comuns. Exemplo roteiro e resultado final.
target_audience: roteiristas
storytellers
escritores
quadrinhistas
animadores
escritores de séries
estudantes de cinema ou audiovisual
entusiastas de filmes e séries
críticos de cinema

courses.title: Finish your Story
courses.bio: Learn how to write screenplays like a professional in 5 steps
objectives: How to develop your ideas
How to create multilayered characters
Story structure fundamentals
How to outline your screenplay
How to write good dialogues
How to write consistently
Ho to beat writer's block
requirements: Willingness to commit
courses.description:
This course is a step by step guide on how to help you write a coherent screenplay from beginning to end.
I use proven techniques from my years of experience as a professional athlete, and break them down so they can be applied to writing.
Each module is designed to help you acquire all the knowledge you need and form a habit of writing on a regular basis.
Follow each step and learn easy ways to form your idea, create multilayered characters, structure your story, write better dialogues, beat writers block and and write on a consistent basis!
If you have been struggling to start writing or continue writing regularly, this is the course for you!
When you apply the lessons of each module, you will be on your way to finish your next screenplays faster than ever and feel more motivated to improve them daily.
After acquiring knowledge from countless screenwriting books and years of writing, I started producing my own short films. When the pandemic hit and we where forced to shut down production on our latest project. I started working on this course, so I could share all the knowledge I've accumulated throughout the years. Now you can use it all to write your own compelling screenplays and breathe life into your vision.
target_audience: Film students
Indie filmmakers
Actors/Actresses
Aspiring screenwriters

courses.title: L'Abc dello scrittore esordiente
courses.bio: Il kit per scrivere e promuovere il tuo romanzo
objectives: Allenamento alla scrittura: come dedicarti con costanza alla scrittura e superare il blocco dello scrittore
Scrittura creativa: come strutturare storia, trama, universo narrativo, descrizioni per immagini e dialoghi
Come sperimentare diversi generi e stili di scrittura
Come revisionare i tuoi scritti
Come presentarti ad una casa editrice per la pubblicazione
Come autopubblicarti e quali sono i pro e i contro rispetto ad una pubblicazione con una casa editrice
Comunicazione digitale: come creare un blog e come promuoverti online su Facebook, Instagram e Youtube
Come ottenere recensioni e avviare collaborazioni con altri autori e con bookblogger
Come organizzare eventi letterari e presentazioni del tuo romanzo

Scrittura creativa e comunicazione cultu: K come Keep calm and... taglia!

requirements: E' richiesta una minima conoscenza del web e dei social network per le lezioni relative alla comunicazione e promozione digitale
Buona conoscenza della lingua italiana e amore per la scrittura
courses.description:
L'Abc dello scrittore esordiente è il videocorso di scrittura creativa e comunicazione culturale pensato per lo scrittore alla ricerca del kit perfetto per scrivere e promuovere il suo romanzo.
Il corso è strutturato in 26 videolezioni che potrai seguire dove e quando vuoi, dalla A di Allenamento, alla Z di Zero idee, ovvero il famigerato blocco dello scrittore. Ogni lezione è corredata di materiali di approfondimento, esercizi per metterti alla prova e risorsi utili.
Con un approccio pratico e divertente, svilupperai un metodo di lavoro e imparerai a strutturare una storia efficace, dare forma a trama e personaggi, scrivere dialoghi naturali e utilizzare diversi stili e generi narrativi.
Oltre alle lezioni dedicate alla scrittura creativa, troverai lezioni per revisionare i tuoi scritti (mantenendo la calma!) e lezioni per conoscere meglio il mercato editoriale italiano: dalle indicazioni sui diversi formati di libri all'analisi del pubblico di lettori, dai consigli su come presentarsi a una casa editrice alla guida per autopubblicarsi.
Infine, diverse lezioni ti insegneranno come promuoverti online, attraverso la creazione e gestione di un blog, l'uso di vari social (Facebook, Instagram, Youtube) e collaborazioni con bookblogger, ma anche dal vivo, tramite l'organizzazione di una presentazione del tuo libro.
L'Abc dello scrittore esordiente è il corso che fa per te se vuoi finalmente realizzare il sogno di scrivere e pubblicare il tuo romanzo!


Le docenti del videocorso
Alba Grazioli è responsabile editoriale e fondatrice di Geeko Editor, casa editrice digitale. Si occupa di editing dei testi e consulenze editoriali; inoltre è web designer e cura la creazione di contenuti per i social e per il sito. Da anni organizza eventi culturali, presentazioni di libri e corsi di formazione.

Marianna Brogi è scrittrice e copywriter. Il suo primo romanzo, Scrivi, è stato pubblicato da Geeko Editor nel 2018. Ha inoltre pubblicato numerosi racconti e articoli su riviste letterarie e antologie. Si occupa di scrittura creativa e scrittura per il web per aziende e privati.

Elenco delle lezioni
A come Allenamento - Come sviluppare e organizzare un programma di scrittura
B come Blog - Come creare un blog originale e strutturare un calendario editoriale
C come Casa editrice – Guida alle varie tipologie di case editrici
D come Dialoghi - Come scrivere dialoghi efficaci e naturali
E come Editing - Cos'è l'editing di un testo, modalità e utilità per un autore esordiente
F come Facebook - Come promuoversi su Facebook
G come Genere narrativo - I generi letterari e i loro elementi
H come Hashtag e Instagram - Come promuoversi su Instagram
I come Immagini – Come creare un racconto per immagini
J come Jakobson – Funzioni comunicative e stili di scrittura
K come Keep calm e taglia! - Il labor limae nella revisione del testo
L come Libri e lettori - Come creare libri cartacei, digitali e audiobook
M come Metanarrativa - Cos'è la metanarrazione, come e quando utilizzarla
N come Norme compositive - Come riconoscere e utilizzare le principali norme compositive del racconto
O come Ostacolo come motore narrativo - L'uso degli ostacoli all'interno dei meccanismi narrativi
P come Presentazioni, eventi e fiere - Come organizzare un evento letterario
Q come Qualità – Self-publishing: cosa ti serve per autopubblicare il tuo libro
R come Redazione – Il lavoro all'interno di una casa editrice e come collaborare con una realtà editoriale
S come Struttura narrativa - Conoscere i meccanismi narrativi delle storie
T come Trama - Come strutturare una trama efficace
U come Universo narrativo - Come dare forma ad ambientazione e personaggi
V come Video - L'importanza dei video nella promozione: booktrailer, dirette e storie
W come Web - Come fare rete e creare collaborazioni con book blogger
X come Xanax – Come mantenere la calma nei momenti bui
Y come Youtube - Come promuoversi su Youtube
Z come Zero idee - Superare il terribile blocco dello scrittore
target_audience: Scrittori esordienti
Aspiranti scrittori
