How to promote and sell art on Instagram

requirements: There are no prerequisites for hobby-artists or professional artists
courses.description:
From your Studio to the Buyers. This course will help you develop your idea into a final painting, and to understand how to have a strong digital presence.
Many people who are good with brushes and colours have a hard time developing an original thought for their painting. What to draw is a question more dreaded than how to draw. You can learn how to recreate an artwork by watching a YouTube tutorial, but how do you come up with a concept so that your artwork is unique? This course is an in-depth study of how you can come up with an idea for your artwork, and how you can develop that idea into an original artwork of your own.

Developing a concept is all about asking yourself the right questions. Once you have the right questions you can start on your journey of finding answers. This is what this course will help you with. Sangeeta will share her journey of how she drafted my questions that led her to find answers for her painting. You’ll learn
How to decide the theme of your artwork
How to research to finalise a subject for your artwork
How to develop your concept by working on various iterations of your artwork and come up with a final layout
In the second half of the course you'll learn what to do once you have an artwork or a series of artworks ready. You cannot just keep your work in your studio, right? This course offers all the necessary details you need to work on in order to sell your paintings.

Avantika, the social media strategist of Shuruart will help you learn
How to write an artist statement
How to write an art description
How to take pictures of your painting
How to edit your pictures so that you can share your work on Social Media
Promoting your art on digital platforms
target_audience: Visual arts students pursuing Bachelor of Fine Arts or Master of Fine Arts
Students of painting who want to become an artist
Hobby artists who are thinking of an art career
And established artists who want to sell their paintings online

courses.title: Profumi per l'Anima: Aromaterapia Emozionale
courses.bio: Scopri il Potere Trasformativo degli Oli Essenziali per il Benessere Emotivo e Spirituale
objectives: Comprendere come gli oli essenziali influenzano le emozioni attraverso il sistema limbico.
Imparare a utilizzare specifici oli essenziali per migliorare il benessere emotivo.
Sviluppare rituali personali con l'aromaterapia per il benessere quotidiano.
Creare miscele personalizzate di oli essenziali per esigenze emotive specifiche.
Utilizzare gli oli essenziali per modulare le emozioni e migliorare il benessere.
Creare rituali personali per il rilassamento, la gioia e la concentrazione.
Scegliere e combinare oli essenziali per affrontare specifiche esigenze emotive.
Integrare l'aromaterapia in una routine quotidiana per una vita più equilibrata e serena.
requirements: Interesse per il benessere olistico e le pratiche naturali.
Apertura a sperimentare tecniche nuove e naturali per il benessere.
Capacità di seguire indicazioni pratiche e teoriche.
Motivazione a sviluppare pratiche personali per il benessere emotivo.
courses.description:
Benvenuto/a Sei mai stato/a trasportato/a in un ricordo lontano, semplicemente sentendo un profumo? Forse l'odore di pino ti ha riportato alle passeggiate nella foresta, o l'aroma di vaniglia ti ha fatto rivivere l'infanzia. Questo non è solo un gioco della mente; è il potere dell'olfatto, che tocca le corde più profonde del nostro essere.
L'aromaterapia emozionale è più di una semplice pratica di benessere; è una porta verso la trasformazione interiore. Immagina di poter utilizzare il profumo per calmare la mente, sollevare lo spirito o concentrarti meglio. Questo corso ti guiderà in ogni passo di questo percorso, esplorando come gli oli essenziali possano influenzare le emozioni, la memoria e persino i tuoi sogni.
In questo corso, non solo imparerai le proprietà di specifici oli essenziali, ma ti insegnerò anche come crearne combinazioni personalizzate, che rispondano alle tue esigenze emotive. Sia che tu voglia trovare calma dopo una giornata stressante o risvegliare la tua energia al mattino, troverai le risposte che cerchi.
Ma non ci fermeremo qui. Andremo più a fondo, esplorando la storia e le tradizioni che stanno dietro all'uso degli oli essenziali, scoprendo come le antiche culture hanno utilizzato questi preziosi elisir per comunicare con il divino e per guarire l'anima. Ti insegnerò anche a integrare l'aromaterapia nella tua vita quotidiana attraverso rituali personali che non solo migliorano il tuo benessere fisico, ma ti connettono profondamente con te stesso.
Che tu sia un principiante o un esperto, questo corso è progettato per offrirti strumenti pratici e conoscenze approfondite che potrai applicare subito nella tua vita. E ricorda, l'aromaterapia non è solo una pratica; è un viaggio sensoriale che può trasformare la tua vita in modi che non avresti mai immaginato.
Unisciti a me in questo viaggio profumato e scopri come gli oli essenziali possono diventare i tuoi alleati più preziosi nel cammino verso la serenità e l'armonia interiore.
target_audience: Persone interessate al benessere emotivo e alla crescita personale.
Appassionati di pratiche naturali e olistiche.
Professionisti del benessere alla ricerca di nuovi strumenti per i loro clienti.
Chiunque desideri integrare l'aromaterapia nella propria vita quotidiana.

courses.title: Kỹ năng đặt câu hỏi
courses.bio: Hiểu mình, hiểu đời từ những câu hỏi sâu sắc
objectives: Biết rõ quy trình để tạo ra một câu hỏi tốt

Bản chất của câu hỏi: Câu hỏi mở ra điều gì?

Đưa kỹ năng đặt câu hỏi vào cuộc sống

7 lỗi sai phổ biến nhất khi đặt câu hỏi
Sách hay về kỹ năng đặt câu hỏi
Cẩn thận với 4 câu hỏi dễ thao túng tâm lý

requirements: Mong muốn kết nối lại với sự tò mò của bản thân và muốn nâng cao khả năng đặt câu hỏi
courses.description:
Không một đứa bé nào cần người lớn dạy cho cách đặt câu hỏi. Sự tò mò là món quà của mọi đứa trẻ.
Tuy vậy, trong quá trình lớn lên và trưởng thành. Chúng ta đa phần không còn đặt ra những câu hỏi, không còn quá nhiều thắc mắc nữa? Đâu là nguyên nhân của vấn đề này?
Nhiều vấn đề trong cuộc sống sẽ không còn là vấn đề nếu chúng ta có khả năng dừng lại và đặt câu hỏi phù hợp. Nhưng mà, làm sao để đặt được câu hỏi đúng? câu hỏi tốt?
Mà, tại sao lại có khóa học này?
Vì mình, Vui Lên, là người hướng dẫn bạn trong khóa học này, đã nhận được quá nhiều những câu hỏi mà bản thân mình không biết phải trả lời thế nào. Phần vì câu hỏi quá tệ, phần vì sự nghiêm túc để đặt ra câu hỏi là không nhiều? Nhưng quan trọng hơn là người đặt câu hỏi cũng không có nhiều ý thức về câu hỏi mà mình đang đặt ra cho đối phương.
Thật khó cho người hỏi, và cả người trả lời.
Vậy nên mình phải làm khóa học này, dành cho ai đó đang cần. Mình mong là bạn có thể kết nối lại với sự tò mò bên trong, đồng thời biết cách để đặt ra những câu hỏi thật hay, thật nhiều cảm hứng khiến bạn phải bắt tay vào tìm kiếm câu trả lời.
Một câu hỏi thiếu đi hành động thì sẽ trở thành lí thuyết xuông, hoặc một lời phàn nàn. Một câu hỏi khiến bạn hành động, đó là câu hỏi tạo sự thay đổi cả ở bên trong và bên ngoài. Nghe có hấp dẫn chút nào hông?
target_audience: Nếu bạn muốn cải thiện kỹ năng giao tiếp thông qua kỹ năng đặt câu hỏi
Nếu bạn muốn tạo ra thật nhiều câu hỏi chất lượng cho công việc sáng tạo nội dung
Nếu bạn đã từng không nhận được câu trả lời từ người khác khi đặt câu hỏi
Nếu bạn muốn tạo ra được những câu hỏi chất lượng, sâu sắc

courses.title: Writemoo 犢創團：協助你按部就班完成第一個故事！
courses.bio: 從日常溝通、公司簡報到藝文創作，其實都在說「故事」；故事說得好不好，影響比你想得更大！
objectives: 從學校的報告、公司的簡報、電視的廣告到戲院的電影，全都是用不同方法在「說故事」。
我們在閱聽經驗中常能很直覺自然地接受故事，在創作時卻不是那麼回事；這是因為大多數讀者並不明白「故事」的組成元素，而在這樣的情況下就開始嘗試創作了。
這系列課程能讓學員學習組成故事的五個元素各自有什麼意義、特性，以及設定時該注意的事項。具備這些基本知識，能在創作前及創作時提供重要的協助。
或許您沒打算成為劇作家或小說家，但明白「故事」的組成及「說故事」的技巧，將為日常生活裡的種種溝通及說明奠定良好基礎。

故事是用哪些元素組成的？: 寫故事之前，得先知道：故事是用哪些元素組成的？（上）
寫故事之前，得先知道：故事是用哪些元素組成的？（下）
勾引讀者、指引作者：前提（上）
勾引讀者、指引作者：前提（下）
讓作品獨一無二的靈魂：主題
最能吸引讀者興趣的部分：情節
別忘了戲是在哪裡演的：場景
聽聽前輩怎麼說：黑澤明
替自己指出一個前進的方向，給讀者一個持續的誘惑：設計前提: 別人寫的故事，前提都不止一個！？
支線事件需要先想前提嗎？
好結局讓作品起死回生
故事要能獨一無二，得有自己的靈魂：設定主題: 主題是故事隱藏的核心
同一類型的故事，主題是不是都一樣？
設定主題時要把握什麼重點？
還沒想好主題但好想先寫，可以嗎？
演出的戲臺可信，戲才會可信：設定場景: 設定「時間」時的注意事項
設定「空間」時要注意什麼？
可以在故事行進間變動時空設定嗎？
如果故事發生在非現實的場景裡……？
聽聽前輩怎麼說：史蒂芬‧金
Q&A：如何寫出具有說服力的場景？
故事不是講出來的，是演出來的：設定角色: 引導讀者進入故事的關鍵
讓他動起來！挑戰角色的價值觀
讓讀者對角色產生同理心
利用主題製造角色特色
有沒有幫手？有沒有對手？
用對白展現角色個性，選擇合適的敘事人稱
讀者對故事的主要認知：設定情節: 從設定好的前提發展情節
從設定好的主題發展情節
設計情節時要注意的重點！
聽聽前輩怎麼說：雷‧布萊伯利
開始動筆！讓故事乖乖成形的好方法：擬定大綱！: 擬大綱之前請先準備……（上）
擬出情節流程圖，進行文字化
檢查架構及「三幕劇」的概念
檢查閱讀節奏：太拖？太急？太卡？還是太隨便？
檢查情節合不合理：不要亂用作者威能啊！
Q&A：依照大綱，寫到一半卻卡住了，怎麼辦？
真實範例：短篇小說〈四點五十五〉大綱擬定過程示範: 原初的發想：故事的源頭是從哪兒來的？
把流程圖文字化，然後開始寫吧！
寫作計劃及投稿建議: 日常練習：有些事常做，它就會變成習慣的一部分～
先寫再修：寫了才有東西可以修改，不寫就都是空談！
擬定計劃：這樣就算白天有別的工作，也可以快速接續進度！
聽聽前輩怎麼說：溤內果

requirements: 可以到 Google Play 或 Apple Store 免費下載【Writemoo 犢創】app，上傳自己的作品並且觀摩其他創作。
課程中的大綱擬定實例，使用的作品是【Writemoo 犢創】中的〈四點五十五〉，請學員在上課前自行閱讀。
courses.description:
每次溝通，其實都在講故事。
故事講得好，溝通就有效。從日常對話、工作簡報，一直到小說漫畫影集電影之類藝文作品，在做的都是「利用講故事來溝通」。這門課將解釋「故事」組成的基本元素，以及架構故事的技法；雖以創作小說為前提，但對所有溝通任務而言，都是極重要的參考。
大家試過自己寫故事嗎？

故事在腦子裡想像的時候都很不錯呀，為什麼寫的過程和結果沒法子盡如人意？

有一個很重要的原因可能是：大家或許讀了不少故事，但沒有好好地想過，「故事」其實是有些基本組成元素的。
就像一碗滷肉飯。
吃滷肉飯的時候，我們都覺得理所當然，但要做滷肉飯，我們就得去面對一些非準備不可的材料，經過一定的料理程序，才能把那碗大家吃起來覺得很順理成章的滷肉飯做出來。
「犢創團」本期的課程共有四堂，會向大家解說「故事」基本組成的元素，以及簡單的大綱設計方法，也就是做滷肉飯的材料，以及入門的料理方式。
搞清楚這些，大家才知道要去準備什麼、練習什麼，就有可能寫出好看又有內容的故事。
等到大家熟練了，就可以自己找到自己最合適的方式來說故事，寫出最有自己風格的故事，甚至完成一個既顛覆傳統又能讓讀者嘆服的故事。
大家要知道：上完課之後，並不代表有個故事會自動完成；要完成一個故事，必須要實際動手去寫，無論這個故事是長是短，如果不開始寫，它就不會在現實當中存在。
我建議大家在上完課之後多做練習、多聽意見，到「犢創Writemoo」的平臺上發表自己的作品，並且利用這個平臺觀摩別人的創作。你可以在搜尋引擎輸入「Writemoo 犢創」，也可以在 Google Play 或 Apple Store 找到 app 下載。
我們開始吧。
target_audience: 本課程針對想要在各種領域架構「故事」的學員學習入門的基本技法，包括小說、漫畫、戲劇、電視電影以及遊戲產業工作者。
本課程亦適用於希望自己能夠流暢、有架構，並且吸引聽眾注意力地進行說明、簡報或討論的所有工作者。

courses.title: How to Improve your Drawing/Paintings & Artistic Skills
courses.bio: This course is a complete guideline to improve art,drawing and painting skills step by step

How to Improve your Artistic skills
How to improve watercolour painting as a beginners
How to improve Art skills

courses.description:
Hello everyone welcome to this course.  In this course I will give you complete guidance to improve your artistic,  drawing and painting skills step by step.  Because Getting better at drawing can seem really difficult, but you'll work to enhance your drawing skills and become a far better artist. Build up your fundamental drawing skills by that specialize in basic lines, shapes, and dealing with different mediums. you'll also use training exercises to challenge yourself and improve your skills. additionally to practice, it’s also important that you simply develop a discipline so you’re continuously working and improving.
Does it appear to be a particularly slow progress for you to enhance in your artistic skills? Are you an inspiring beginner who craves to urge better at painting, drawing, sculpture or the other art form? Or possibly you are looking for a faster thanks to reach the extent you would like . Either way, this guide will aid in your journey. And also I will teach you how to improve your painting skills because Painting may be a great hobby which will alleviate stress and anxiety, and may be a great outlet for creativity. There are a spread of various sorts of paint that each one have their own characteristics, but watercolor is one among the toughest to master because it dries fast, and leaves little room for error. However, if you develop an honest technique and have the proper tools the sky is the limit on what you'll paint.
And also I will teach you improve your art skills. Because Improving your art skills takes passion and dedication. Whether you would like to be knowledgeable artist or simply get specialized at a replacement hobby, you'll create thoughtful, highly-skilled art with a touch patience and much of practice. You’ll got to develop a daily routine to practice and have an open mind about taking over new skills and experimenting with old ones. Training your eyes to ascertain the planet like an artist also will assist you create realistic pieces or work with light, shadows, and composition during a novel, creative way. Art is meant to be unique, so celebrate and don’t recoil from breaking the rules!
target_audience: Anyone can take this course
Students who want to improve their artistic skills

courses.title: İnsan Figürü Çizimi Resim Kursu | Human Figure Drawing
courses.bio: Kolay ve Pratik Yöntemlerle Figür Çizimi Yapın! Gereksiz tekrarlara düşmeden, hızlandırılmış doğrudan öğrenmeye odaklı!
objectives: İnsan figürü çizimi ile ilgili temel bilgiler
İnsan figür çiziminde kullanılan modellemeler

requirements: Resim çizmeyi sevmek ve bu konuda istekli olmak
courses.description:
Merhaba Arkadaşlar;
Figür çizimi resim alanındaki en ilgi çekici temalardan biridir. Ressamın yetkinliğini ortaya koyabilmesi açısından da iyi bir sınama alanıdır. Çünkü çizgiler ve formlar arasındaki uyum, izleyen kişiye ve ressama çok yakın olan bir gerçekliği açığa çıkarır. Yani bir başka konuda göze batmayacak bir hata, burada çok belirgin olacaktır. Genel olarak figür, resimdeki canlı öğelerdir, özelde ise insandır. Bu yüzden figürü doğru çizebilmek resmimizi daha kaliteli ve daha güzel hale getirecektir. Bu amaçla sizler için ayrıntılı ve özenle hazırlanmış içerikle dolu bir kurs hazırladım.
Bu kurs sizlere;
İnsan figürü çizimi ile ilgili temel bilgileri verecek,
Figür çizimi yaparken hangi modellemeler kullanacağımız anlatılacak,
İtinayla seçilmiş ve derlenmiş bilgilerle figürü oluşturan parçalar tek tek incelenecek,
Uygulamalar ve örneklerle figür çizimleri aşama aşama gösterilecek,
Bu sayede pratik ve etkili figür çizimleri yapabileceksiniz.
Ayrıca ödevler, dökümanlar ve destekleyici çalışmalar, hem mail hem de sosyal medya hesaplarım aracılığıyla kursla bağlantınız hep canlı kalmaya devam edecek.
Resime gönül verenler, kendini bu alanda geliştirmek isteyenler, sağlam bir temelim olsun diyenler, resim sınavlarına hazırlananlar hepinizi kursuma bekliyorum.
***
Hello friends;
Figure drawing is one of the most interesting themes in the field of painting. It is also a good test area for the painter to reveal his competence. Because the harmony between lines and forms reveals a reality that is very close to the viewer and the painter. In other words, an unobtrusive mistake in another matter will be very evident here. In general, the figure is the living element in painting, and in particular, it is a human being. Therefore, being able to draw the figure correctly will make our painting better quality and more beautiful. For this purpose, I have prepared a detailed and carefully prepared course full of content for you. You will be able to benefit from my course and have a unique experience without subtitles.
target_audience: Resim çizmeye meraklı herkes

courses.description:
Zentangle Desenleri Çizimi Atölyesi | Orta Seviye Eğitimi ile çizim yeteneğinizi geliştirin.
Eğer Temel Seviye Zentangle Eğitimi aldıysan veya çizimle uğraşmayı seviyor ve kendini biraz daha karmaşık şekillerin dünyasına kaptırmak istiyorsan bu kurs tam sana göre :)
Birlikte yine çok güzel desenler öğrenip , kompozisyon oluşturacağız.
Neler Öğreneceğiz;
Araç gereç eğitimi (Temel seviye hatırlatma)
Gölgelendirme tekniğiyle çizimlerde üç boyut etkisi oluşturma (Temel seviye hatırlatma)
Desen çalışması-desen oluşturma püf noktaları
Kompozisyon oluşturma
Bu kursta harika zentangle desenleri çizip, kompozisyonlar oluşturacaksınız. Temel seviye eğitimle bir kenara bırakmış olduğunuz önyargılarınız  aynen olduğu yerde kalsın :) Çok keyifli desenler öğreneceğiz çünkü. Yaratıcılığımız bir üst seviyeye çıkacak olup, birlikte çok keyifli vakit geçireceğiz.
Zentangle Eğlencelidir , Neden mi?
Çünkü;
Desenleri oluştururken günlük hayatınızdan ayrılır , dikkatli ve yaratıcı bir dünyaya girersiniz.
Herkes kolaylıkla yapabilir, sanata yatkınlığınızın olmasına gerek yoktur. Bitmiş kompozisyon zor ve karmaşık görünse de adım adım ilerleyeceğimiz için yapması çok kolaydır.
Adım adım yönlendirmelerin sonunda sürpriz sonlu sonuçları elde ettiğinizde siz bile kendinize inanamayacaksınız.
Her seferinde sonsuz kombinasyonun içinden birini yaptığınız için farklı sonuçlar elde edeceksiniz.
Zentangle Stres Kovucudur;
Çünkü;
Dinlendiricidir,
Rahatlatıcıdır,
Meditatif bir aktivitedir,
Ruhu ve bedeni sakinleştirir.
Stresi azaltır.
Sağlığınızı güçlendirir.


Kimler için uygun;
Zihnini sakinleştirmek isteyen
Hayata başka bir açıdan bakmak isteyen
Farkındalığını arttırmak isteyen
Zentangle kompozisyonları oluşturmak isteyen
Yeni bir hobi edinmek isteyen veya hobisini bir üst seviyeye çıkarmak isteyen
Stresten arınmak isteyen herkes için uygundur.
target_audience: Çizime meraklı, zentangle çizim yeteneğini geliştirmek isteyen herkes için uygundur.
Sadece bir kağıt ve kalemle gevşemek ve rahatlamak isteyen herkes için uygundur.
Temel seviye eğitimini tamamlayıp yeni desen çizimleri öğrenmek isteyen herkes için uygundur.

courses.title: CARPINTERÍA. Qué ensambles utilizar , juntas de madera.
courses.bio: Curso sobre las uniones en madera , fundamentales en la construcción de elementos de madera
objectives: la carpintería y ebanistería para disfrutar de la madera

Introducción: 3d ejemplos de caja y espiga de testa
4 ensambles para la carpintería de armar

requirements: sólo ganas de aprender y disfruta trabajando
courses.description:
En este curso de carpintería y ebanistería vas a aprender   LOS ENSAMBLES  o llamado también LAS UNIONES EN MADERA o LAS JUNTAS  EN MADERA para realizar correctamente  una construcción de carpintería o ebanistería ,  porque quieres saber más sobre la madera, porque te interesa todo lo relacionado con el oficio, porque has empezado una vez solo a trabajar en tu taller y no sabes cómo seguir pero tienes ganas de saber más o bien porque quieres ser un futuro profesional.
Mi objetivo es claro, enseñarte los pasos a seguir para desarrollar tu proyecto y que vayas asimilando la teoría y la práctica del oficio.
Te añado también  una bibliografía sobre algunos libros que puedes comprar o consultar en bibliotecas o por internet y que son interesantes sobre el oficio, así podrás  acompañar las clases y entender mejor el oficio.

Te aconsejo dedicar unas 3 horas semanales como mínimo para aprender poco a poco cómo se trabaja con las distintas herramientas y empezar a disfrutar de ellas y de la madera.Es un oficio muy placentero pero requiere dedicación.
Aquí te presento este  curso  para que vayas  conociendo los primeros pasos a seguir en LA CONSTRUCCIÓN. Por supuesto que hay materia para años si quieres, depende mucho del tiempo que puedas dedicar a ello. Por eso, iré presentando varios trabajos diferentes y en distintos cursos así podrás ir aprendiendo a tu ritmo  lo que más te guste.  por ejemplo: cómo fabricar una caja con colas de milano, como realizar un marco con ensambles en horquilla, como fabricar tu banco de carpintero o bien como realizar una  marquetería.
Espero que disfrutes de la madera como yo  lo sigo haciendo desde más de 35 años.
Un saludo. Jean Baptiste Van den Heede, ebanista.
target_audience: toda persona amante de la madera

courses.title: How to Write a Dark Fantasy Novel for Beginners
courses.bio: Plan and Write Your First Dark Fantasy Novel!
objectives: Structure and plot a dark fantasy story
Find inspiration for story ideas
Develop interesting characters that fit the genre
Improve protagonists and antagonists
Write dark visuals
Express the harsh reality of dark fantasy
Write a dark fantasy novel

Writing a Dark Fantasy Novel: Introduction to Writing a Dark Fantasy Novel
The Harsh Reality of Dark Fantasy Stories
How to End a Dark Fantasy
Conclusion to Writing a Dark Fantasy Novel

requirements: No requirements to take this course
courses.description:
Hello Writer!
Welcome to the course where I show you how to write a grim, gripping dark fantasy novel that will keep your readers interested. Don't make the same mistakes that so many novice authors make and create a dark fantasy novel that can challenge those of successful authors!


My name is Matthew Dewey and I am a writer. It is hard to say when my passion for writing began, but if I can recall it all started back in primary school. A small child with not much to say, but plenty to write, or in most cases scribble, across a page. From there writing became a hobby, moving on to become a part-time job writing articles on various subjects from technology to programming. Suddenly, the spark was ignited and I wrote my first novel. From there I was hooked onto something that was akin to a calling.
Enough monologue, it is time to tell you what this course is worth to you. First, this course was created with the express intention to teach the fundamentals of writing a dark fantasy novel. In my rising through the writing world I found that information was handed freely, but not with enough dedication and forethought. The advice lacking and the examples poor. I decided to push through and after several years developed my own toolkit that is simple and multipurpose. The first and most important lesson I learned was how not to write a dark fantasy novel. From there I experimented and found the positives.
In addition to the research, I also write from experience, having written several stories and articles on the subject.
I will show you how to:
Structure and plot a dark fantasy story
Find inspiration for story ideas
Develop interesting characters that fit the genre
Improve protagonists and antagonists
Write dark visuals
Express the harsh reality of dark fantasy
AND many tips and advice to add to your writing arsenal!
Welcome to the Writing a Dark Fantasy Novel for Beginners! I will show what you need to know to develop an interesting Dark Fantasy novel and take it from boring to exciting! It's a course that will provide you with constant professional help and help you write the book you've dreamt of!
"Writing is a powerful form of art, but it is the reader's imagination that is the canvas, not the page."
target_audience: Writers
Writing Students
Beginner Writers

courses.title: Curso de Cuento Literario: la guía definitiva
courses.bio: Los elementos de narrativa y sus posibilidades.
objectives: Aprendizaje de nociones de cuento desde distintos autores.
Identificación y empleo de los elementos narrativos y sus posibilidades para la escritura de historias.
Reconocimiento de la forma y el fondo (tema y contenido) como posibilidades de creación que dan valor agregado a los escritos.
Construcción de una ruta de lecturas para el aprendizaje autónomo.

Nociones y definición de cuento: Breve cuento de la historia del cuento
Características del cuento moderno: Epifanía, Tesis sobre el cuento y Exigencias del cuento moderno
Estructuras del cuento: Estructuras: Un movimiento, dos momentos, tres momentos.
La esfera y temas que se configuran como estructuras
Tipos de narrador: Modos de la narración y pacto ficcional
Narrador en segunda, tercera persona y multiperspectivismo
El personaje: La persona, arquetipos y tipos de personajes
Vladimir Proop, psicología y la ficha del personaje
El espacio, el tiempo, la atmósfera: El espacio, el tiempo, la atmósfera

requirements: Es necesario conocer lo básico en redacción.
courses.description:
¿Qué es un cuento?, ¿cómo lo definen distintos escritores?, ¿cuáles son sus características?, ¿qué es la significación, la intensidad, la tensión y la epifanía?, ¿qué es una estructura?, ¿cómo se construye?, ¿cómo se debe empezar?, ¿cómo terminar el relato?, ¿qué tipos de narradores existen?, ¿qué es el pacto ficcional?, ¿cuál es el narrador?, ¿qué es el personaje?, ¿qué debo tener en cuenta para su construcción?, ¿qué es el espacio, el tiempo, el cronotopo?, ¿cómo se crea una atmósfera?, ¿qué es el hilo conductor?, ¿cómo confluyen forma y fondo en las creaciones literarias? Y finalmente, ¿qué es un microcuento?, ¿y cuál es su diferencia con el cuento? En este curso de cuento literario encontrarás una serie de elementos que buscan responder estas preguntas y que puedes tener en cuenta a la hora de escribir relatos.
Además de conocer el género y sus características, en este curso aprenderás el empleo de elementos de narrativa como la creación de estructuras, los tipos de narrador, la creación de personajes, del espacio, del tiempo y la atmósfera, el hilo conductor y el uso de la amalgama de la forma y el fondo, como elementos para la escritura de microcuentos. En el penúltimo capítulo se ofrecerá una pequeña ruta de lecturas recomendadas a partir de temáticas específicas.
target_audience: Personas que quieran aprender a escribir.
Personas interesadas en escritura literaria.
Personas interesadas en escritura creativa.
Personas interesadas en escribir narrativa.
Personas interesadas en aprender narrativa.

courses.title: Master the 5 Key Elements of Story
courses.bio: Understand what makes a story so you can make your story great.
requirements: You'll get more from the class if you have a draft of a story you can work with, but none is required.
courses.description:
Writers of story-driven fiction or memoir often pay too much attention to crafting beautiful sentences. It's not that poetic lines aren't appealing, but story is way more important. Can you think of any very successful novels that were horribly "written"? Their success came from their storytelling.
This short course provides an introduction to the key elements necessary for every story and for every scene in your story. If you want to craft stories that have momentum, that readers cannot set down, you need to understand what a story really is. Ensuing courses in my Momentum series go into much more depth, but this course is the foundation.
target_audience: Both beginning and seasoned storytellers can benefit from a deeper understanding of story.

courses.title: How to Make an Impressive PowerPoint Presentation!
courses.bio: A guide to making an excellent Power Point presentation with step-by-step help in every aspect of the presentation.
objectives: How to make PowerPoint Presentations that are effective in communication
Enhance communication skills.
Get the message across with its intended purpose.
To be thorough in your subject matter by presenting your data.
Gain confidence in in presentations

Outline of the Course: Outline of the talk, Topic, Delivery and Content
Outline of the Talk, Topic and Delivery
Preparation: Preparation - outline, order, transitions and rehearsals
Choices and Examples: Choices in Designs, Colors and Fonts and Example slides
2 Example Talks: The History of Microbiology in a Nutshell

requirements: PowerPoint program installed
Opportunities for public speaking
courses.description:
This is a Course in creating your own PowerPoint presentation in excellent quality in such a way that it leaves an impression on the audience. This can be done by providing the presenter with insights and strategies related to the presenter himself or herself, to the PowerPoint slides, to the talk, and to the audience. The lessons offer tips, suggestions and guidance from making the topic interesting, making the seminar into a story, to practical planning, such as preparation, rehearsals and timing to content presentation. Choosing the font and background colors as well as  slide transitions are also explained. It is based on proven work done by the author that has earned her several awards.
Whether you are in classroom setting or at a workplace, whether you need to give a thesis defence or need to market a product or service, powerpoint presentations have been pretty much the norm of communication for an audience. This Course serves only as a guide and thus, one can use his or her own choices and tweak the presentation to fit their needs, wants, and personalities. It is my hope that this Course will build up skills of public speaking and confidence during a talk.
target_audience: Those at work or in studies who are either required or asked to give a PowerPoint presentation related to a specific topic.
Those who own their own business and would like to expand it through seminars.
Graduate students who are about to give a thesis or dissertation seminars.
Not intended for those who have other means of communicating the same message.
Anyone who wants to overcome timidity while speaking in front of an audience.

courses.title: PROSES KREATIF. Pelajari cara-cara pemunculan ide kreatif !!
courses.bio: Pahami proses berpikir para jenius kreatif untuk idea generation dan problem solving. Karena ide adalah awal dari semua.
objectives: Memahami tahapan proses kreatif dan hal-hal terkait dengannya berdasarkan beragam studi sains.
Memahami peran penting dari persepsi, atensi, dan imajinasi dalam proses kreatif.
Memahami cara mengubah atau menajamkan persepsi, atensi, dan imajinasi melalui teknik-teknik yang mudah diimplementasikan.
Memahami proses munculnya ide kreatif dan dapat memunculkan alternatif ide yang lebih banyak untuk menyelesaikan masalah.
Memahami cara kerja imajinasi, dan menggunakannya untuk memunculkan ide-ide yang lebih banyak dan unik untuk pemecahan masalah..
Memahami peran penting dari skill atau keahlian dalam suatu bidang untuk dapat mewujudkan ide-ide kreatif yang sudah dihasilkan.
Memahami peran penting pengetahuan / knowledge dalam peningkatan kreativitas.
Mengetahui korelasi antara gangguan mental dengan kreativitas seseorang.

Imajinasi: Tips Mempertajam Imajinasi Untuk Meningkatkan Kreativitas. Bagian 1.
Tips Mempertajam Imajinasi Untuk Meningkatkan Kreativitas. Bagian 2.
Tips Mempertajam Imajinasi Untuk Meningkatkan Kreativitas. Bagian 3.

requirements: Sangat direkomendasikan sudah mengambil / mendapatkan materi dari kelas kreativitas pertama : "Mendefinisikan Kreativitas. Dasar untuk jadi lebih kreatif."
courses.description:
Dalam menciptakan sebuah karya, proses apa yang sebenarnya terjadi di dalam kepala kita ? Apa saja aspek-aspek yang dapat mempengaruhi seseorang dalam pemunculan ide ? Kenapa sebagian orang bisa terlihat begitu banyak memunculkan ide-ide kreatif, dan sebagian lagi tidak ? Apakah kita bisa seperti mereka para jenius kreatif ?
Kelas ini membahas mengenai proses kreatif secara mendalam. Dalam domain kreativitas, sudut pandang proses merupakan sudut pandang yang paling banyak diteliti secara sains. Karena kreativitas merupakan proses kognitif biasa yang dapat dimiliki oleh semua orang, asalkan mau mempelajarinya. Dan bila kita mengetahui proses / cara berpikir para jenius kreatif yang namanya tercatat dalam sejarah, maka kita dapat mempelajari serta meniru proses kreatif atau teknik-teknik berpikir kreatif dari mereka.
Dalam proses kreatif, seseorang menggunakan beragam proses mental, pikiran sadar, dan pengetahuannya. Persepsi, atensi, dan imajinasi merupakan aspek penting dalam hal tersebut. Meningkatkan kemampuan ataupun ketajaman dari persepsi, atensi, dan imajinasi telah terbukti secara sains dapat membuat level kreativitas seseorang menjadi lebih tinggi.
Kelas ini juga membahas secara mendalam mengenai persepsi, atensi, dan imajinasi berdasarkan sains. Termasuk cara atau teknik-teknik tertentu untuk menajamkan ketiganya. Dengan menggunakan teknik-teknik tersebut, ide-ide yang dimunculkan akan dapat menjadi lebih banyak. Dan pada akhirnya dapat membuat kreativitas menjadi meningkat.
Tanpa kreativitas dan penciptaan karya-karya kreatif, kemajuan peradaban mustahil dapat terjadi. Kreativitas merupakan potensi dasar manusia yang sudah ada di dalam diri setiap individu. Hanya saja, banyak dari kita memilih untuk mengabaikannya, dan tidak mendalami misterinya lebih jauh. Rangkaian kelas kreativitas ini mencoba menggali banyak hal mengenai keajaiban kreativitas yang seringkali disalah pahami. Termasuk korelasi gangguan mental dan kreativitas.
Menjadi kreatif bukanlah hal yang instan, namun sebuah proses. Mari berproses menjadi kreatif bersama, menjadi lebih produktif di lingkungan manapun Anda berada, berkontribusi dengan karya-karya kreatif, dan berbahagia di dalam proses tersebut.
target_audience: Pekerja/pegawai, pebisnis/pengusaha, graphic designer, content maker, mahasiswa, pelajar, coach, trainer, HRD, motivator, influencer, youtuber, penulis, komikus, dan siapa saja yang ingin memahami kreativitas secara mendalam.
Anda yang sangat ingin tahu ataupun berminat pada domain kreativitas, dan ingin menjadi lebih kreatif.
Anda yang memerlukan cara-cara praktis untuk dapat memunculkan ide-ide kreatif yang lebih banyak, unik, dan orisinal.
Para pelaku industri kreatif yang umumnya erat berhubungan dengan imajinasi dan pemunculan ide.
Siapapun yang ingin mempraktekkan kreativitas berbasis studi sains dan ingin menerapkannya dalam beragam aspek kehidupan.

Aqui você vai descobrir o passo-a-passo para fazer seu filme, quais são as pessoas que você precisa, como captar recursos e como distribuir seu filme. courses.title: Origami Challenge: Fold, Create, Amaze
courses.bio: From simple to spectacular — build your paper skills and wow your friends
objectives: How to fold a variety of fun and impressive origami models — from simple hearts to modular cubes and classic cranes
Step-by-step techniques to follow instructions, stay focused, and solve folding challenges
Ways to express creativity and develop patience, persistence, and a sense of achievement
Tips to turn paper-folding into a relaxing, screen-free habit that boosts brainpower

5-Minutes Origami Memory & Brain Trainin: Useful 5-Minutes Origami Memory & Brain Training Tips using Origami
Origami Mastery & Challenge Yourself: Star Wars X-wing Starfighter Paper Sculpture

requirements: No previous origami experience needed — just a willingness to learn and have fun!
A few sheets of square paper (any kind will do to get started)
A flat surface and some quiet time to fold and focus
Optional: colored or patterned paper to make your creations pop
courses.description:
Unlock Your Creativity and Boost Your Brainpower with Origami!
Ready to fold something awesome? This hands-on origami course is the perfect way to boost your creativity, sharpen your brain, and make something cool — all with just a piece of paper.
Origami isn't just fun — it’s also a secret superpower! Behind every fold, you're building focus, logic, spatial skills, and creative confidence. From classrooms to space labs, origami is used in design, engineering, and even medicine. Now it’s your turn to dive into this smart and satisfying art form.
Who Is This Course For?
Teens and students who love to create, think, and try new things
Beginners who want step-by-step guidance
Anyone who wants a fun, screen-free way to relax, express themselves, and build real-life skills
What You'll Learn:
Fold amazing models like hearts, boxes, animals, and cranes
Understand the math and logic behind origami (without boring lectures!)
Improve your focus, memory, and patience
Discover how paper art connects with science, design, and innovation


5 Surprising Ways Origami Boosts Your Brain:
Geometry in action: See shapes, angles, and fractions come to life
Creative thinking: Design your own models and patterns
Problem-solving: Learn to think ahead and fix mistakes
Step-by-step logic: Follow folding sequences to reach cool results
Mindfulness: Reduce stress and stay in the moment while you fold
Why Origami?
Because it’s more than paper — it’s a skill set! You’ll build confidence, focus, and creativity that lasts beyond the course.
Start Folding Today!
All you need is paper, curiosity, and a little time. Let’s create something amazing together — one fold at a time.

courses.title: Divine Colors of Life Meditation
courses.bio: Creativity Enhancing Meditation Practice
requirements: There are no specific requirements for The Colors of Life Creativity-Enhancing Meditation. This practice is open to anyone looking to explore color energy, enhance their creative flow, and deepen their mindfulness journey. All that’s needed is an open mind and willingness to engage with the visualization and meditation techniques. Whether you’re a beginner or experienced in meditation, the process can be tailored to fit your personal experience.
courses.description:
Creativity-Enhancing Meditation Practice is a dynamic exploration of the energy within colors, designed to unlock your creative potential and deepen your understanding of visual perception. In this course, we delve into the subtle tones that enhance color vibrations, revealing how they shape emotions, influence thought patterns, and activate artistic expression. By tuning into these frequencies, you’ll gain insight into how color interacts with the mind and spirit, transforming the way you experience creativity.
Through guided meditation and  immersive lessons, participants will learn to harness the power of color as a tool for inspiration and clarity. The course includes a specialized meditation practice created by Olivia Tatara, crafted to elevate imagination and strengthen intuitive awareness. This meditation fosters a seamless flow of ideas, allowing creative energy to move effortlessly while clearing mental blockages that may hinder artistic expression.
This course aligns deeply with principles of alchemy, as it focuses on transformation—specifically, the refinement of creative energy. Alchemy is not just about changing physical matter; it's also about shifting internal states to unlock higher potential. By unblocking creative channels, we clear stagnant energy, allowing inspiration and intuition to flow freely. This process mirrors the ancient alchemical concept of turning lead into gold—not just literally, but symbolically, as we transmute limitations into limitless creative power.
Through this specific color meditation, participants engage with vibrational frequencies that shape perception and emotional states. By consciously working with these energies, they cultivate an ability to channel artistic vision more clearly, expanding their awareness and inner connection. The specialized meditation by Olivia Tatara serves as a catalyst for this transformation, guiding practitioners toward greater self-mastery and alignment with their creative essence.
This practice is more than just a creative exercise—it is a profound energetic shift. As individuals harness the transformative power of color, they awaken deeper levels of intuition, emotional balance, and visionary thinking. With time, this inner alchemy extends beyond artistic expression, influencing personal growth, self-healing, and an enhanced understanding of the energy within and around us.
Whether you are a painter, designer, writer, musician, or simply someone seeking a deeper connection to your creative essence, this practice offers valuable insights to expand your artistic horizons. By integrating mindful color meditation into your routine, you will cultivate a lasting state of inspiration and enhance the natural brilliance of your creative work.
Ready to immerse yourself in the colors of life and unlock your true creative potential?
target_audience: Creative professionals seeking to unlock deeper inspiration and enhance their artistic expression through color meditation
Ideal for mindfulness practitioners who want to integrate color-based techniques into their meditation and self-reflection routines for greater emotional balance.
Psychology professionals seeking to explore the therapeutic benefits of color meditation in emotional healing and cognitive balance.
Anyone looking for personal growth and relaxation can benefit from this practice by using color energy to cultivate inner peace and strengthen their intuitive connection.

courses.title: Altmeisterliche Porträt Malerei mit Ölfarben
courses.bio: Entdecke die Geheimnisse der Porträtmalerei: Grundlagen, Techniken, Inspiration
objectives: Verständnis für die Grundlagen der Porträtmalerei, einschließlich der Bedeutung von Licht und Schatten, Proportionen und Anatomie.
Kenntnisse über die Einflüsse und Techniken bekannter Altmeister wie Rembrandt, Sargent, Freud und Zorn.
Fähigkeit zur Auswahl und Verwendung von Materialien wie Farben, Pinseln und Leinwänden.
Beherrschung verschiedener Zeichentechniken zur Darstellung von Gesichtszügen, Anatomie und Proportionen.
Kompetenz im Vorbereiten einer Leinwand durch Grundierung, um eine optimale Malfläche zu schaffen.
Verständnis für die Bedeutung von Pigmenten wie Titanweiß und deren Einsatz in der monochromen und farbigen Phase der Malerei.
Fähigkeit zur Anwendung von Lasurtechniken zur Schaffung von Tiefe und Farbharmonie im Porträt.
Entwicklung eines individuellen künstlerischen Stils und Ausdrucks durch praktische Übungen und Experimente.
Fähigkeit zur Selbstreflexion und Weiterentwicklung der eigenen Fähigkeiten durch konstruktives Feedback und Übung.
Bereitschaft, die künstlerische Reise fortzusetzen und kontinuierlich neue Techniken und Inspirationen zu suchen.
requirements: Mein Kurs über altmeisterliche Maltechniken in der Porträtmalerei richtet sich an alle, unabhängig von ihrem Erfahrungsniveau. Es gibt keine spezifischen Voraussetzungen oder Anforderungen für die Teilnahme am Kurs. Sowohl Anfänger als auch erfahrene Malerinnen und Maler sind herzlich willkommen. Für die Teilnahme am Kurs sind keine besonderen Fähigkeiten oder Vorkenntnisse erforderlich. Der Kurs ist darauf ausgelegt, die grundlegenden Techniken der Porträtmalerei zu vermitteln und bietet eine schrittweise Anleitung für die praktische Umsetzung.  Teilnehmende sollten jedoch Interesse und Leidenschaft für die Kunst mitbringen sowie die Bereitschaft, Zeit und Engagement in ihre kreative Entwicklung zu investieren.
courses.description:
Tauche ein in die faszinierende Welt der Porträtmalerei mit unserem Kurs "Altmeisterliche Porträt Malerei mit Ölfarben: Grundlagen, Techniken, Inspiration". In diesem Kurs wirst du in die grundlegenden Konzepte und Techniken eingeführt, die erforderlich sind, um beeindruckende Porträts zu malen.
Unser Kurs beginnt mit einer Einführung in die Grundlagen der Porträtmalerei, in der du die Materialien und Werkzeuge kennenlernen wirst, die für die Malerei benötigt werden. Von Pinseln über Farben bis hin zu verschiedenen Leinwandgrundierungen wirst du alles kennenlernen, was du für einen erfolgreichen Start benötigst.
Als nächstes vertiefen wir uns in die Techniken der Porträtmalerei. Du wirst lernen, wie du die Anatomie des Gesichts verstehst und zeichnest, wie du Licht und Schatten richtig setzt und wie du Farben mischst, um realistische und ausdrucksstarke Porträts zu erzeugen. Durch praktische Übungen und Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitungen wirst du deine Fertigkeiten kontinuierlich verbessern.
Darüber hinaus werden wir uns von den Meistern der Porträtmalerei inspirieren lassen. Wir werden Werke berühmter Künstler wie Rembrandt, Sargent und Freud betrachten und deren Techniken analysieren, um unser Verständnis für die Kunst des Porträtierens zu vertiefen.
Egal, ob du ein Anfänger bist, der die Grundlagen erlernen möchte, oder ein fortgeschrittener Künstler, der seine Fertigkeiten verbessern möchte, dieser Kurs bietet für jeden etwas. Tritt ein in die Welt der Porträtmalerei und entdecke deine kreative Seite!
target_audience: Kurs über altmeisterliche Maltechniken in der Porträtmalerei richtet sich an eine breite Zielgruppe, darunter Anfänger, Fortgeschrittene, Kunststudenten, Hobbykünstler und Kunstlehrer, die ihr Verständnis für traditionelle Maltechniken vertiefen und ihre Fertigkeiten im Porträtieren verbessern möchten.

requirements: Der Kurs ist so aufgebaut, dass du ohne Vorkenntnisse starten kannst
courses.description:
Kreativität ist lernbar!
Entwickle deine Fähigkeit, außerhalb von eingefahrenen Strukturen zu denken. Das gibt dir nicht nur eine bessere Flexibilität im privaten und beruflichen Umfeld.
Es stellt außerdem einen großen Schritt in deiner persönlichen Entwicklung dar, denn kreative Menschen sind meistens auch glücklichere Menschen.


Dabei spielt es keine Rolle, ob du Medien gestaltest, in der Programmierung arbeitest oder ob du Autor oder Künstler bist. Auch in einem scheinbar normalen Job sind Ideen der Motor, der dich voranbringen kann.


Kreativität schafft Erfolg!
Hol dir nicht nur die natürliche Neugier eines Kindes zurück, indem du lernst, wie du authentisch einen Geistesblitz nach dem anderen hast. Sorge auch dafür, dass sich dein Ansehen verbessert, denn Leute mit großem Einfallsreichtum werden mit großer Intelligenz verbunden.


Unternehmen haben schon den "War on Talents" als gängigen Begriff eingeführt, das heißt, dass die Unternehmen, bei denen sich das große Geld holen lässt, gezielt nach innovativen, kreativen und zukunftsgewandten Kräften suchen.
Denn es sind Menschen wie ein Steve Jobs oder ein Elon Musk, die Unternehmen an die Weltspitze katapultieren können. Auch von diesen Visionären verwendete Techniken kannst du hier gehirngerecht und komprimiert lernen.


Fundiertes aktuelles Wissen
Um den Wert dieses Kurses für dich zu optimieren, wurden in den Bereichen Psychologie, Design und vielen weiteren Quellen aktiv das für dich relevante Wissen zusammengetragen. Somit finden sich hier die innovativen neuen Techniken, aber auch fundierte Techniken aus älteren Zeiten werden behandelt und kritisch auf Tauglichkeit geprüft. Dein Gesamtpaket für mehr Ideen.




Finde so gute Lösungen, dass du anfangen wird, Probleme zu lieben. Entdecke das Potenzial, welches im ungenutzten Teil deines Gehirns liegt.

courses.title: Ecrire un roman en 15 étapes simples
courses.bio: d’après la méthode « Save the Cat »
objectives: Planifier un roman / scénario du début jusqu'à la fin;
Faire évoluer son protagoniste au cours de l'histoire;
Développer une intrigue fascinante qui garde le lecteur en haleine;
Comprendre ce qui fait le succès d'un roman;
Surmonter les pannes et la peur de la page blanche;

Introduction: Introduction à la méthode "Save the Cat"
Présentation de la structure de "Save the Cat"
6ème étape: La transition: Le petit +: Le syndrome de l'imposteur
En savoir plus sur l'auteur Mélissa Da Costa
7ème étape: L'homme de la situation: Le petit +: Fausses pistes et harengs rouges

requirements: L'envie d'écrire un roman ou scénario et le temps de le faire:
Disposer d'un ordinateur et d'un accès à Internet ou
alternativement un bic et quelques cahiers;
Un correcteur d'orthographe et/ou un bon dictionnaire.
courses.description:
Si vous lisez ceci, c’est que vous faites partie de ces nombreuses personnes qui écrivent ou ont envie d’écrire un livre: un roman, un scénario ou une (auto-)biographie. C’est une belle et vaste entreprise, que malheureusement moins de 5% parviennent à mener jusqu’au bout.
Ce cours vous aidera à faire partie des 5% qui atteignent leur objectif et terminent l’écriture d’un bon livre. Il s’adresse à quiconque veut écrire un roman ou un scénario, tant pour un publique adulte, jeune adulte que jeunesse. Il est adapté à tous les genres: fantasy, historique, feel-good, romance, thriller, dramatique, … et s’adresse tant au débutant qui veut se lancer dans l’aventure littéraire qu’à un auteur qui cherche à améliorer la structuration et planification de ses œuvres.
Ce cours est basé sur l’analyse approfondie de films et romans à succès qui a permis d’en extraire la structure profonde, ce qui les rend intéressants aux spectateurs et lecteurs. C’est sur base de cette analyse qu’une méthode de production respectant les mécanismes des scénarios et romans fut développée par des auteurs américains, connue sous le nom “Save the Cat”. Celle-ci propose non seulement une structure pour raconter n’importe quelle histoire, mais une véritable méthode pour l’écrire, du début jusqu’au mot “FIN”.
Quelle que soit la nature de vos problèmes lors de l’écriture de votre histoire, cette méthode vous empêchera de tomber en panne en cours d’écriture. Chaque étape de l’écriture de votre histoire est décrite et dotée d’exemples (y compris depuis le dernier roman de l’auteur), ensuite un petit exercice vous aidera à en appliquer les principes.
Une histoire vous trotte en tête, mais vous ne savez pas par quel bout commencer? Ce cours vous explique comment faire et vous proposera quelques exemples.
Vous parvenez assez facilement à coucher les premières pages d’une histoire sur papier, mais l’inspiration vous manque pour progresser? Ce cours vous suggère comment enchaîner les scènes qui vont construire votre roman ou scénario sur base d’une structure stable et éprouvée.
Ce n’est pas l’écriture des scènes qui vous pose problème, mais leur liaison. Le cours décrira toute une série de techniques pour relier harmonieusement les parties d’un récit entre elles.
Ce cours vous accompagnera et soutiendra tout au long des quinze étapes de l’écriture de votre livre, mais il n’est pas une procédure magique qui écrira pour vous. C’est à vous de suivre le cours consciencieusement et de mettre en pratique étape par étape les principes et techniques qui y sont enseignées. Il ne suffit pas de les apprendre et de les connaître, vous devrez aussi les appliquer.
target_audience: Quiconque écrit ou a l'intention d'écrire un / des romans ou scénarios de film.

courses.description:

★★★★★ ¡Aprender ajedrez debe ser fantástico! ¡Di adiós a las clases aburridas! Este curso ya ha impactado a más de 4.130 estudiantes con su entrenamiento completo y dinámico. Únete a ellos y aprende todo lo que necesitas, sin importar tu nivel actual.


★★★★★ ¡ASÍ ES! 13 cursos en 1 [DOMINA EL JUEGO] + 19 EXTRAS. ¡Simplemente sigue las instrucciones paso a paso proporcionadas por Udemy!


★★★★★ 21 horas de lecciones interactivas y entretenidas. ¡Aprende lo que realmente importa SIN clases aburridas!
Revolucionario e incomparable, este curso introduce un método único que permite a cualquier persona comprender los fundamentos del ajedrez, comenzando desde cualquier nivel.
Innovador y con una calidad didáctica ejemplar, este curso incluye más de 21 horas de contenido práctico y detallado sobre el increíble deporte mental que es el ajedrez.


★★★★★ Beneficios más allá del tablero:
En este curso, no solo aprenderás técnicas y estrategias para dominar el ajedrez, sino que descubrirás cómo esta práctica puede transformar tu vida de diversas maneras:
Mejora la concentración y el enfoque: Mantén tu atención plena en tus estudios y actividades laborales.
Desarrolla la perseverancia: Afronta cada partida hasta el final y lleva esta resiliencia a tus desafíos diarios.
Control emocional y reducción de la ansiedad: Gestiona la presión e incertidumbre, fortaleciendo tu confianza personal.
Estimula la creatividad y las habilidades para resolver problemas: El ajedrez te enseña a pensar de manera innovadora y a crear planes efectivos, valiosos para retos personales y profesionales.
Respeto y aprendizaje de las derrotas: Valora la deportividad reconociendo las victorias de tus oponentes y aplicando estas lecciones en tus relaciones con familia, amigos y colegas.
Diversión y alegría continuas: Descubre un pasatiempo de por vida que te brindará satisfacción y momentos de ocio.
Menos tiempo frente a pantallas, más conexiones significativas: Si pasas tiempo con niños, esta es una oportunidad para compartir una actividad enriquecedora que promueve más interacción y menos uso de dispositivos.

courses.title: RIVERTABLE - Formation complète
courses.bio: Résine epoxy et table rivière
objectives: Fabriquer une table en bois et résine epoxy
Couler de la résine epoxy

Fabrication du plateau de la table riviè: Positionner ses planches dans le coffrage
Les finitions possibles: Choisir les pieds de sa table

requirements: Aimer le design
Être bricoleur
courses.description:
Les tables rivières (river table) associent résine epoxy et bois.
Aucune connaissance de menuiserie ou d'ébénisterie n'est requise. Les principaux outils de base du bricoleur suffisent pour commencer un tel projet. N'hésitez pas à vous lancer.
Généralement  très cher, ce mobilier est design et unique. Pourtant, il est accessible aux bricoleurs lambda de créer rapidement ce type de table. C'est ce que cette formation propose !
Découvrez toutes les étapes importantes de la création d'une table rivière et de l'utilisation de la résine epoxy dans une formation complète et facile d'accès. Cette formation est présentée par un professionnel de manière précise et ludique.
Vous saurez comment choisir et préparer vos pièces de bois, préparer et doser la résine epoxy ... la colorer aussi évidemment ! Sans oublier les modes de finition qu'il est possible d'utiliser. Vous connaitrez le mode de travail basique jusqu'au plus poussé.
Toutes les astuces, et les réponses aux questions les plus courantes sont présentées en vidéo.
Vous serez assisté par un pas à pas détaillé : du choix du matériel, à l'organisation de son espace de travail.
Les principales données de travail et de sécurité sont évoquées pour vous permettre de travailler rapidement sans soucis.
Une fois cette formation achevée, devenez libre de créer votre propre mobilier unique et original pour votre intérieur.
target_audience: Débutants

courses.title: Awakening Of The Inner Child
courses.bio: Heal emotional blocks, awaken creativity, and reconnect with joy through sound healing, meditation & inner child work.
objectives: Reconnect with your Inner Self: Experience deep inner reflection and healing to reestablish a bond with your inner child.
Unlock Creative Potential: Engage in meditative practices that tap into imagination, curiosity, and play.
Release Limiting Beliefs: Let go of old patterns and rediscover the natural freedom and joy you were born with.
Practice Self-Compassion and Love: Cultivate compassion toward yourself, fostering emotional resilience and well-being.
Integrate Joyful Practices: Develop practical tools to carry the insights of this journey into daily life, nurturing ongoing healing and growth.
requirements: There are no special requirements or prior experience needed to take this course—this journey is open to everyone, regardless of background or meditation experience.  However, to get the most out of this experience, it’s recommended that learners:
Have a quiet, comfortable space where they can listen to the guided sessions without interruptions.
Use headphones for an immersive sound healing experience, as the course includes brainwave entrainment and binaural audio techniques.
Approach the course with an open heart and mind, allowing space for self-discovery and emotional release.
courses.description:
Are you ready to reconnect with the most authentic part of yourself—the one who still knows how to feel deeply, play freely, and create without fear? Awakening of the Inner Child is a 7-day journey designed to help you release emotional blocks, heal childhood wounds, and rediscover your innate joy, freedom and imagination.
Blending the power of sound healing, brainwave entrainment, and guided meditation, this course gently guides you through daily explorations rooted in neuroscience, creativity, and self-compassion. Each session includes a grounding introduction and a powerful meditation to help you meet, nurture, and integrate your inner child.
You’ll learn how to:
Create a safe inner sanctuary for emotional healing
Transform limiting beliefs and patterns
Reignite your creative spark and playful energy
Build self-trust and connect with a deeper sense of joy
Use sound as a tool for personal growth and nervous system regulation
Cultivate self-love, presence, and a more compassionate relationship with your past
Whether you're on a healing path or simply longing for more aliveness, connection, and wholeness in your life, this course invites you into a space of profound inner transformation. No prior experience is needed—just an open heart and a willingness to come home to yourself.
target_audience: This course is for anyone seeking deep emotional healing, self-discovery, and a renewed sense of joy and creativity. Whether you're new to inner work or already on a personal growth journey, Awakening of the Inner Child is designed to guide you into a profound reconnection with yourself.  This course is especially beneficial for:  Those feeling emotionally blocked or disconnected – If you struggle with self-expression, joy, or vulnerability, this course will help you rediscover a sense of openness and emotional freedom. Individuals on a healing journey – Whether you're healing from past wounds, childhood experiences, or limiting beliefs, this course provides a safe space for self-compassion and transformation. Creative souls and seekers – Artists, writers, musicians, and creatives looking to reignite their inspiration by tapping into the playful, curious nature of their inner child. Mindfulness and meditation practitioners – Anyone interested in deepening their meditation practice through sound healing, brainwave entrainment, and guided introspection. Anyone craving more joy and spontaneity in life – If you've lost touch with your sense of playfulness, imagination, or excitement, this journey will help you reclaim it.

courses.title: Escrita Criativa: Como criar personagens inesquecíveis
courses.bio: Guia completo de construção de personagens para suas histórias

As características dos protagonistas e antagonistas

Como e por que inserir flashbacks
O que é e como desenvolver um Arco de Personagem
Aplicar técnicas de Espelhamento e Contraste
Impulsionar sua criação com 4 questionários + 1 ficha de personagem
E muito mais!

courses.title: El arco del personaje
courses.bio: La importancia del personaje en la construcción de guiones dramáticos
objectives: Crear personajes para una historia de largo alcance
Trabajar el lado interno del personaje el inconsciente y la sombra del personaje
Desarrollar personajes a través de los mitos establecidos para la escritura de guiones
Saber resolver los conflictos de los personajes y que sean de gran interés para la audiencia

Elementos para la definición y construcc: Elementos para la definición y construcción de un personaje
Caracterización del personaje: El contexto y perfil del personaje
Construcción de personajes parte III: Mitos de misión y tarea (el viaje del héroe)
Arquetipos de carl gustav jung (parte I)
Arquetipos de carl gustav jung (parte II)
Construcción de personajes dramáticos y: El personaje y las dimensiones humanas
Categorías dimensionales y proyección del personaje
Los personajes y su función en la historia parte I
Los personajes y su función en la historia parte II
Los personajes y su función en la historia parte III

requirements: Ninguno
courses.description:
El arco de transformación de un personaje hace referencia a la evolución que experimenta un personaje, generalmente el protagonista, en una historia. En narrativa literaria, solemos referirnos a él como el “cambio interno”, cambio que se produce en el personaje a lo largo del nudo. Esta sería una buena definición


Decía George Lucas que las películas son como la guerra: nadie regresa de ellas siendo el mismo. Algo parecido les ocurre a los personajes de las historias. Como a las personas, a los personajes las experiencias los cambia. Por eso si hay algo que no debe faltar en la trama emocional de una novela o relato es precisamente, ese cambio del personaje: un protagonista al principio de la historia no es el mismo que al final.


Este eMEDIAX te brindará, una herramienta que te va a permitir rastrear la esencia de los personajes a lo largo de la historia, su razón de ser y sus deseos más profundo y esto en función del tipo de guion o genero que estés escribiendo, pero siempre buscando ese “yo interno” del personaje.


Como puedes deducir, este curso pretende ser una guía para facilitarte la escritura de la trama de un guion y que el personaje vaya a la par de lo que está sucediendo.


¿Te animarás a realizar este curso?
target_audience: Personas interesadas en formarse como guionistas

courses.title: Charakterentwicklung für Roman und Film
courses.bio: Entwickle Charaktere die den Leser fesseln - Fiktion erwacht zu Leben, die dramatische Figurenentwicklung für Autoren
objectives: Wie der fiktive Traum durch eine markante und mitreisende Figur inszeniert wird.
Wie man Charaktere zum Leben erweckt und ihre eigene Geschichte erzählen lässt.
Wie man fesselnde und interessante Charakter entwickelt.
Wie man Bestseller-Charakter erstellt.
Wie man einen Charakter erstellt, der jede Story voranbringt.

Ideenfindung: Ideen gibt es wie Sand am Meer!

requirements: Du benötigst einen PC oder ein Smartphone, alternativ gehen auch Stift und Schreibblock.
Lust und Muße am Schreiben, vor allem solltest du bereit sein, deine eigene Kreativität zu wecken.
Mut, um Fiktion zu leben.
courses.description:
Kränkelnde Figuren, ohnmächtige Charaktere und stillstehende Handlungen - der Tod jeder aufkeimenden Geschichte.
Jedes Kapitel und jeder Szene leben mit und durch ihre Figuren, erst durch interessante und motivierte Charaktere kann ein lebendiges Traumbild erzeugt werden – die "reale Fiktion". Ziel muss es sein, dass dieser Traum so echt und real wird, das sich der Leser darin verliert, zumindest für einen kurzen Augenblick.
Es ist simple und einfach eine "echte Figur" für unsere spannende oder humorvolle Geschichte zu erschaffen, dabei sollten wir uns die anfangs nebulöse Figur vor die eigenen Augen führen – wie sie denkt, handelt und fühlt. Durch uns wird sie lebendig, ihre DNA wird unsere, durch uns atmet sie und handelt!
Du fragst dich, wenn es so einfach ist eine lebendige und markante Figur – mit Ecken und Kanten zu erstellen, dann hätte ich es doch bereits getan? Oder nicht?!
Ja, hättest du.
Die Wahrheit ist, es liegt an der Tiefe. Die allermeisten fiktionalen Figuren sind zu oberflächlich und zu glatt. Nehmen wir sie unter die Lupe, dann zeigen sich riesige, klaffende Lücken, sie ist zu monton. Sie kann niemals eine Geschichte voranbringen.
Für jedes Problem gibt es eine Lösung, zum Glück!
Ich verspreche Dir, nach diesem Kurs wirst du dreidimensionale, lebendige und mitreisende Charaktere für deinen Roman, dein Drehbuch oder deine Kurzgeschichte erstellen können.
Ich gebe Dir in diesem Kurs ein umfangreiches Blueprint, mit der du Hunderte von interessanten Charakteren erstellen kannst, in die Hände.


Was bringt dich zu diesem Kurs:
Du möchtest einen Roman oder eine interessante Kurzgeschichte schreiben?
Leser sollen in den Bann deines Werkes gezogen werden?
Der fiktive Traum soll gelebt werden?
Du bist es leid, Leser und Zuschauer zu langweilen?
Deine Figuren sollen sich verselbständigen und die Geschichte erzählen?
Du möchtest mehr Tiefe für den Leser schaffen?
Du bist hier richtig, dieser Kurs bringt dich weiter in deinem kreativen Schaffensprozess.


Wieso habe ich diesen Kurs erstellt?
Auf meinem Weg als Schriftsteller wurde ich immer wieder vor das Problem der Story gestellt – ich kann mir wunderbar Ideen für mitreisende Geschichten und Romane ausdenken, das Plotten fiel mir leicht.
Einzig und allein, das Voranschreiten der Geschichte hängte ab und an. Ich wusste nicht wieso, es lag am Konflikt der Charakter und die Figuren an sich. Nach und nach erkannte ich, dass die aufwendige Figuren-Inszenierung der Schlüssel zu diesem kreativen Problem ist. Nur ein dreidimensionaler und lebendiger Charakter kann seine Geschichte selbständig erzählen. Es ist nicht der Autor, der sie erzählt, es ist die fiktionale Figur mit ihren Wünschen, Begierden und Ängsten – mit ihren Ecken und Kanten, schließlich ist es ihr Leben!
Dieser Kurs vereint meine persönlichen Erfahrungen mit den Lehren von Theaterdozenten, Drehbuchcoaches und Schauspieltrainern. Er spricht deine kreative und schöpferische Bewusstseinsebene an. Er ist die Schablone für fiktionale Figuren, die Leser mitreisen.


Das lernst du in diesem Kurs:
Wie man fesselnde und interessante Charakter entwickelt.
Wie man Charaktere zum Leben erweckt und ihre eigene Geschichte erzählen lässt.
Wie der fiktive Traum durch den Helden oder Schurken gelebt wird.
Wie man Bestseller-Charakter erstellt.
Der Kurs ist ein Praxiskurs. Du wirst durch interessante und abwechslungsreiche Übungen an die Erschaffung deiner fiktionalen Figur herangeführt - lasse deinen Charakter zum Leben erwecken.
Melde dich bei dem Onlinekurs an!
Viel Freude und Erfolg mit dem Kurs »Fiktionale Charakterentwicklung für Autoren und Storyteller«.
Dein Tommy
PS: Der Kurs ist deutschsprachig.
target_audience: Menschen, die ihre Leser in den Bann ziehen möchten.
Alle, die lebensechte fiktionale Figuren entwickeln möchten.
Hobby-Autoren, Schriftsteller, Romanautoren und Content Creator.
Jeder, der gerne schreibt oder mit dem Schreiben beginnen möchte.
Menschen, die Ihr Hobby zum Beruf machen möchten.
Schriftsteller, die Freude an kreativen Denkaufgaben haben.
Alle, die ihre Figuren fühlen möchten.

courses.title: Criatividade Produtiva
courses.bio: Desenvolva seu lado criativo e organize suas ideias
objectives: Estimular a criatividade.
Organizar ideias.
Aplicar a criatividade em resolução de problemas.

Introdução: O MEDO E DE ONDE VÊM AS IDEIAS

requirements: Apenas uma vontade enorme de aprender!
courses.description:
Quais as formas de explorar a sua criatividade?
Como a criatividade pode ajudar na solução de problemas?
Será que somos todos criativos?

Criatividade Produtiva é um workshop para quem deseja entender seu lado criativo, descobrir o que pode estimular a sua criatividade e como aplicar isso na resolução de problemas. Blocos de anotações, post-its e canetas coloridas esperam pelas criativas e criativos em busca de mais inspiração!
***
Viver uma vida criativa parece algo distante para você?
Pois saiba que você já vive uma vida assim e nem percebe!
A criatividade é um conjunto de vários fatores: tudo o que você ouve, vê, experimenta ou toca gera novas experiências. Seu cérebro guarda tudo isso e organiza de forma a encontrar padrões para conectar estas experiências quando necessário.
Esta bagagem de referências que estão em sua mente é o que vai te ajudar na hora de ter uma ideia. Por isso é tão importante ser curioso, questionar, prestar atenção nas outras pessoas e ter sempre novas referências para armazenar no seu HD humano (ou cérebro, se preferir!).
Viver uma vida criativa não significa estar apenas envolvido com música, artes e coisas culturais. Viver criativamente é ter curiosidade pelo mundo e fazer disso a motivação para ter novas ideias. Você já faz isso, sem perceber! Agora, imagina se fizesse com consciência, sabendo como funciona o seu processo criativo e quais as melhores ferramentas para que você consiga estimular a sua criatividade para resolver problemas ou aproveitar oportunidades?

No Workshop Criatividade Produtiva, você vai identificar quais são suas melhores fontes de criatividade, irá descobrir como funciona seu processo criativo, vai entender a importância de referências em sua vida, além de conhecer ferramentas criativamente produtivas que irão te ajudar a colocar as ideias em ação.
target_audience: Pessoas que queiram estimular seu lado criativo.
Pessoas que sentem necessidade de organizar melhor as ideias.

courses.title: Universidade de Escritores - Curso para Profissionais
courses.bio: Do ZERO a DEZ MIL palavras por dia
objectives: Definir uma rotina infalível de escrita, capaz de superar qualquer bloqueio de escrita.
Definir deadlines realista para os seus projetos e ser capaz de cumprir suas metas e objetivos de maneira extremamente eficiente.
Aumentar exponencialmente sua velocidade de escrita durante o processo de escrita.
Aprender a contar histórias como um mestre do storytelling mundial, você aprenderá a real sobre o processo de se tornar um escritor profissional.
Aprenderá a conquistar um ego inabálavel e capaz de algo surreal no mundo da escrita.
Será um aluno capaz de publicar suas obras de maneira independente, sem depender de capista, revisor e ilustrador.

Módulo 01 - Autoestima, motivação e a sa: Aula 06 - A Síndrome da grande ideia I
Aula 07 - A Síndrome da grande ideia II
Módulo 02 - Planejamento de tempo e roti: Aula 016 - Dez mil palavras por dia

Módulo 04 - Os Primeiros Passos e o Bási: Aula 26 - Narrador em Primeira Pessoa Limitado
Aula 27 - Narrador em Terceira Pessoa Limitado
Aula 29 - Promessas (Próximo módulo será sobre Worldbuilding)

requirements: Para compreender o curso será preciso possuir o conhecimento básico de Escrita-Criativa e Storytelling, aqui, no Universidade de Escritores, o conhecimento básico é conteúdo complementar!
courses.description:
Olá, seja bem-vindo ao Universidade de Escritores, primeiro de tudo, muito obrigado por ter confiado em meu trabalho, eu estarei aqui com você te guiando em sua carreira de escritor.
Meu nome é Alexandre Dking e sou escritor profissional de fantasia e Horror-psicológico. Com este curso eu vou ensiná-los sobre mitos e verdades sobre o mercado literário nacional e um pouquinho sobre cinema e publicidade. Sei que é uma jornada extremamente sinuosa, que às vezes você chegará ao fundo do poço com vontade de desistir e largar tudo, maas confie em mim, você irá agradecer por todo o sofrimento que passou no ínicio de sua carreira. Espero de verdade que esse curso impulsione sua carreira de escritor.
No Universidade de Escritores você não só vai aprender como o mercado funciona e como as histórias épicas são escritas, você terá a base fundamental para escrever qualquer história e por fim, ao final desse curso, pretendo ensiná-lo passo a passo como diagramar seu livro sozinho, como criar boas capas e a como ilustrar seu projeto da maneira correta. O que você deve ou não se preocupar dentro do mercado e, como escritor há muito tempo, eu preciso cumprir minhas promessas no início da trama, eu os apresento o Universidade de Escritores.
target_audience: Escritores em começo de carreira e aspirantes ao trono de ferro da ficção, você é herdeiro do trono nessa nova era de escritores?
