İşletmelerinin sosyal medya varlığını artırmak, daha etkili pazarlama stratejileri oluşturmak isteyen girişimciler ve işletme sahipleri
Yapay zeka ve Instagram konularına yeni başlayanlar için temel bilgileri içeren bir başlangıç ​​noktası sunar

courses.title: Chasing Inspiration: How to Turn Ideas Into Stories
courses.bio: Write a complete short story, from idea to second draft.
objectives: Generate story ideas from four sources: personal experience, stories you love (or hate), "what if" scenarios, and vibes.
Write the first draft of your short story.
Write the second draft of your short story.
How to keep generating story-worthy ideas long after the course ends.
requirements: No writing experience needed.
courses.description:
"Don't loaf and invite inspiration; light out after it with a club." - Jack London
This is a hands-on, project-based course designed to help you find sparks of inspiration and set your writing on fire. Whether you're stuck in the idea phase or struggling to finish your first draft, this course gives you the tools to move from concept to second draft.
You'll learn how to generate ideas from four different sources:
Personal experience (write what you know)
Creative rewriting (reimagine the stories you love or hate)
"What if?" scenarios (don't be afraid to overthink)
Vibes (tap into dreams, daydreams, and artistic experiences)
You'll also learn how to turn vague concepts into ideas good enough to stop thinking and start writing.
Once you find the one idea that really excites you, you'll write a short story. No word count, no pressure.
I'll walk you through my own creative process, so you can see the problems I faced, the decisions I made, and how messy, funny, and frustrating this process can be. You'll learn about:
Character, setting, and conflict
Reverse outlines
Discovering the story as you write
Generating ideas beyond this course
…and more
If you learn best by doing and want to write a complete short story, this course is for you.
Welcome. Let's find your story.
target_audience: Aspiring writers who learn best by doing.
Writers who struggle to turn vague ideas into finished stories.

courses.title: 【夢を諦めないための戦略】クリエイターのための創作と時間とお金の話
courses.bio: 家庭や仕事と両立しながら2年間で受講生1万5千人を達成した講師が伝えます。個人で活動するための生存戦略。
objectives: 個人クリエイターが、自分の好きな創作時間を確保するための戦略についてお話しします。
一つ一つの仕事を未来へ繋げるために必要な仕事どうしのシナジーの出し方についてお話しします。
様々な仕事やプロジェクトを同時に進める中で”やめるべきこと”を見つける方法をお話しします。
自分・家庭・仕事や、お金・時間・やりがいなど、両立することが難しいものの捉え方をお話しします。
自分の周りに集まってくれた人のニーズを正しく把握し、自分の活動の在り方を正しくとらえる方法についてお話しします。

本編: ３DCG講師うめちゃん　自己紹介
現状把握編　トリレンマを味方につけろ
目標編　最終的にやりたいことをするために
戦略編　シナジーマップで見る資本主義x脱資本主義
攻略編　結果を出すための行動指針

requirements: 条件はありません。
courses.description:
【トーク概要】
”生きるための仕事”と”生きがいとしての仕事”を両立するには
シナジーマップで学ぶ、お金が稼げなくてもやりたいことをやれるシステムづくり
クリエイターが知っておきたい”技術の”分散投資
やらないことを決める時間創出のヒント
「学びラボ新3か年計画」大人も子供も明るい未来を生きるため、今私たちがつくるべきもの


【トーク詳細】
学びラボというクリエイターコミュニティのトーク(講義)です。
テーマは”クリエイターの皆に知ってほしい創作と時間とお金の話”です。


「全国の子供たちにCGを！」を掲げる、学びの自給自足コミュニティ”学びラボ”には多くのクリエイターが在籍しています。私たちクリエイターは日々創作活動を行う上で、生きていくためにやらなくてはならないこと、本当は時間をかけてやりたいこと、色々あると思います。


好きなことだけをして生きていくことは中々難しいですが、自身の活動の全体像を、過去を見つめ直し未来に向かって構想すれば、長い時間の中でゆっくりと、その現状を変えていくことができます。


私が”学びラボ”というコミュニティをつくろうと思った時点で考えた3か年計画をお話しし、3年目となる2023年現在がどうなっているのか。そしてこの先3年間でどのように発展していくのかを体験談としてあなたにお話しします。


ここでお話しすることは、すべて私がこの数年間で経験してきた生の体験談です。
本に書いてあること、ネットの記事になっていることではなく、私なりの戦略と分析結果をお伝えします。
人は性格も趣味趣向もいろいろです。だから人生はいろいろ。私の体験がそのままあなたの答えになるとは限りません。
でも、誰かが決めたやらなければならないことではなく、あなたの本当にやりたいことに時間をかけるためのエッセンスを感じ取ってもらえたら何よりです。


コミュニティメンバー向けのイベントとして開催した本トーク会ですが、色々な方の参考になればと思い、観やすくレクチャーを細分化して講座にしました。ご興味あればご覧ください。
※本講座のトークイベントは既に終了しております。
※アジェンダ最後にあります、おたのしみ枠は個人のプライバシーの都合上、本講座に含まれておりません。
target_audience: 少しでもお金の心配を減らし、創作するための時間を確保したいクリエイターの方
次につながらない単発的な仕事ではなく、持続的で効果的な活動を続けたい個人クリエイターの方
会社員などの仕事に加え、長期的なスパンで個人で活動をしていきたい方

courses.title: How To Create Great Characters For Your Novel or Screenplay
courses.bio: Writing course from NY Times-praised authors, book editors and writing coaches to help you create compelling characters

How To Create Great Characters For Your: God is in the Details (So are Great Characters)
Great Bad Guys Make Great Good Guys

requirements: There are no prerequisites for this class, but the following is helpful:
The ability to download PDF worksheets, resource lists, writing prompts and exercises
Enthusiasm and a commitment to being the best writer you can be
courses.description:
Novel Lab co-founders, Ayn & Sam Gailey, take you through ten inspiring lectures to guide you toward the goal of creating memorable commercial characters. Using the same advice they give to their New York Times best-selling clients, they will teach you how to craft characters that will become the heart of your story. You will also gain an understanding of how your characters integrate with plot to create a powerful story. Perfect for beginner writers who want to create more original and moving characters.
Instructors will use the following books to illustrate character development: Gone Girl by Gillian Flynn; Deep Winter by Samuel W. Gailey; Harry Potter... by J.K. Rowling; The Girl On A Train by Paula Hawkins; The Hunger Games by Suzanne Collins; To Kill A Mockingbird by Harper Lee; Bridget Jones's Diary by Helen Fielding, and others.

TESTIMONIALS:
Ayn & Sam helped me find the heart of my story and guided me through the writing, editing and publishing process with expertise, passion and a lot of patience. Without them, my book would not have made it onto the New York Times Bestseller list.
— Lenny Dykstra, Lenny Dykstra: Memoir of Life on the Edge (Harper Collins 2016)

Ayn & Sam are unique and rare. They can write their own riveting books while also helping other writers create and complete their own stories, no matter how complex. They are also a pleasure to work with.
— Amy Schiffman, literary manager/partner, IPG (Dennis Lehane, Don Delillo, James Ellroy, Michael Connelly, Richard Russo, James Lee Burke, Sue Grafton)
Gailey’s “Deep Winter” is enthralling and suspenseful, like a Michael Connelly or Lee Child crime novel, but more elegantly written.
— Esquire Magazine


Thanks to the guidance I received, I was able to hone the concept for my book and sign with a top book agent. Ayn & Sam know how to make the process inspiring and fun.
— Shannon Bindler, Life Coach, Celebrity Stylist, Blogger


"Deep Winter” by Samuel W. Gailey is beautifully written...
— The New York Times


Gailey’s work is…so brilliantly done, so artfully underwritten with not a word wasted…
— Booklist


Skillfully blending memoir and investigative journalism, Ayn Gailey tells a story with hilarious, self-deprecating wit and extreme honesty...
— Library Journal


Tough, straight, upsetting, and strangely beautiful. One of the best sports autobiographies I’ve ever read. It comes from the heart.
— Author Stephen King on "Memoir of Life On The Edge"
target_audience: This course is great for beginning writers who want to elevate their characters to a higher level
For writers interested in writing commercial fiction, not experimental fiction
Great for writers who struggle with writing compelling and original characters

courses.title: Mendefinisikan Kreativitas. Dasar untuk jadi lebih kreatif.
courses.bio: Pahami makna kreativitas secara objektif berdasarkan sains. Jadilah kreatif yang sebenar-benarnya dalam kehidupan Anda.
objectives: Memahami arti dari kreativitas berdasarkan beragam referensi berbasis sains.
Mengetahui sejarah dan perkembangan kreativitas sejak era pra-sejarah hingga era kecerdasan.
Memahami kriteria apa saja yang harus dipenuhi untuk membuat 'sesuatu' bisa disebut kreatif.
Memahami bagaimana para ilmuwan mempetakan kreativitas, beragam sudut pandang yang umum digunakan, dan jenis-jenis karya kreatif.
Mengetahui apa itu kecerdasan kreatif, dan apa saja sifat unggul dari para jenius kreatif yang bisa kita tiru..
Memiliki pemahaman komprehensif mengenai kreativitas untuk kemudian dapat mempraktekkannya untuk pemecahan masalah ataupun kegiatan keseharian.
Memahami korelasi antara IQ dan kreativitas.
Mengetahui sejumlah jebakan mitos kreativitas.

Sejarah dan Perkembangan Kreativitas: Perkembangan Kreativitas di Era Studi Kecerdasan
Sulitnya Meneliti Kreativitas: Anak Kecil Lebih Kreatif dari Orang Dewasa ?
Jenis Karya Kreatif: Perbedaan Mencolok Karya Kreatif Artistik & Sains
Hal Lain yang Perlu Diketahui Terkait Kr: Pria atau Wanita yang Lebih Kreatif ?
Kecerdasan Kreatif: Sikap yang Bisa Diteladani dari Para Genius Kreatif

requirements: Tidak ada persyaratan khusus untuk mengikuti kursus ini.
courses.description:
Di dalam dunia akademik maupun industri, istilah kreativitas berkesan memiliki makna yang demikian 'lebar' dan sulit untuk didefinisikan secara baku. Bahkan setiap individu seakan bisa beropini mengenai apa itu kreativitas. Tapi bagaimanakah kreativitas menurut sains ? Bagaimana para pelaku riset dan studi kreativitas mendefinisikan kreativitas secara objektif ? Atau apakah memang tidak mungkin membuat definisi baku dari kreativitas itu sendiri ? Dan bila benar begitu, lantas bagaimanakah para ilmuwan memandang dan merumuskan kreativitas ?
Di kelas ini, Anda akan mendapatkan knowledge yang cukup luas dari terminologi kreativitas. Mulai dari pengetahuan mengenai awal mula munculnya kreativitas manusia, dan apa saja yang para ilmuwan temukan mengenai kreativitas di era studi kecerdasan.  Hingga mitos apa saja yang telah berhasil mereka bongkar ?
Kreativitas sudah lama diakui sebagai asset penting dari manusia, bahkan penyebab dari majunya peradaban. Jangan sampai kita memahaminya secara salah. Generasi muda saat ini sudah selayaknya memiliki bekal knowledge mengenai kreativitas, karena akan berhadapan dengan maraknya Artificial Intelligence (AI). Pondasi pemahaman akan kreativitas yang kurang tepat dapat berpengaruh pada perkembangan kreativitas individu ke depannya.
Kreativitas bukanlah milik sebagian orang saja, namun bisa dimiliki oleh semua orang apabila orang tersebut memahaminya dan memang mau belajar untuk menjadi kreatif. Kelas ini akan memberikan makna dari kata kreativitas secara fundamental, beragam sudut pandang kreativitas, jenis karya kreativitas, dan juga pengkategorian kreativitas. Anda akan dapat memahami, di level mana karya kreativitas Anda.
Menjadi kreatif bukanlah hal yang instan, namun sebuah proses. Mari berproses menjadi kreatif bersama, menjadi lebih produktif di lingkungan manapun Anda berada, berkontribusi dengan karya-karya kreatif, dan berbahagia di dalam proses tersebut.
target_audience: Pekerja/pegawai, pebisnis/pengusaha, graphic designer, content maker, mahasiswa, pelajar, coach, trainer, HRD, motivator, influencer, youtuber, penulis, komikus, dan siapa saja yang ingin memahami kreativitas secara mendalam.
Anda yang ingin atau berminat sangat dalam pada terminologi kreativitas, dan ingin mengetahui sejumlah yang bisa dilatih untuk menjadi lebih kreatif.
Anda yang dalam keseharian atau profesinya bersinggungan dengan membuat atau menciptakan sesuatu, baik itu fisik ataupun non-fisik / konsep.
Siapapun yang ingin mengetahui kreativitas lebih dalam dan berbeda dari orang awam, berbasis studi serta riset ilmiah.
Siapapun yang ingin mempraktekkan kreativitas secara benar dan ingin menerapkannya dalam beragam aspek kehidupan.

courses.title: Hyperthinking: improve your day to day learning & creativity
courses.bio: Train your mind for success with the right thinking tools and habits!

HyperLink: Use your social networks to expand your knowledge
Bonus Lecture: TEDxTalk: Hyperthinking in education in TEDxULB 2014, Belgium

requirements: none
courses.description:
The world is changing fast and just catching up isn’t enough to succeed.
Successful people know how to stay ahead of changing circumstances. With the right thinking tools, you can adopt that mindset too!
HyperThinking helps you manage different challenges: from appreciating contradictory perspectives to managing conflicts, fromincreasing the quality of meetings to understanding your clients and co-workers. At the same time it supports your own learning process and increases your creative potential.
Regular use of HyperThinking tools equips you for working in and taking advantage of our new environment where change is the only constant and where ideas materialize at digital speed.
This is the first course in the ZN Digital Masterclass online series. These courses will provide you with both the theory and practical tools for strategic digital consulting.
About Phil:
About Phil Weiss, author of HyperThinking:
Phil Weiss is Chairman and owner of ZN, a leading digital consultancy.
While studying Philosophy, Politics and Economics at Oxford, he launched two college magazines, started the first student radio station on a full FM licence in the UK, and received the Young Achievers Award from HM the Queen. In Brussels he set up ZN, working with companies, political institutions – like the European Commission and Parliament – and other organizations on how to transform their communications by integrating a digital approach and tapping into the power of the Internet.
He works with such household names as Toyota, Microsoft, Sony, Sanofi Pasteur, UCB and many other industry associations. He developed the HyperThinking model to enable the ZN team and their clients manage rapid change and innovation, and to adapt their strategies and structures to the age of networks. In 2010, Phil co-founded TEDxBrussels. He is now Chairman of IABC Europe (International Association of Business Communicators).
In 2012, he wrote the book "HyperThinking," defining the mindset needed to survive and thrive in the age of networks. The HyperThinking model is built upon the assumption that the most important skill required to help you and your organization grow is your mindset.
target_audience: Communication Professionals
Entrepreneurs
Executives
Business students

courses.title: Coaching emocional: el diseño de un pensamiento exponencial
courses.bio: El sistema de la creación y sus principios
objectives: La idea como la fuente de la creatividad
La percepción como molde de nuestros procesos internos
Formación del pensamiento y emoción
Diseño del pensamiento exponencial
La mecánica de la creación y sus principios
Los pilares del emprendimiento

Construyendo un nuevo paradigma: El arte de la responsabilidad: habilidad para responder (primera parte)
El arte de la responsabilidad: habilidad para responder (segunda parte)
El funcionamiento de las cosas (el mecanismo de la vida)
El diseño de un paradigma exponencial (parte 1)
El diseño de un paradigma exponencial (segunda parte)
El diseño de un paradigma exponencial (tercera parte)
Las bases del pensamiento exponencial (primera parte)
Las bases del pensamiento exponencial (segunda parte)
El sistema y sus principios: El mundo de las ideas (el campo cuántico)
Percepción (aquello que define el pensamiento y la emoción)
Aplicando los principios: Inteligencia emocional (colocando intelecto a la emoción)
Revisando la mecánica de nuestros logros y fracasos

requirements: Concepciones generales de inteligencia emocional
Disposición para aceptar nuevas concepciones y posibilidades
Deseo de cambio
courses.description:
Conózcamos eso que es preciso unir para crear e innovar...


Para ser capaces de entrar en contacto con intelectos superiores que impulsen la innovación individual y colectiva es preciso formarnos emocionalmente, ya que es solamente por ese medio que la idea se desprende del egoísmo sentando las bases para la construcción de un valor que se sumara al mundo...


Por medio de la integración de conocimientos milenarios y desde las nuevas tendencias provenientes de la ciencia, su vertiente cuántica y neurocientifica, presentamos un sistema de creación y desarrollo constituido por leyes y principios a partir de lo cual funciona el flujo de las experiencias humanas y la realidad desde donde se materializa la fiscalidad.


Un sistema diseñado para integrar la aceleración de los tiempos imperante mediante el diseño de un pensamiento exponencial sustentado en pilares que nos obligan a desarrollar el intelecto y la emoción asociada con cualquier proceso que pretenda materializar las ideas en el tiempo y el espacio.


Un revolucionario concepto de inteligencia emocional, así como una practica visión de espiritualidad, emergen con la intención de esquematizar nociones esparcidas de manera lineal en diversas culturas iniciáticas, filosofías y corrientes de pensamiento con la finalidad de unificar aquello que es preciso honrar mediante la unión en desmedro de la fragmentación y división de las fuerzas de la creación.


De la mano del coaching ontológico y su modelo de aprendizaje OSAR, construiremos un flujo de integración segmentado a través de principios que pretendemos abordar para el desarrollo y el diseño en la mecánica del aprendizaje transformacional.
target_audience: Terapeutas
Coach
Lideres
Emprendedores
Cualquier personas con deseos de conocer un sistema de creación aplicable a todos los ámbitos de la vida

courses.title: Einstieg in die Retrospektive
courses.bio: Führe dein Team zu wirksamen Veränderungen!
objectives: Verständnis der Retrospektive als Werkzeug zur kontinuierlichen Verbesserung
Förderung einer offenen Kommunikationskultur im Team
Anwendung der fünf Phasen einer Retrospektive
Entwicklung von Moderationsfähigkeiten für Retrospektiven

Einstieg in die Retrospektive: Ein Raum für Reflexion und kontinuierlicher Teamverbesserung
Die 5 Phasen für strukturierte Teamentwicklung und kontinuierliche Verbesserung

requirements: Grundlegendes Verständnis agiler Methoden
Erste Erfahrung in Teamarbeit oder Projektmanagement
Interesse an Selbstreflexion und kontinuierlicher Verbesserung
Offenheit für neue Techniken und Methoden
Erste Erfahrung in der Moderation
courses.description:
Du hast noch nie von Retrospektiven gehört oder fragst dich, wie diese Methode deinem Team wirklich helfen kann? In diesem Kurs erfährst du alles, was du über Retrospektiven wissen musst – von den Grundlagen bis zur praktischen Umsetzung.
Retrospektiven sind ein einfaches, aber wirkungsvolles Werkzeug, um die Zusammenarbeit im Team kontinuierlich zu verbessern. Sie bieten eine strukturierte Möglichkeit, regelmäßig innezuhalten, auf vergangene Erfahrungen zu blicken und gemeinsam Maßnahmen für die Zukunft abzuleiten.
Dieser Kurs ist ideal für alle, die einen Einstieg in die Welt der Retrospektiven suchen – sei es als Teammitglied, Projektleiter oder Scrum Master. Ganz ohne Vorwissen bekommst du hilfreiche Tipps, die du direkt in deinem Team anwenden kannst.
Nach diesem Kurs kannst du selbst Retrospektiven moderieren, wissen worauf es ankommt und hast das nötige Handwerkszeug, um dein Team nachhaltig zu verbessern.
Also, worauf wartest du noch? Mach den ersten Schritt und starte gleich heute mit deinem zweiten ee learning Nugget zum Thema Retrospektive. Ich freu mich auf dich!

Ich bin Björn Paschke, Scrum Master und als Consultant für ee factor agile Consulting GmbH tätig. Im Video wird dir mein digitaler Zwilling mein Wissen vermitteln, welches ich mit Hilfe von KI für dich ausformuliert habe.


Träume groß, lerne größer! Erreiche mehr mit ee learning by ee factor.
target_audience: Scrum Master und Agile Coaches
Teamleiter und Projektmanager in agilen und hybriden Projekten
Entwicklungsteams und Fachabteilungen in Unternehmen
Fachkräfte in Change Management und Organisationsentwicklung
Freelancer und Selbstständige, die in Projekten mit agilen Methoden arbeiten

courses.title: Escrita Criativa: Como Escrever Microcontos
courses.bio: Aprenda a escrever histórias de até 500 palavras na prática, do rascunho à publicação.
objectives: O que é um microconto e quais são seus principais elementos.
Como criar impacto narrativo com pouquíssimas palavras.
Como escrever e editar um microconto.
Como publicar seus próprios microcontos.
requirements: Nenhuma experiência prévia é necessária.
courses.description:
Você quer escrever uma história, mas não sabe por onde começar? Ou sente que não tem tempo suficiente para escrever?
A microficção pode ser o seu ponto de partida. Neste curso, vamos explorar o universo das pequenas grandes histórias: os microcontos, histórias curtas de até 500 palavras.
Você vai estudar três microcontos diferentes:
"Vende-se: sapatinhos de bebê, nunca usados"
"Capítulo V", de Ernest Hemingway
"Uma História Estranha", de O; Henry
E, a partir deles, você vai aprender os elementos da microficção e como eles se comportam na prática.
Depois, você vai escrever e editar seu próprio microconto. Eu vou compartilhar todo o meu processo criativo para que você possa aprender com meus erros e, mais tarde, possa cometer os seus próprios erros.
Juntos, nós vamos conversar sobre:
A teoria da microficção (brevidade, surpresa, minimalismo)
Como começar uma história
Como editar uma história
Onde publicar seus microcontos
E muito mais
Este curso foi feito para escritores com pouco tempo ou nenhuma experiência, e que aprendem fazendo. Ao final do curso, você verá que a microficção é um exercício criativo que pode te acompanhar pelo resto da sua vida literária.
Vamos escrever grandes histórias com poucas palavras?
Nos vemos na primeira aula!
target_audience: Escritores iniciantes.
Escritores interessados em histórias de até 500 palavras.

courses.title: Write 4 a Day
courses.bio: Simple tricks to get you writing every day.

Quiz: Are you ready to Write 4 a Day?

requirements: No experience needed except a desire to write more.
courses.description:
This free course was developed from techniques I used to get my sometimes-reluctant brain kickstarted on days when I didn't really feel like writing. These are simple things anyone can do. But they are effective techniques to get the synapses firing and the words flowing. If you find it hard to get started writing, this course may help you.

Write more. Write consistently. Write with facility. Write with inspiration Write yourself into new habits.

If you have to take a lot of time between writing sessions, sometimes the manuscript can get 'cold' so to speak. Rather than waste your time dithering, jump right in with Write 4 a Day and warm the project up again.

Most of us have busy lives: we work a job (or two). We have obligations to friends and families. Even if we're drawn to writing as a creative pursuit, finding time to do it can be a challenge. And when we do find the time, sometimes it can be a challenge to dive in. It's easy to get discouraged. It's easy to turn to mindless entertainments instead. But there is no pleasure like writing and getting your thoughts out of your head and onto the page. It gives you such a sense of accomplishment. Creating is what we are meant to do.


Try Write 4 a Day and see if you don't find it much easier to get writing!
target_audience: Writers who find it hard to get started when they find time to write.

courses.title: Cartoon Drawing Learn by Cheating
courses.bio: From Zero to Cartoon Drawings the fast way... Cheating

Yes you can in fact Draw: Build Confidence and Protect your Ego

requirements: Access to paper, pencil, pen and still be breathing.
courses.description:
There are some simple tips and tricks to learn to draw cartoons, so that it doesn't become discouraging. This course will get you drawing cartoons fast, and keep perspective to not be overwhelmed.
Drawing is something almost everyone thinks they can't do, but stop at saying "I can't draw" and leaving it at that, but if you WANT to draw, but think you can't learn, let me convince you otherwise because you can. I will teach you by showing you how to cheat at drawing.
target_audience: Wants to learn to draw but thinks it will be too hard or take too long

courses.title: Scrivere e pubblicare fantasy/fantascienza/weird
courses.bio: Scrivere un buon romanzo fantasy o di fantascienza e trovare l'editore giusto (non a pagamento)
objectives: Come scrivere un romanzo di successo con lo schema del Viaggio dell'eroe
Come rimuovere i blocchi creativi - blocco dello scrittore - come ritrovare l'ispirazione
Come editare il romanzo per prepararlo alla pubblicazione
Come proporsi ad agenti ed editori in modo efficace
Come accedere alla community della narrativa di genere in Italia

Introduzione: Istruzioni per l'uso di questo corso!
Scrivere un buon romanzo: Il fantasy, la fantascienza, il weird
Libri che parlano di scrittura creativa

requirements: Avere autentica passione per la scrittura creativa
Amare la narrativa di genere (fantasy e fantascienza)
courses.description:
Perché propongo questo corso? Per aiutare chi si trova nella situazione in cui mi trovavo io una decina di anni fa: un po' persa nel mercato editoriale, senza capire bene come avvicinarmi a editori seri (anche se piccoli), desiderosa di scrivere romanzi sempre migliori (e vendibili) ma senza delle chiare indicazioni su come fare.
Dopo molto scrivere, nel 2019 ho pubblicato un romanzo distopico con Zona42 (Cenere) e nel 2022 un romanzo new weird con Moscabianca (La Trappola). Si tratta di editori piccoli, ma entrambi hanno tradotto ad esempio China Mieville; Zona42 ha pubblicato tra gli altri "La città dell'orca" di Sam J Miller e Moscabianca "Il codice delle creature estinte" di E.B. Hudspeth. Diciamo quindi che nel catalogo di questi due editori mi trovo in buona, anzi ottima compagnia. Vivo di scrittura? Onestamente, no: lavoro nel terzo settore come project manager e operatrice giovanile, mentre scrivere è la mia passione. Nel mio percorso ho conosciuto persone che pubblicano con grandi editori (Fazi, Mondadori) ma anche in questo caso la scrittura non costituisce il 100% delle loro entrate, che arrotondano insegnando scrittura creativa, lavorando come giornalisti ecc.
Questa premessa per chiarificare che questo corso non vi porterà a vivere di scrittura (probabilmente), ma vi darà delle coordinate per diventare scrittori migliori e per orientarvi nel mercato editoriale italiano, per capire quali possono essere delle prospettive realistiche per la pubblicazione e quali ambienti (digitali e non) frequentare per accedere alla community della narrativa di genere in Italia.
Durante il corso, userò l'esempio di un mio romanzo "in cantiere": BRANCO (aka Scout Guerriglia). Utilizzerò ispirazione, ambientazione, personaggi ed editing di questo romanzo per illustrare i passi che portano dall'idea, alla scaletta, alla prima stesura, all'editing.
target_audience: Scrittori che vogliono migliorare e pubblicare

courses.title: Writing : The basic knowledge for the beginners
courses.bio: What to use, where to seek, what's out there and how to make things.
objectives: Get to know about different types of written content (articles, essays, fiction, screenplays, etc)
Different writing styles, how each writer have own approach to writing and what might suit you better
Topics that are in the written world, what one might need depending on chosen topic
Tropes and Clichés - What's that and how to use it
Genres of written works, how they differ and what to know about them
Deciding on publishing approaches : blogs, media, classical publishing, indie publishing
How to create the artistic mock-up for inspiration and drive
Free resources for writing, publishing and establishing own written content
How to make money - online sales, grants, contests, works, audio/visual merch, co-op with culture & art NGOs/associations/businesses
Commissions, Marketing, Collaborations, Translations
Emotional side of the writing - blocks, procrastination, exhaustion, etc - How to deal with that, where to find support
The random things that one can add: neurospicy vs neurotypical; Ikigai / Kaizen; Chronotypes; Work types; MBTI; Astro things and more to check out...

Deciding on which media to use: Beware: The vultures of self publishing world

requirements: No experience required. Only being open to new info, as well as being ready to get that research kit on.
courses.description:
The ultimate resource course for those who want to write, yet are not sure how to begin or where to inspire from.

As an author, during conversations with people I tend to hear this reoccurring sentence - "I wish to write, but I'm not sure what about", or "I want to write, but I'm not that good at it", or "I'd write, but I don't think it would be much".

And that, quite frankly, saddens me. We all have stories to tell, to share, ideas that we want to spread or some great pieces we're capable of creating - maybe new best seller that will be adapted into new movie or series! Who knows.

But because of that "not sure" situation - many great stories are lost along the way of that very shabby train of thoughts.

So because of that very shabby train, I devised a plan to get it off-rails and make a new and better vehicle for transporting that idea pool of greatness.

This course is created to give insights into the field of writing: what kinds of writing is out there, where is that all used.
What genres of writing exists in the world and how to maybe try out what suits more for you?
Not all of us are there for endless romance, some are more about mysteries and detective stories. Some make gothic and lewd things - but how does one know where to direct self with all that?

So here is the overview of what length of writing one can manage, as well as what lengths of writing is what.
Why novel and novelette are absolutely different and how is different script form from book form... What the heck is web novel?

Where do people post their things? What platforms to use? Do we abuse social media with storm of our creations? Where does one find how to make cover art? What do you mean there's different types of cover art?! What the heck do literary agents and publishers do? Why does it take ages for them to reply and why do we need to know that?

Publishing through publishing house, indie publishing and self-publishing - what's the difference and how do we make profit?
Audio books - what is this evil sorcery and why so pricey?

There are a lot more things that are talked about in this course.

Exactly all that to find out the needed approach to writing, to topics and genre that one feels will fit their Cinderella foot, the  ways to make more with that and where to get help, what online resources are available and how to conquer that mad world of words, how to note to self, what emotional things to look out for and what other things are there in the world of being an author...


Here you'll find about types of writing (blog posts, flash fiction, novels, scripts, essays and more)


genres (action, drama, thriller, mystery, issekai, and many others)


fields of interest (professional fields - such as architecture, construction, art, marine, agriculture, sales and others)


available resources (free & low cost) for posting/creating/publishing/editing/collaborations and more.


How to keep the inspiration (what to use: tricks and crafty methods when faced with authors block, procrastination and emotional exhaustion)


what to look at when writing your works (monologues, dialogues, descriptions, senses, emotions, etc)


where to get that coin (how to find agents, magazines, online book stores, funding for authors, grants, contests and more)


how to produce traction (marketing and how to deal with it, if you've no clue about it)


who to poke for engagement (freelancers, podcasts, authors, review communities, magazines, newspapers, social media).


Emotional and psychological side of the writing. How it affects you, how it affects others. Support, encouragement...

How to find self  in the buzz of life, determine what approach to take towards own self and what strengths and weaknesses to work with.

There's a lot to explore, set sails for, create, see and try!

Welcome Aboard this Ship of Writing!
Beware of the moment when you do come across my voice. That's when the lectures that sound like a podcast - begin!
Prepare those snacks, drinks, get the fuzzy blanket, your house pet... (hope you did not forget hydration and meds, food as well. No. Proper food. Not endless snacks. I know you know ( ¬_¬)< I see you )  and off we go!
target_audience: Beginner Writers/Artisans/Mavericks and anyone interested to discover something new about writing.

courses.title: pittura acrilica paesaggio
courses.bio: paesaggio corso di pittura acrilica di livello medio, impara a dare profondità ai dipinti
objectives: sarai in grado di rendere la profondità nei tuoi dipinti attraverso il disegno e con la prospettiva
sarai in grado di rendere la profondità nei tuoi dipinti attraverso il colore e con la prospettiva aerea
sarai in grado di scegliere inquadrature efficaci per i tuoi dipinti
sarai in grado di realizzare paesaggi rendendo la profondità e la tridimensionalità
requirements: bisogna avere già acquisito le basi della pittura acrilica
courses.description:
La tecnica dell'acrilico è molto appassionante.
Dopo avere appreso le tecniche base con il corso per principianti e il corso avanzato dedicato ai colori sono sicura che avrai voglia di progredire la tua tecnica e le tue conoscenze per realizzare dipinti sempre più complessi.
QUESTO E’ UN CORSO PRATICO diviso in tre parti:
1 materiale spiegato e descritto in modo specifico
La prima parte del corso è come sempre dedicata al materiale. Vi guiderò attraverso la scelta del materiale giusto per poterlo utilizzare al meglio. Spesso si sceglie il materiale sbagliato per inesperienza pur acquistando materiale molto costoso.
2 paesaggio. Il tema di questo corso. Come dare profondità e tridimensionalità attraverso l'inquadratura, la prospettiva del disegno e la prospettiva aerea per quel che riguarda il colore.
3 Mettiamo tutto insieme realizzando un paesaggio dal cielo nuvoloso con montagne in lontananza e papaveri in primo piano.
Come mia abitudine anche queste tecniche avanzate le imparerai mettendole subito in pratica. Le realizzeremo assieme step dopo step. Questo perché sono convinta che la teoria vada sedimentata subito sul campo.
Come sempre vi ricordo che non sarete soli lungo tutto il vostro percorso ma potrete contattarmi per farmi le domande e chiarire i vostri dubbi che inevitabilmente vi verranno mentre imparerete a dipingere. Potrete farmi poi vedere i vostri esercizi e lavori per una correzione o un consiglio.
target_audience: Questo corso è per te se hai già appreso le basi della pittura acrilica
Questo corso è per te se vuoi imparare a realizzare paesaggi rendendo la profondità e la tridimensionalità
Questo corso è per te se hai bisogno di un approccio pratico, chiaro e semplice.

courses.title: Pensamento Criativo
courses.bio: Um guia para despertar a postura criativa
objectives: Entender o que é criatividade e como desenvolver o pensamento criativo
Desenvolver o raciocínio criativo e seus atributos
Aprender a usar o processo criativo para resolver problemas diversos
Aprender rotinas e hábitos para o desenvolvimento criativo

Pensamento Criativo: Criatividade e a Abrangência do Saber
Criatividade e a Zona de Conforto
Processos Criativos e de Criação: Atributos cognitivos: observação, análise, experimentação e questionamento
Atributos cognitivos: Interpretação, associação e comparação

requirements: Não é necessário pré-requisitos para este curso, apenas vontade de entender e praticar exercícios criativos
courses.description:
O que nos torna criativos? Por que a criatividade tem relação com resolução de problemas? De onde surgiu esse comportamento, quais os tipos de problemas existem e por que todo mundo pode se tornar mais criativo?
A criatividade é própria do ser humano, todos são criativos em algum nível e temos o potencial de desenvolver o pensamento criativo em alto nível. Por isso, ela pode ser exercitada e direcionada para a solução de problemas dos mais variados tipos. Então, como podemos, através de uma mudança cognitiva, começar a inserir uma postura criativa no dia a dia?
Comece por esse curso. Aqui, abordo a criatividade como um jeito de ser e pensar. Ela é um atributo cognitivo que faz com que estejamos preparados para resolver problemas. Ser criativo requer um esforço cognitivo de fato, sair de uma zona conhecida e se abrir a novas experiências e desafios.
Neste curso vamos abordar a criatividade com foco no entendimento e desenvolvimento de seus atributos para o pensamento criativo, um panorama geral sobre o que você pode e deve fazer em você mesmo(a) para criar uma relação duradoura com o ato de criar, desenvolvendo o pensamento e a postura criativa no seu dia a dia.
target_audience: Pessoas que queiram entender como desenvolver a criatividade, profissionais de todas as áreas, da comunicação às relações humanas

courses.title: Draft to Done: A Creative QWIK Course for Effective Revision
courses.bio: Write Your Best Work Yet in Any Genre of Creative Writing - Assess, Revise, Self Edit & Create Your Own Revision System
objectives: You will receive a Draft to Done Certificate of Completion after finishing the course.
Build habits and systems to make revision less overwhelming and easily repeatable.
Shift your perspective from perfectionism to purpose.
Writers need to view feedback as a tool, not a threat.
Solidify structure, themes, and intent.
Refine clarity, purpose, and consistency.
Strengthen internal logic and authenticity.
Eliminate filler, repetition, and redundancy.
Improve flow through narrative and paragraph transitions.
Strengthen sentence clarity, rhythm, and style.
Polish with precision: grammar, punctuation, and emphasis.

Draft to Done: Effective Revision for Cr: Lesson 10: Creating a Sustainable Revision Workflow

requirements: Just a willingness to write!
courses.description:
From Draft to Done: A Creative Writing QWIK Course for Effective Revision
All of my Creative Writing Qwik Courses are designed to tackle a single creative writing concept or problem in about an hour.


Course Overview:
You’ve finished a draft. Now what?
For many writers, revision can feel like the hardest part of the entire writing process. It’s easy to get overwhelmed trying to fix everything at once - or to get stuck polishing the same sentence over and over and over without making any real forward progress.
From Draft to Done is a practical, down-to-earth course that teaches how to confidently revise your writing - from first draft to final polished piece. Whether working on fiction, memoir, drama, essay, or creative nonfiction, this course provides a clear, repeatable system to help you revise with purpose, not panic.
Over 10 focused lessons, you’ll work to shift your focus from perfectionism to productive revision. Learn to refine your structure, flow, and core message, strengthen character voice and narrative transitions, cut clutter, improve sentence rhythm, and line-edit with confidence, use feedback constructively without emotion, and ultimately build your own sustainable revision workflow.
Each lesson includes two targeted activities: one to introduce the concept of the lesson, and one to apply it directly to your own writing.
By the end of this course, not only will you have a stronger draft - but you’ll also have the skill and system to revise any future project without the stress, no matter your current comfort level.
No more guessing. No more endless rewriting.
Just a smart, step-by-step method to help you shape your work into its best possible form.
Let’s make revision the part of the process you look forward to!
target_audience: Anyone with a creative streak, a nagging desire to write, and a drive to improve the quality of their revision process.

courses.description:
Cosa imparerete nel Modulo 08 del Corso Be Maker:
ROBOTICA
- Accenni sul dare l'udito e la parola ai nostri robot
- Il Buzzer attivo e differenze con il buzzer passivo
- I Sensori: Misurare il suono/rumore o usarlo come Switch
SCIENZE
- II Suono e il rumore
- Le onde sonore e la loro propagazione
ELETTRONICA
- Il funzionamento del microfono
- Il funzionamento dell’altoparlante
ARDUINO ED IDE
- Ripasso delle principali istruzioni in C++ per Arduino
PROGETTI PRATICI
- Progetto 22 – Modulo «active buzzer» (buzzer attivo)
- Analisi dello Sketch del Progetto 22
-Progetto 23 – Modulo Sensore suono/rumore usato come SWITCH
- Analisi dello Sketch del Progetto 23
- Progetto 24 – Sensore suono/rumore usato come strumento di misura
- Analisi dello Sketch del Progetto 24


Il presente corso è uno dei tredici moduli che costituiscono il Corso Base su Arduino.
Questo corso si inquadra perfettamente in quella nuova area di insegnamento che ultimamente, soprattutto a livello internazionale, si sta diffondendo ed in Italia siamo solo agli inizi. Sempre più risorse vengono investite in questo che è ormai diventato persino un percorso di studi che parte dalle scuole elementari sino a portare gli studenti a giungere alla laurea. Questa nuova area che racchiude più discipline, si chiama STEM.


PER CHI E' INTERESSATO AL MATERIALE DIDATTICO UTILIZZATO NEI CORSI BE MAKER CHE INCLUDE ANCHE UNA ROBOT CAR, PUO' SCRIVERMI TRAMITE LA PIATTAFORMA UDEMY.

requirements: Khóa học được thiết kế dành cho tất cả mọi người, kể cả những người không có kiến thức nền tảng về AI.
courses.description:
Khóa học "Sử dụng hiệu quả các công cụ AI miễn phí" là khóa học dành cho những người muốn tìm hiểu và sử dụng các công cụ AI miễn phí để nâng cao hiệu suất công việc và cuộc sống. Khóa học cung cấp kiến thức và hướng dẫn thực hành các công cụ AI trong các lĩnh vực văn bản, âm thanh, hình ảnh và video.

Khóa học này dành cho ai?
Khóa học này dành cho tất cả những ai muốn tìm hiểu và sử dụng các công cụ AI miễn phí để nâng cao hiệu suất công việc và sáng tạo.
Khóa học sẽ học như thế nào?
Khóa học được thiết kế theo hướng thực hành, với các bài giảng video ngắn gọn, dễ hiểu và các bài tập thực hành giúp bạn áp dụng ngay những kiến thức đã học.
Khóa học có gì đặc biệt?
Khóa học này cung cấp cho bạn danh sách các công cụ AI miễn phí tốt nhất hiện nay.

Lợi ích khi tham gia khóa học:
Nâng cao hiệu suất công việc
Sáng tạo nội dung chất lượng cao
Tiết kiệm thời gian và chi phí
Đăng ký khóa học ngay hôm nay để bắt đầu khám phá thế giới của trí tuệ nhân tạo!
target_audience: Bất kỳ ai muốn tận dụng sức mạnh của AI để nâng cao hiệu quả và chất lượng công việc.
Người quan tâm đến AI: Khóa học sẽ giúp người quan tâm đến AI hiểu rõ hơn về công nghệ này và cách ứng dụng AI vào cuộc sống.
Freelancer: Khóa học sẽ giúp freelancer nâng cao hiệu quả và chất lượng công việc, từ đó tăng thu nhập.
Người làm kinh doanh, quảng cáo dễ dàng tự mình tạo ra sản phẩm truyền thông nhờ sự hỗ trợ của AI.

courses.title: Creative Writing: Writing a Novella for Beginners
courses.bio: Learn how to write a short book with effective writing methods!
objectives: Create an effective plan for a novella
Practice effective writing methods for productivity
Check writing quality
Practice editing and publishing your novella
requirements: No requirements to take this course
courses.description:
Hello Writer!
Welcome to the course where I show you how to write an enjoyable novella that will keep your readers interested. Don't make the same mistakes that so many novice authors make and create a novella that can challenge those of successful authors!


My name is Matthew Dewey and I am a writer. It is hard to say when my passion for writing began, but if I can recall it all started back in primary school. A small, pale child with not much to say, but plenty to write, or in most cases scribble, across a page. From there writing became a hobby, moving on to become a part-time job writing articles on various subjects from technology to programming. Suddenly, the spark was ignited and I wrote my first novel. From there I was hooked onto something that was akin to a calling.
Enough monologue, it is time to tell you what this course is worth to you. First, this course was created with the express intention to teach the fundamentals of writing a novella. In my rising through the writing world I found that information was handed freely, but not with enough dedication and forethought. The advice lacking and the examples poor. I decided to push through and after several years developed my own toolkit that is simple and multipurpose.
In addition to the research, I also write from experience, having written several novels, novellas, short stories, articles on writing and taught tens-of-thousands of students.
I will show you how to:
Effectively plan a novella
Develop stories perfect for novellas
Finish a novella in good time
Use novella writing methods
Edit your novella
Publish and market your novella
AND many tips and advice to add to your writing arsenal!
Welcome to the Writing a Novella for Beginners Course! I will show what you need to know to develop an interesting novella and turn it into a book to be proud of!
"Writing is a powerful form of art, but it is the reader's imagination that is the canvas, not the page."
target_audience: Writers
Writing Students
Beginner Writers

courses.title: Aprende a ser más innovador.
courses.bio: Conoce los arquetipos y sellos complementarios de la innovación.
objectives: Descubrir tu capacidad como persona innovadora.
Conocer los 4 arquetipos de la innovación.
Conocer tu arquetipo innovador y usarlo a tu beneficio.
Conocer los arquetipos complementarios a tu arquetipo.
Romper tus propios paradigmas y creencias sobre la innovación y qué significa ser innovador.
Salirte de la caja aprovechando al máximo tu potencial creativo sin importar a lo que te dediques.

Lección #4: Visual Thinking: El Power House de la Innovación.
Lección #5: El Mago: Los 3 básicos para detonar la creatividad.
Lección #6 Técnicas para Desarrollar Pen: Técnica #2: ¿Cómo hacer una sesión de lluvia de ideas?
Técnica #3: El Camino de la Ideación
Técnica #5: La Magia de la Conceptualización
Lección #8: El Científico: Aplica la creatividad con la experimentación.
Lección #9: El Arte del Feedback para Estimular la Innovación

requirements: No se requiere experiencia previa en el tema.
Ganas de salir de la caja y reinventarte.
courses.description:
En este curso te sacaremos de la caja y cambiaremos todos esos paradigmas y clichés que por años te han vendido sobre lo que es ser innovador y creativo.
En cada lección te daremos herramientas y técnicas para que desarrolles tu inteligencia innovadora y saques todo tu potencial creativo y lo apliques al reto personal o profesional que traigas. También te presentamos los 4 arquetipos de la innovación y sus sellos complementarios. Eso sí, no creas que somos solo un arquetipo, sino que puedes aprovechar lo que cada uno te presenta.
La información y conocimiento que te brindamos en este curso aplica desde un reto personal que traigas hasta un reto empresarial al que no sabes cómo enfrentarlo y necesitas nuevas ideas. Tampoco nos limitamos a que uses este conocimiento solo en retos monumentales, sino que también en retos del día a día.
Como un extra, y porque somos lectores empedernidos, te dejaremos una lectura que conecta con cada lección, y la cual puede complementar tu aprendizaje.
Todo esto te lo compartimos desde la experiencia de dedicarnos a la innovación y creatividad desde hace más de 15 años, con empresas nacionales e internacionales, pequeñas, medianas y grandes.
¡Te retamos desarrollar tu disrupción y creatividad!
target_audience: Cualquier persona que quiera ser más innovadora en su vida profesional y/o personal.
Cualquier persona que quiera ser más creativa en su vida profesional y/o personal.

objectives: 1. Scrittura di Romanzi: Cosa è la trama;
2. Scrittura di Racconti: Quanti tipi di trame esistono;
3. Scrivere un libro: Quando un'emozione diventa trama?
4. L'importanza della posta in gioco nella trama;
5. Editing della scrittura: Conoscere le basi per costruire una trama efficace;
6. Scrittura: L'esposizione: cosa è, quando, come e dove usarla;
7. Drammaturgia: L'importanza dei punti chiave nella trama;
8. Strutturare una trama: inizio, parte centrale, finale;
9. Differenza tra finale lineare e finale circolare;
10. Le funzioni indispensabili della trama;
11. Quali sono le migliori tecniche di descrizione;
12. Differenza tra: rivelare, descrivere, mostrare;
13. In che modo da un intreccio all'altro può nascere la suspense;
14. L'importanza cruciale dell'evento straordinario e dell'effetto.
6h di corso !!!

CAP- 7-8: 7.3 - Quando il lettore finisce per annoiarsi
CAP 13 -14: 14 - Come deve essere un buon finale?

requirements: Non sono necessari prerequisiti, basta avere la passione per lo scrivere
...voglia di mettersi in gioco e migliorare sempre di più, indipendentemente da quale livello si sia partiti.
courses.description:
Che cos'è la trama?
Quando un'emozione può diventare realmente trama?
Se tutto parte da un'idea, quest'ultima deve essere soggettiva o oggettiva?
Di fronte ad una nuova idea occorre rispondere a delle domande specifiche per decidere se può diventare una trama efficace, e, quindi, una storia da raccontare.
Domande del tipo:


E' un'idea che ci interessa veramente, qualcosa che comprendiamo e che sembra promettere un risultato?
Si può lavorare sull'idea, svilupparla con impegno e rigore, in modo che un lettore la possa trovare interessante?
L'idea mette in gioco qualcosa di abbastanza specifico e vitale, non solo per l'autore ma per uno o più fra i personaggi coinvolti?
Inoltre considerando che le domande aprono la mente mentre le affermazioni la chiudono un bravo scrittore deve porsi altre domande del tipo:
Che differenza c'è tra la trama primaria e secondaria?
Quali sono le basi per costruire una trama efficace?
Quali sono le funzioni reali di una trama?


Se queste e tante altre domande satellitano nella tua mente da tempo senza ricevere una soddisfacente risposta, allora entra a far parte anche tu della mia classe on-line su come scrivere una trama.
Scrivere è un processo di scoperta e di invenzione, quindi più aumenta la complessità della storia da raccontare, maggiori saranno le probabilità che si possa sviluppare in maniera imprevista. Per questo non basta sviluppare una trama, occorre anche tenerla sotto controllo. ?
Nel corso spiegherò anche quali sono i problemi principali da fronteggiare concernenti la trama tra cui:


le false partenze;
le conclusioni affrettate;
l'evolversi lento e casuale;
gli schemi nei quali sono inseriti personaggi;
tutti gli imprevisti che possono sorgere anche nell'ambito di situazioni apparentemente definite.


Una storia efficace deve essere ben documentata, ma i riscontri e le informazioni che sono utili a te scrittore nella stesura non devono essere riversati in modo indiscriminato sul tuo lettore. Ti spiegherò nel dettaglio come evitare facili errori che vengono commessi soprattutto quando si è alle prime armi.
La trama è azione: nella storia ci deve sempre essere qualcosa che accade o sta per accadere. La trama principale attraversa idealmente la storia fin dall'inizio, è quella su cui converge l'attenzione del lettore in apertura e da cui scaturiscono il climax o il confronto finale.
Devi sapere che un'opera di una certa lunghezza può avere più di una trama. L'intreccio o gli intrecci secondari possono approfondire il contesto della storia, rispecchiare o contrastare adeguatamente l'azione principale, creare la suspense, dare maggior ritmo e guidare l'azione mentre la trama principale osserva una pausa. Spiegherò nel dettaglio l'estrema importanza del ritmo della narrazione che è determinato da moltissimi elementi tra cui: lo sviluppo di una trama principale da assecondare, l'introduzione di nuovi particolari e di svolte improvvise, la quantità e l'impiego dell'esposizione ecc...ecc...


Analizzeremo insieme le tre fasi di una trama:


L'INIZIO                                              LA PARTE CENTRALE                                                  IL FINALE


Risponderemo a domande fondamentali del tipo:


Quanti modi ci sono per poter iniziare un'opera narrativa?
La parte centrale di un'opera narrativa da cosa è composta?
Come far sì che possa risultare avvincente, efficace e per niente noiosa?
Quanti tipi di intrecci esistono?
Quanti tipi di finali esistono?
Insieme, inoltre, analizzeremmo l'importanza dell'esposizione, le sue finalità, quando, dove e come inserirla e gli errori da non commettere a tal riguardo.
In questo corso spiegherò tutto attraverso degli schemi ed delle immagini (che restano più impresse nella memoria). inoltre ci sarà, a fine di ogni sezione, una parte dedicata agli esercizi che svolgono la funzione di training di scrittura creativa.
Leggeremo insieme esempi tratti da brani di narrativa classica e da testi dei quali sono stati tratti anche film molto famosi.
Se sei interessato a questa parte specifica della scrittura creativa, quale quella della TRAMA,  ti attendo nella mia aula virtuale per un interessantissimo quanto unico viaggio da compiere insieme.
Brunella.
target_audience: Scrittori che vogliono aggiornarsi sulla specifica tematica della trama, aspiranti scrittori, insegnanti, appassionati di scrittura.

courses.title: Introduction to Cardistry Part 3
courses.bio: Learn amazing and impressive moves that can be done with a regular deck of cards!
objectives: A wide variety of impressive moves that are satisfying to practice and perform.
Complex two handed cuts.
Shoot a card from one hand to the other like a pro!
Iconic moves like the Arm spread!
Impressive one handed cuts.
Spin a single card on your finger like a pro!
requirements: No experience is required. You will only need a regular deck of cards and be willing to practice a lot!
courses.description:
What is Cardistry?
Cardistry is the performance art of card flourishing, where a normal deck of playing cards is manipulated with cuts, pivots, spins, twirls, and other creative movements to create beautiful displays and visuals.


What will you learn in this course?
You will be learning 12 basic moves that every person starting Cardistry should know. Some of the moves are easy and others are a bit more challenging. The Moves you will learn are from various categories in Cardistry and look very impressive and are fun to practice. You do not need any experience with handling or shuffling a deck of cards as I will be breaking down each move into simple, easy to learn steps.


What will you need to begin?
The only thing you will need to start is a regular deck of cards. However, I highly recommend brands such as Bicycle, Bee, Tally ho, or any other brand by the United States Playing Card Company as they are the best quality.


About me:
My name Ali, and I have been practicing Cardistry for the past 9 years. It is my passion, and there is nothing more I enjoy than practicing this craft and teaching it to other people. Cardistry is a very fun skill to practice, and it can be very rewarding once you master a move and perform it to your friends and family.
target_audience: Beginners who are just starting Cardistry.
People looking for a new fun and enjoyable hobby.
People looking to learn an amazing skill to impress their friends and family.
Magicians who want to add some flashy card moves to their card tricks.
People looking for a hobby that will help them relax and de-stress.
People who want to improve their creativity.

La lettura ad alta voce è una competenza che può arricchire la tua vita personale e professionale. Che tu voglia leggere storie ai bambini, narrare audiolibri, fare doppiaggio, podcasting o public speaking, questo corso ti insegnerà le tecniche e gli strumenti per usare la tua voce in modo espressivo, coinvolgente e sicuro. Il corso è strutturato in più moduli, ciascuno dedicato a un aspetto fondamentale della lettura ad alta voce: la voce, il testo, l’emozione. In ogni modulo, troverai:

courses.description:
Welcome to the Abstract Nail Art Masterclass!
Unlock your creativity and master the art of bold, modern nail designs with this Abstract Nail Art Masterclass. This course is perfect for nail techs and creatives who want to learn how to create unique, eye-catching designs using abstract patterns, colour blocking, negative space, and expressive detail.
In this course, you’ll explore a variety of looks using gel polish, fine liners, brush techniques, and layering methods to create both minimalist and statement styles. These abstract designs are perfect for fashion-forward clients or content creation — and they’re surprisingly easy to learn with the right guidance!
Whether you're a beginner wanting to build your nail art confidence or a seasoned artist looking to refresh your style, this course is packed with tips, tools, and inspiration.
We’ll walk through each design step-by-step, so you can follow along in real time — and by the end, you'll have a new set of versatile, creative looks to add to your salon menu or portfolio.
Let’s explore the art of abstract nail art and elevate your nail artistry to the next level!
I look forward to teaching you, and if you'd like to send any photos of your work to me, I'd be delighted to see them.
target_audience: Nail technicians looking to expand their nail art skills with bold and creative abstract designs  Beginners with basic gel polish knowledge who want to explore nail art techniques  Salon owners and mobile nail artists seeking fresh, eye-catching designs to offer their clients  Creative individuals who enjoy experimenting with colour and want to improve their brush control and design planning

courses.description:
Faça o curso, descubra os segredos dos maiores escritores e tenha a chance de publicar seu texto em uma incrível antologia!
A Jornada de Escrita Criativa irá despertar o incrível escritor que existe dentro de você pois, ao contrário do que muitos afirmam como verdade, todos nós temos a capacidade de contar histórias.
Mas, para contá-las, nada melhor do que as informações contidas nesse curso que vai, sem tópicos desnecessários, direto ao ponto, isto é, desenvolver um fantástico texto narrativo que irá encantar os seus leitores.
O curso é composto de seis módulos com 37 vídeo-aulas com tarefas e elaboração de textos utilizando as técnicas ensinadas de forma dinâmica e envolvente e você irá aprender desde as técnicas de observação para gerar a ignição de uma história e de personagens até a criação da trama, da estrutura, do estilo, do enredo, dos conflitos dos pontos de vista e as finalizações.
E, nos últimos vídeos, você terá alguns bônus com dicas incríveis e práticas para usar toda vez que for escrever um texto narrativo, ficcional, profissional ou acadêmico.
Assista as aulas, faça as tarefas, desenvolva sua história e tenha a oportunidade de participar da seleção de textos que farão parte das antologias do selo editorial Neblina Negra!
target_audience: Todos que pretendem desenvolver sua capacidades criativa para a produção de textos envolventes.

courses.description:
THIS COURSE IS THE FOURTH OF MY FIVE-COURSE SERIES ON HAPPY SKILLS EXPERIENCES - A SERIES OF 80+ INTERTWINED GROWTH SKILLS  TO BOOST YOUR PRODUCTIVITY, PERFORMANCE, AND PROGRESS.
This course has been created by combining the power of Generative AI with Human Cognition and Know-how to boost your growth skills PH!
This course covers 16 of those 80+ intertwined growth skills.
Why do this course?
Artistic and design skills are crucial in various fields such as visual arts, graphic design, fashion, and architecture. This course helps learners develop their creative talents and techniques.
Who is this course for?
This course is valuable for aspiring artists, designers, creative professionals, and individuals interested in exploring their artistic and design capabilities.
How does this course impact you?
The course components include video explanations of each skill with real-world examples. The quizzes help you self-assess your Skills PH* - your Potential (P) and Happiness (H) with each skill. The course shows you several ways to build and sharpen each skill. Overall the course provides a quick yet comprehensive learning experience. Through video explanations, quizzes for comprehension and self-assessment, and practical tips learners gain practical insights and inspiration for their artistic aspirations and pursuits. It empowers them to make informed decisions and excel in various business roles.
Overall, these Happy Skills Growth courses offer structured learning experiences with a combination of theory, practice, and application, catering to diverse learner needs and enhancing their skills for personal and professional growth.
*Skills PH
Measuring both the potential (P) and happiness (H) scores of learners regarding specific skills can indeed provide valuable insights into their career preferences and potential areas of success and fulfilment. Here are some thoughts and suggestions on how this approach can be beneficial:


Identifying Strengths and Passions:
Potential (P) Score: By assessing the learner's comprehension and proficiency in various skills through quizzes and assessments, you can identify their strengths and areas of expertise.
Happiness (H) Score: Understanding which skills bring joy and satisfaction to learners helps identify their passions and interests.


Career Guidance and Decision-Making:
Matching P and H Scores: When learners excel in certain skills (high P score) and enjoy using them (high H score), it indicates alignment between their abilities and interests for career suitability. This alignment can guide career counsellors, educators, or learners themselves in exploring careers that utilize these matched skills. For example, a high P and H scores in communication skills may suggest careers in public speaking, counselling, or teaching


Personalized Learning Paths:
Tailored Skill Development: Based on P and H scores, learners can focus on developing and honing skills that not only match their abilities but also align with their interests and career aspirations.
Course Recommendations: Educational platforms can recommend courses or learning paths based on a learner's profile of P and H scores, providing a personalized and impactful learning experience.


Enhanced Job Satisfaction:
Career Fit: When individuals pursue careers aligned with their strengths and passions, they are more likely to experience job satisfaction, fulfilment, and long-term success.
Continuous Improvement: Regular assessments of P and H scores can help individuals track their progress, identify areas for improvement, and continue refining their skills in alignment with their career goals.


Holistic Development:
Balancing P and H Scores: While focusing on high P skills is important for career success, considering H scores ensures that learners also prioritize their happiness and well-being in their career choices.
Exploring New Areas: Lower P but high H scores in certain skills may indicate potential interest areas that learners can explore further for personal enrichment or as potential career paths in the future.
In summary, integrating P and H scores in skill assessments not only aids in career guidance and decision-making but also promotes holistic development by considering both professional potential and personal happiness in skill development and career choices.
target_audience: Anyone curious about skills, growth, productivity, performance, and progress such as:
College students in the midst of transitioning from campus  to corporate
Individuals and team members in corporate businesses
Entrepreneurs, professionals, and home-makers
Human Resource Development and Learning and Development leaders in corporates
Training and Placement Officers (TPO's) or college campus placement and internship coordinators
Teachers and Parents of college and high-school students
